**The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scarlet Script Jade Instructions Sublime Sutra**

**Sutra Title:** *The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scarlet Script Jade Instructions Sublime Sutra* (abbreviated as *Scarlet Script Jade Instructions*).
Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. One of the ancient *Numinous Treasure Sutras*. Two scrolls.
Source text: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Cavern Mystery Division, *Original Texts* category.

---

**The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scarlet Script Jade Instructions Sublime Sutra, Scroll One**

At that time, the Celestial Venerable of Original Beginning, the Supreme Lord of the Great Dao, the Five Elder Thearchs, and the Great Deities of the Ten Directions convened in the Upper Palace of Vermilion Yang within the Southern Cavern. They were seated upon seven-jeweled thrones of luminous pearls in seven hues. Then, the Five Thearchic Great Sages and the Jade Maidens of Mystic Harmony, along with fifty-two thousand five hundred in assembly, approached the dais. Heavenly perfumes and blossoms rained down, divine dragons and celestial musicians—innumerable hosts—filled the air. Purple clouds spread in all directions, the Three Radiant Ones shone in unison, the Celestial Origin rejoiced in harmony, and the assembled perfected ones arrived in procession.

At that time, the diligent scholar Wang Longci, who had been granted attendance at the seat, entreated to receive the precepts and commandments. The Dao addressed Longci:

"For seven million kalpas, I have reverently cultivated the Numinous Treasure, established vows to bestow and disseminate, upheld the precepts, observed fasts, endured hardship without retreat, revolved through birth and death, practiced forbearance and diligence, severed heterodox thoughts, and embraced emptiness and non-conception. Through the accumulation of these practices, I attained the profound quiescence that elevated me to the honored rank of the Sagely Dao.

Ever moved by compassion, I desire to broadly deliver all beings—whether male or female, those of noble aspiration and utmost sincerity—so that all may behold the wondrous Dharma of the Numinous Treasure. You, possessing a virtuous heart, have come to seek refuge in the Dharma Gate. This is due to your past lives across ten thousand kalpas, wherein you already revered the Utmost Perfected. Your merit is complete, your virtue fulfilled, enabling your rebirth in the Dao-world at this time of flourishing Dharma.

Now, I shall expound for you the *Ten Sections of Sublime Sutras on Resolving Obstructions*, that you may deliver the multitudes of the Ten Directions—celestial and human alike. Apply yourself diligently and take heed, lest you be swayed by demonic words."

The Dao declared:
"The causes and conditions of birth and death, the revolving of blessings and vows—none arise apart from the body. The human body is difficult to obtain, the Dao-world difficult to encounter, the sutras difficult to attain, and the decisive teachings difficult to hear. Why, then, do I unfold the profound purport and expound the essential words?

Moved by compassion for the beings of the Ten Directions who, upon receiving birth, cannot preserve and deliver their bodies, dwell long in suffering and affliction, willingly tread the path of transgression, and revolve through the Five Realms—none awakening—I broadly illuminate the Dharma teachings to guide the ignorant and benighted. Thus, all celestial and human beings may enter the Gate of the Supreme Orthodox and Perfected, universally delivering all who are born into this world. By virtue of their past karmic connections, the perfected ones shall all be enabled to transcend.

I have received the ancient sutras of the Original Beginning’s true scriptures, expounding the Dharma to deliver the world for ten thousand kalpas. I shall return to the Primordial Profound Joy Heaven. After this world passes into the Five Turbidities, when the mandate of destiny is obstructed, whether male or female, they shall not behold the luminous teachings. They will abide perpetually in the evil destinies, their lifespans devoid of opportunity, beset by sorrow and torment, enduring unjust suffering. Born and dying of themselves, they revolve through the Five Realms, falling into the Three Wretched Paths and the Eight Difficulties. Calamities and retributions pursue one another endlessly, and in the separation of birth and death, there is no distinction of noble or base—truly a cause for grieving the heart.

Now, I expound these essential teachings to deliver those who can be delivered. You must rectify your mind and attentively receive my words."

Then, having received the talismanic instructions, Long Ci bowed his head to the ground, prostrate in reverent acceptance of the teachings.

The Dao declared: "You who receive the Great Precepts of the Numinous Treasure must rise and face north, your entire body prostrated upon the earth, paying homage to the ten directions. Then, turn eastward and listen in prostration to the Ten Precepts:

First: Let your heart be free of malice and envy, without the hidden thieves of yin. Guard your speech and be mindful of transgressions, keeping your thoughts fixed upon the Dharma.

Second: Uphold benevolence and refrain from killing; show compassion and succor all living beings. Let your kindness and love extend broadly to save all, bestowing moisture upon all things.

Third: Maintain chastity and yield to righteousness; neither lust nor steal. Constantly cultivate good thoughts, diminishing yourself to aid others.

Fourth: Be free of sensuality and desire; let your heart not wander. Preserve purity and caution, ensuring your conduct remains unstained.

Fifth: Let your mouth be free of evil speech; your words neither ornate nor deceitful. Be loyal and upright within and without, avoiding transgressions of the mouth.

Sixth: Abstain from wine and regulate your conduct, harmonizing your qi and nature. Let your spirit not be harmed, and refrain from all evils.

Seventh: Do not envy those who surpass you or contend for fame and merit. In all matters, yield and retreat, delivering others before yourself.

Eighth: Do not criticize the scriptures or slander the sacred texts. Apply your heart to upholding the Dharma, ever as though standing before the gods.

Ninth: Do not engage in quarrels or disputes, nor pass judgment on the four classes of beings. Let neither gods nor humans bear resentment, nor your spirit and qi be harmed.

Tenth: In all actions and undertakings, maintain equanimity and a unified heart. Let harmony prevail between humans and gods, and let this be your constant practice.

By cultivating and upholding these pure precepts, you shall ever align with the heart of Heaven. Constantly practice great compassion, vowing to universally deliver all from this world of suffering. With reverence for the teachings, never grow lax. Better to die upholding goodness than to live in evil.

Through unwavering practice, you may extricate yourself from the Five Realms and avoid the Three Wretched Paths. You shall be protected by all heavens, revered by the myriad spirits, and by maintaining a perpetual fast and upholding the precepts, you shall naturally attain deliverance from the world."

The Dao continued: "The Numinous Treasure reveals the Dharma to deliver beings, and there are twelve ways by which one may attain deliverance from the world. You should follow them, and by so doing, you shall naturally attain uprightness and ultimately enter the realm of non-action.

First: Upon witnessing the true scriptures emerge to deliver all beings, arouse the intention for the Dao, and vow that in future lives you may ascend to the rank of Great Sage.

Second: Constantly practice a compassionate heart, wishing that all beings may behold the Dharma, be broadly and universally delivered, without obstruction or hindrance.

Third: Delight in the scriptures and teachings, deeply and extensively studying them. Let your will be firm and your understanding clear, enlightening the ignorant and benighted.

Fourth: Reverently receive the instructions of your teacher, broadly exhorting and transforming others, guiding them into the Dharma gate, and distancing them from blind paths.

Fifth: Have faith in and turn toward the profound and wondrous, reverently upholding the scriptures and their instructions. Recite them morning and evening without weariness or slackening.

Sixth: Do not pursue glory and splendor, severing worldly entanglements. Focus your heart and stabilize your will, directing all your endeavors toward the Dharma.

Seventh: Diligently recite the great scriptures, wishing for all beings, and broadly build bridges for them, creating karmic conditions for future lives.

Eighth: Constantly cultivate a good heart, neither perverse nor false, without envy, harm, evil, or malice.

Ninth: Wherever you are born, may you always encounter a sagely age, and may the teachings of the Numinous Treasure Dharma never be interrupted.

Tenth: Purify your body and uphold the precepts; perform fasts and establish merit. Broadly save all living beings, that all may attain deliverance.

Eleventh: Extensively study and broadly disseminate the scriptures and Dharma, preparing for the company of gods and humans, universally guiding and delivering all.

Twelfth: Constantly encounter enlightened teachers life after life, receiving their teachings and propagating them, delivering countless beings.

These are the Twelve Wondrous Instructions. By cultivating these good thoughts, you shall life after life behold the sacred texts, form affinities with the Dao, and be recognized as friends by all heavens. You shall stride alone through the Three Realms, unobstructed, forever departing from the Three Wretched Paths, the Five Realms, and the Eight Difficulties. Divine luminaries shall respect and protect you; earthly deities shall surround and guard you. Your gates and households shall be pure and solemn, and the myriad calamities shall not encroach. All your aspirations and vows, through the recitation of this scripture, shall be fulfilled.

This good man or good woman, with a sincere heart and reverent devotion, shall belong to the Great Sages of the Ten Directions, penetrating the natural and spontaneously attaining the ability to traverse water and fire, transform their form and shadow, and ascend to the Upper Clarity. Before their merit is complete and they should pass through extinction, they shall be welcomed by the Five Emperors and ascend directly to the heavenly palaces, bypassing Mount Tai. They shall be transformed and born into noble lineages, encountering the scriptures and the Dao, and thus attain deliverance from the world."

The Dao addressed Long Ci: "Diligently practice and attentively receive these teachings; do not grow remiss."

Long Ci bowed his head to the ground, prostrate in acceptance of the precepts.

The Dao declared: "The true scriptures and incantations expound the supreme Dharma for deliverance. The ancient texts are profound and abstruse, difficult to fathom in detail, and later scholars find them hard to apply. Therefore, I have annotated them in both elevated and plain styles to resolve obscurities. The jade instructions and true essentials elucidate the ancient texts, their subtle words and wondrous mysteries revered by all heavens. Upon reciting these jade chapters, the ten directions echo them from afar. In the heavens above, rituals are established; gods and demons are subdued, and ghosts and malevolent spirits are extinguished.

Fifty jade youths and fifty jade maidens attend the scriptures. From former lives through ten thousand kalpas, their names have been inscribed in the Supreme Mystery, yet they have not beheld these jade texts. Through the convergence of karmic conditions and encounters, they may attain immortality as divine transcendents. Their blessings extend to nine generations of ancestors, and their grace flows to distant descendants, all delivered from the Three Wretched Paths, the Five Realms, and the Eight Difficulties. This scripture is most noble and wondrous beyond compare."

**The Numinous Treasure’s Method for the Water Emperor to Erase Sin Tablets**

Numinous Treasure [Name] Emperor, Master [Name], aged [Number] years, born in the [Number] month, vowing to become a spirit immortal, to attain eternal life without death, and to preserve the Three Origins in unity.

The Nine Mansion Water Emperors, the Twelve River Sources, the gods of the Jiang, He, Huai, and Ji rivers, and the great spirits of the Mingling, beseech the erasure of sin names, that they may be reported to the Nine Heavens. They request to proceed to the Water Palace, conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

In the year of [Celestial Stem and Branch], the [Number] month, the [Number] day of the new moon, at the [Number] hour, the document is proclaimed in [Name] kingdom.

Inscribe this in red upon a silver-wood tablet, wrap the tablet in blue paper, bind it with blue silk, and have a golden dragon carry the tablet to cast it into the depths of the Three Rivers. First, use nine golden clasps, attaching them to the tablet before sinking it; thereafter, no further offerings are required.

When casting the tablet, face north, click your teeth three times, and recite the tablet’s incantation, saying:

The Primordial Five Elders, the Most High and Revered Lord, the Perfected of the Ten Directions, the Divine Immortals of Mount Taihua—your red-script decrees resound where none is hidden. Ascending to govern the Nine Heavens, we beseech the descent of jade texts. The sun, moon, and five stars; the Seven Origins of the Northern Dipper; the Five Marchmounts at the center; the sacred mountains of the four quarters; the rivers and seas below; the Twelve Fountainheads; the Water Lords of the Nine Palaces; and the great spirits of the Mingling—today we make this supreme declaration. May all ten thousand vows be laid bare: we request to cast this jade tablet, beseeching the erasure of sin names. For our thousandfold and myriad ancestors, the nine clans and all kin—whose sins have entwined and stained even our own selves—may all be universally expunged, their roots of transgression severed and annihilated. Record their names in the Water Palace, proclaim them before the Lord on High. May our seven generations of fathers and mothers depart from the Eight Difficulties, ascend to the Nine Heavens, and be clothed and fed by nature itself. As our sins dissolve and scatter, may the myriad spirits all bear witness. We entreat with golden clasps to enlighten the Water Officials. Let this petition be thus conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

*Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Red-Script Jade Formula Scripture, Scroll One*
*The Primordial Numinous Treasure’s Method for Petitioning the Five Marchmounts and Sacred Mountains to Remove Sins and Seek Immortality*

Numinous Treasure [Name] Emperor, Master [Name], aged [Number] years, born in the [Number] month, life governed by [Name] Emperor, name registered at Mount Tai, yearns for divinity and immortality, to attain eternal life and transcend the world, to soar through the Supreme Clarity.

May the Perfected of the Five Marchmounts, most divine and numinous, beseech the erasure of sin records, that they may be reported to the Nine Heavens. We request to proceed to the sacred mountains, conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

In the year of [Celestial Stem and Branch], the [Number] month, the [Number] day of the new moon, at the [Number] hour, the document is proclaimed at [Name] Marchmount.

Inscribe this in red upon a silver-wood tablet, wrap the tablet in blue paper, bind it with blue silk, attach nine golden clasps, and have a golden dragon bear the tablet to bury it at the Marchmount of one’s life destiny, all in accordance with the method above.

At the Marchmount of one’s life destiny, face east, click the teeth nine times, and upon completing the recitation of the tablet’s text, recite the incantation, saying:

Mystic and supreme, luminous and clear, the Primordial oversees the Perfected. The Five Elders of the Lord on High, red-script cinnabar texts—foundation of heaven and earth, governing the Three Origins—gather qi and summon assemblies, hastening the descent of immortals. This exalted talismanic decree universally proclaims to the Ten Heavens, the sun, moon, and stellar lodges, the Five Marchmounts and sacred mountains, all above the earth and below the heavens, the great spirits of the Mingling, the Overseers of Life and Keepers of Records. Open the Three Southern Gates, receive the jade tablet, inscribe names upon the cinnabar register, erase the records of sins. Promote them to serve as imperial ministers. May the thousandfold and myriad ancestors, the nine clans and all kin, all attain liberation; may the Five Paths and Eight Difficulties be departed from, the Three Evils left behind. May souls ascend to the Nine Heavens, life and death be transcended, and all endure through ten thousand kalpas. Today we make this supreme declaration; may the myriad spirits all bear witness. We entreat with golden clasps to ally with the Perfected Officials. Let this petition be thus conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

*The Primordial Numinous Treasure’s Method for Petitioning the Earth Sovereigns of the Nine Lands to Eradicate Sin Names and Seek Immortality*

Numinous Treasure [Name] Emperor, Master [Name], aged [Number] years, born in the [Number] month, life registered in the Nine Heavens, governed by the Eastern Dipper, yearns for divinity and immortality, to attain eternal life and transcend the world, to soar through the Supreme Clarity.

May the August Yellow Deities of the Nine Lands, the Earth Sovereigns of the Central Palace, beseech the erasure of sin records, that they may be inscribed upon the Great Mystery. We request to proceed to the Central Palace, to cast the tablet and record names. Let the golden clasps serve as our pledge, conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

In the year of [Celestial Stem and Branch], the [Number] month, the [Number] day of the new moon, at the [Number] hour, the document is proclaimed in the central precinct of [Name] commandery and county.

Inscribe this in red upon a silver-wood tablet, wrap the tablet in blue paper, bind it with blue silk, attach nine golden clasps, and have a golden dragon bear the tablet to bury it at the central palace of one’s dwelling, all in accordance with the method above.

In the central courtyard, face north, click the teeth twelve times, and upon completing the recitation of the tablet’s text, recite the incantation, saying:

Heaven unfolds, earth extends, the nine qi divide and manifest. The Three Origins unite in harmony, the Ten Directions shine with clarity. The Five Elder Lords on High open the Perfected and govern life. Cinnabar texts and red scripts, the supreme essence of the Primordial—universally proclaimed to the world below, the numinous sovereigns of the Nine Lands. Today we make this supreme declaration; may the ten thousand immortals be destined for life. We vow for our divinity, for our immortality, beseeching to cast our jade names. May the August Sovereign of the Earth Palace eradicate our sins and punishments, present the tablet to the Upper Palace, and inscribe it in the registers of Splendid Azure. May we swiftly attain flight, our spirits harmonizing with heaven and earth. May the nine generations of ancestors and all kin, their decayed bones renewed in glory, ascend in soul to the Southern Palace, transformed in the immortal courts. On this auspicious day, we proclaim our decree; may the myriad spirits all heed. We entreat with golden clasps to manifest our utmost sincerity. Let this petition be thus conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

The Dao declares: If you possess a sincere heart and arouse the intention for the supreme Dao, desiring to deliver all beings—men and women of goodness—from the Three Evils, the Five Paths, and the Eight Difficulties, that they may pass through this wicked age and encounter the Dao, you should cast the Three Origin Jade Tablets on the eight solar terms and the days of the celestial stems and branches. Erase the records of past sins, proclaim names to heaven, performing each act three times. The Three Officials of the Heavens and the Nine Palaces of the Earth will entrust one another, distinguishing all above in heaven. The myriad spirits will reverently protect, the Five Emperors will attend and guard, the administrators of the Three Realms will receive and welcome. Gates and doors will be ordered and solemn; the earthly deities below and the heavenly spirits above, the sun and moon, will come to pay homage. The thousand demons and myriad spirits dare not rashly interfere. If your aspirations are firm and pure, all vows will be fulfilled. Your seven generations of fathers and mothers will immediately be liberated from the Three Paths and Five Sufferings, ascending to the heavenly palaces. Life and death will be blessed, and retribution will correspond accordingly. The Three Officials and Nine Palaces record the merits and transgressions of people—this principle is most clear. Through generations of karmic conditions, not a hair’s breadth will be lacking. You must earnestly uphold and practice this, never growing lax, lest demons corrupt your true nature.

*Eastern Nine Qi Azure Heaven True Script Red-Script Jade Formula*

The Nine Qi of the East, the August Azure Heaven, where verdant mists rise in layered ranks. Within dwells an Elder who oversees the registers and charts, gathering qi to descend immortals.

Its twenty-four characters govern the summoning of the Nine Heavenly Lords on High and the verification of the registers of divine immortals.

Students of the immortal Dao should, on their life-destiny days, the days of the celestial stems and branches, and the day of the Beginning of Spring, inscribe the twenty-four characters in blue upon a white thornwood tablet, recording their names and the year and month below, and cast it at the sacred Marchmount. After nine years, the immortal officials will arrive, dispatching nine jade-maidens with azure waists, and you will attain flight as an immortal.

The Year Star aids the liver, Horn and Neck guard the true,
Root and Chamber, Heart and Tail—four seasons revolve in turn,
Winnow governs the seven luminaries, the Dipper’s bright wheel aligns,
Receiving qi to seize the false, sweeping away calamitous hosts.

Its thirty-two characters command the summoning of the celestial asterisms and rectify the celestial divisions.
For all celestial disasters where asterisms deviate from their courses, inscribe the thirty-two characters in vermilion upon blue paper, expose it in the central courtyard for nine days and nine nights, and each evening recite the separate incantation as prescribed. Then burn it with fire and scatter the ashes into the azure smoke.
Also carve the thirty-two characters upon blue stone and bury it in the east; celestial disasters will vanish of themselves, and the asterisms will return to their proper positions.

The Eastern Mountain Spirit Ruan commands the summoning of the Nine Heavens,
With vermilion-script talismanic writs that convene the Feng Mountain assembly.
Eastern demons deliver ghosts—what is slain knows no reprieve,
All hasten to the Wooden Palace; none dare delay.

Its thirty-two characters govern the subjugation of demonic spirits and rectify the qi of the Nine Heavens.
To perform this method, inscribe in vermilion upon a blue thornwood tablet, face the northeast with the text, and recite the separate incantation three times. Ghosts will bind their forms of their own accord, and myriad demons will perish; practice this with utmost sincerity.

Below, it controls the Eastern River and the deities of the Brine Sea.
When great kalpas bring flood disasters, dragons bear the burden,
The Water Palace opens paths, a thousand thoroughfares emerge.
The vermilion writ of the Supreme Lord operates without hindrance through wind and fire.

Its thirty-two characters govern the subjugation of the Eastern Sea’s Water Thearch and the reckoning of great kalpa celestial disasters, as well as the summoning of dragons and water deities.
When encountering flood disasters or wishing to cross great waters, inscribe the thirty-two characters in yellow upon blue paper, recite the separate incantation, and cast it into the water. You will cross safely of your own accord, dragons will bear you, the River Earl will receive you, and the waters will become passable.

In total, one hundred twenty characters—all are the spontaneous writings of the Primordial Beginning, also called the *Precious Writ of Spirit-Generating Perfected Wonder*, or the *Eight Mightful Writs of the Eastern Mountain Spirit Incantation*.

The Vermilion Writ of the Southern Three Qi’s Cinnabar Heaven, Vermilion-Script Jade Formula

The Southern Cinnabar Heaven, the Vermilion Thearch’s Jade Hall,
Within dwells a great spirit named the Vermilion Sovereign.
Flaming mists rise upward, the three qi surge with radiance,
Divine immortals receive their mandates, responding to the Great Yang’s movement.

Its thirty-two characters govern the registers of the Nine Heavens’ divine immortals and the names of the asterisms.
Students of the immortal Dao should, on their life-destiny days, the days of the celestial stems and branches, and the day of the Beginning of Summer, inscribe the thirty-two characters in vermilion upon a white thornwood tablet, record their names and the year and month below, and cast it at the sacred Marchmount. After nine years, the immortal officials will arrive, dispatching three Jade Maidens of the Vermilion Mound, and you will attain flight as an immortal.

Mars aids the heart, Well and Ghost guard the chambers,
Willow, Star, Spread, and Wing—commanding the four quarters,
Chariot governs the seven lodgings, revolving the celestial constant.
Summoning and hastening assemblies, rectifying the Dao’s courier routes,
The vermilion writ commands the numinous.

Its thirty-six characters command the summoning of the asterism officials, illuminating the degrees and rectifying the celestial divisions.
When southern asterisms deviate from their courses, bringing various disasters and anomalies, inscribe in vermilion upon blue paper, expose it in the central courtyard for three days and three nights, facing south each evening. Follow the separate incantation method, then burn the text with fire and scatter the ashes into the azure smoke.
Also carve the thirty-six characters upon red stone and bury it in the south; celestial disasters will vanish of their own accord, and the asterisms will return to their proper positions.

Subjugating the Feng Mountain of the north, binding and dispatching demonic lineages,
The talismanic teachings execute judgment, clearly listing the sources of transgressions.
The Southern Mountain incantation extinguishes and subdues the myriad thousands,
Demonic hordes are annihilated, all trials are shattered and destroyed.

Its thirty-two characters govern the control of the northern Feng’s true ghostly qi.
To perform this method, inscribe in yellow upon a red thornwood tablet, face north with the text, and recite the separate incantation.
After performing this method three times, ghostly essences will perish of themselves, and myriad demons will bind their forms; practice this with utmost sincerity.

The Southern River’s Water Thearch, the Great Earl Dragon King,
The divine incantation flows forth, universally sweeping away inauspiciousness.
Flood disasters and flying calamities are halted, dragons are summoned,
Waterways are opened and cleared, a thousand paths and ten thousand passages emerge.
Should any dare to test this, they will be seized and sent to the Fire Palace.
None disobey the commands of the vermilion writ.

Its forty-eight characters govern the subjugation of the Southern Sea’s Water Thearch.
When the great kalpa turns and floods spread in all directions, for the summoning of dragons and water deities:
When encountering such disasters or wishing to cross great waters, inscribe the forty-eight characters in yellow upon blue paper, recite the separate incantation, and cast it into the water. You will cross safely of your own accord, and the water officials will receive you.

In total, one hundred forty-eight characters—all are the spontaneous writings of the Southern Cloud’s *Precious Numinous Flourishing Yang Cinnabar Spirit Perfected Elder Lord*, also called the *Nine Heavens’ Divine Incantation* or the *Eight Mightful Writs of the Vermilion Heaven*.

The Vermilion Writ of the Central Yellow Heaven, Vermilion-Script Jade Formula

The Central Yellow Heaven, sovereign of all numina,
The Yellow Supreme Celestial Origin, first-born of the Five Elders,
The August Yellow One of the Center, gathering qi to oversee the true,
Commanding the host of immortals, presiding over the mysterious charts,
The jade writs of the asterisms, hastening the ascent of the supreme qi,
Universally proclaiming to the myriad spirits.

Its forty characters govern the jade tablets of the divine immortals’ asterism names, all converging in the immortal qi.
Students of the immortal Dao should, on their life-destiny days, the days of the celestial stems and branches, the days of the Spring Equinox and Summer Solstice, inscribe the forty characters in yellow upon a white thornwood tablet, record their names and the year and month below, and cast it at the sacred Marchmount. After nine years, the immortal officials will arrive, dispatching twelve Jade Maidens of the Yellow Simplicity, and you will attain divine immortality.

Saturn aids the spleen, revolving the northern origin’s degrees,
The Demon-Catcher governs the false, severing evil at its root,
@@@@, sweeping away filth and dispelling miasmas,
The Demon-Queller rectifies the Mysterious Dipper, illuminating the celestial passes,
The Nine Heavens’ talismanic writs are transmitted by the Golden Horse couriers.

Its forty characters govern the subjugation of the asterism officials and the rectification of the celestial degrees.
For all deviations of the central asterisms that give rise to various disasters and anomalies, inscribe the forty characters in vermilion upon blue paper, expose it in the central courtyard for twelve days and twelve nights, facing the center each evening. Follow the separate incantation method, then burn the text with fire and scatter the ashes into the azure smoke.
Also carve the forty characters upon yellow stone and bury it in the center; celestial disasters will vanish of their own accord, and the asterisms will return to their proper positions.

The [missing character] subdues the Northern Thearch, sealing the Ghost Gate,
Severing inauspicious omens so none may stand before it.
Its sixteen characters govern the subjugation of the Northern Thearch and the rectification of celestial qi, restraining ghostly essences.
To perform this method, inscribe the sixteen characters in white upon a yellow wooden tablet, direct the text toward the northeast, and follow the separate incantation.
Thrice performing this method, ghostly essences will vanish of their own accord, celestial demons will be bound in form—proceed with focused intent.

The Central Mountain Divine Incantation summons dragons to ascend the clouds,
Commands the confluence of the Yellow River, the nine rivers’ sources,
Permitting no negligence or indulgence, discerning good and evil,
A thousand demons and ten thousand treacheries stand before the Thearch,
None dare test their fate—scorched by the blazing sun,
Vermilion script and jade characters proclaimed for all to hear.
Its forty-eight characters govern the subjugation of the Central Sea’s Water Thearch and the four sources’ waters,
The reckoning of surging flood disasters, and the summoning of water spirits and dragons.
To pass through the calamity of floods or cross great waters,
Inscribe the forty-eight characters in yellow upon blue paper, follow the separate incantation, and cast it into the water—
You will safely traverse, and the water officials will receive you.

Together, these one hundred forty-four characters are the Central Jade Treasure’s Primordial Numinous Elder Lord’s spontaneous script,
Also called the *Precious Kalpa Cavern-Pure Nine Heavens Numinous Writ*, the *Yellow Thearch’s Mighty Incantation*, or the *Yellow Thearch’s Potent Talismanic Text*.

**Western Heavens’ Seven Qi: Azure Heaven’s Vermilion Script and Jade Formula**

The Western Azure Heaven, White Thearch’s seven gates,
Golden numina gleam resplendent, Taihua’s ethereal mist flows,
White stones towering, seven qi swirling,
Above abides the Primordial Elder Great Spirit,
Overseeing lung qi, governing the nine heavens’ reckoning,
Verifying and fixing the registers, commanding the ascent of immortals.
Its forty-eight characters govern the summoning of immortal qi.
Students of the Dao should, on their natal day, the first *jiazi*, or the day of Autumn’s Beginning,
Inscribe the forty-eight characters in white upon a white tablet, record their name and date beneath, and cast it upon a sacred mountain’s peak.
After nine years, the immortal officials will arrive, dispatching seven Azure Jade Maidens—
You will attain the body of a divine immortal.

Tai Bai inspects the lungs, Kui and Lou guard the hun-soul,
Wei, Mao, Bi, and Zi govern the seven passes,

The *Lower Scroll of the Wondrous Scripture of the Vermilion Script and Jade Formulae of the Numinous Treasure of the Cavernous Mystery*

The Primordial Thearch, the Numinous Treasure Venerable Divinity, the Ten Directions’ Great Sages, and the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct customarily visit the Southern Thearch’s Cavernous Yang Palace thrice yearly to audit the celestial origins, reckon the kalpas’ conjunctions, and unveil the Vermilion Script of the Five Elders’ True Text, sealing it upon jade tablets to bestow upon the Five Thearchs.

The Five *Qi* of the Primordial Thearch regularly ascend at cock’s crow to convene at the Numinous Treasure’s Jade Capital and the Mysterious Metropolis’ Upper Palace. As the yang light first brightens, it scatters the radiance of the Primordial Thearch, surveying the myriad heavens. Its *qi* is lush and luxuriant, its brilliance warm and pervasive, its essence like moonlit pearls, its light like purple clouds. The Five *Qi* revolve like a chariot’s wheel, ascending to govern the gates of the Nine Heavens, securing the numinous mountains of the Five Thearchs in the center, and descending to infuse the roots of the Five *Qi* within the scholars. The assembly of sages and Perfected of Great Wisdom in the Upper Palace all partake of its radiance at that hour, inhaling its essence, aligning with heaven to attain boundlessness.

The Most High Dao Lord requested the transcription of this text to transmit it to the utmost perfected. According to the Mysterious Regulations of the Numinous Treasure, it is transmitted once every forty thousand kalpas. Thus, the Numinous Treasure’s illumination emerges to deliver beings through the Dharma.

The Ten Directions’ Great Sage Venerable Divinities and the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct convened together at the Three Primes’ Cavern Chamber on the Crimson Glow’s Slope in the Southern Garden, sealing the jade tablets. The host of perfected attended in assembly, with fragrant flowers, ritual music, and fifty million in attendance. The True Text shone resplendently, its luminosity penetrating within and without. The Five *Qi* surveyed the radiance, illuminating all directions. Cloudscapes were clear and bright, like the moon amidst stars, their wondrous forms and manifold excellences beyond measure.

At that time, in the Northern Chamber, there was a diligent and worthy man named Wang Fudu. He had a daughter named Aqiuceng, aged sixteen, who was then in the bathhouse, washing herself with fragrant water. She saw a golden light curving and shining, suspecting something unusual. She exited the chamber, climbed the wall, and gazing southward, beheld the Perfected of the Dao. Their divine essence blazed brilliantly, their countenance and luminosity outshone the sun. The girl rejoiced in her heart, clasped her hands in salutation, and called out from afar: “My name is Qiuceng. Today, I am fortunate to encounter this assembly, to behold the Heavenly Venerable, and to return my being to the Heaven within the Heavens of the Ten Directions. I beseech the precepts, to uphold and follow the Dharma texts, to eradicate all evil roots, to swiftly attain rebirth, to transform into a male form, and after ten thousand kalpas, to aspire to become a flying immortal.”

The Five Thearchs’ Demon Kings, seeing the girl make such a great vow, feared she might transcend their realm. They transformed into five elderly thearchs and approached the girl, saying: “We have received the mandate of the Venerable Divinities of the Ten Directions to convey to you the regulations of the Numinous Treasure’s Dharma. Our Dao is now spreading, and its Dharma promotes benevolence and love, with filial piety as its foundation. We have heard that your father intended to marry you off, having already accepted another’s proposal, which cannot be revoked. You should first comply with this, fulfill your human duties, and complete your rites and teachings. Thereafter, you may offer yourself. Heaven observes your heart; if you defy your father, there will be no means for the immortals to deliver you.”

The girl replied to the demons: “In my past life, I was unfortunate, lacking karmic conditions, and my merits and virtues were insufficient, resulting in my rebirth as a woman. From dawn to dusk, I repent and reflect, vowing to maintain a single heart, my resolve firm and arising naturally. My life comes from my parents, but my destiny lies with the Ten Heavens. Though I sincerely defy my father’s teachings, it is not as you say.” The demons, seeing the girl’s steadfast heart and upright conduct, could not sway her, and thus retreated.

Qiuceng declared: “The Dao is lofty and remote, and I have no means to attain it. I shall gather firewood, climb the wall, and burn my body, hoping that my form may become flying ashes, carried by the wind to descend before the Dao.” Thereupon, the fire ignited. Qiuceng clasped her hands toward heaven and said: “Venerable Ones of the Ten Directions’ Boundless Heavens, today I return my form to the Heaven within the Heavens. May I attain timely liberation, to disperse like dust.” She then cast herself into the fire. Suddenly, she felt no attachment, her body as if treading empty space. In an instant, she saw her female form transform into a male, who proceeded directly before the Dao and there received the precepts.

The Primordial Thearch then commanded the Venerable Divinity of the Southern Culmen to be the girl’s master, transmitting to her the True Text. He assigned three hundred Jade Maidens of Great Florescence and three hundred Jade Lads of Golden Dawn, all adorned with the thirty-two marks, their brilliance illuminating the girl’s body. The Dao addressed the Venerable Divinity of the Southern Culmen: “This girl, in her past life, had already revered the Numinous Treasure. After ten thousand kalpas of rebirth, she has now been reborn among humans. Upon witnessing my revelation of the Dharma, she immediately attained transformation of form. She shall further deliver ninety-nine thousand beings before attaining the rank of Great Perfected Divinity.”

At that time, all beings—whether male or female—awakened to the intent of the True Dao, none failing to diligently uphold the fasts and precepts, cultivate and follow the Numinous Treasure. With utmost aspiration in their crowns, all attained deliverance from the world.

The Dao addressed Aqiuceng: “The Venerable Divinity of the Southern Culmen was once also a woman, born in the world of Chanli within the Crimson Brightness Heaven. She performed great merits, praised by all heavens. Before her Dao could be accomplished, she encountered the kalpa of fire, when heaven and earth exchanged positions, and she was among those cast aside. The Southern Culmen was moved by her utmost sincerity, and the Vermilion Palace inscribed her purple name. Her form was transformed within the womb of the Primordial Lady. After one kalpa, she was reborn as a male, dwelling in the Seven-Colored Jeweled Grove of the Upper Bright Pearl Palace in the Southern Vermilion Cavernous Yang. She studied under the Red Thearch’s Brahma Treasure and the Perfected Elder of the Vermilion Yang of the Flourishing Sun. Having mastered the Vermilion Script, she ascended to the rank of the Southern Culmen.”

In your former life, you dwelled with the Southern Culmen in the world of Chanli, where beneath the cypress grove of Vermilion Yang, you together awakened the intent for the Dao. At that time, the Southern Culmen bore the surname Huang and the style Duming. He took your right hand, and together you inscribed red stone, recording your names in the Southern Palace. Your brushstrokes were also inscribed upon the southern veranda, and they remain there to this day—the stone inscriptions still endure. Do you recall this?

Qiu Zeng’s heart awakened, and lowering his gaze, he beheld the carved script on the southern wall where the Southern Culmen resided: *"On the first day of the seventh month in the year Tai Jia, Huang Duming and A Qiu Zeng together vowed beneath the cypress grove of Vermilion Yang."* Twenty-three characters in all, each distinct and clear. Yet scarcely had he recalled this when suddenly three kalpas of heaven and earth had passed, and now he was reborn into the world of Lingbao.

The Dao spoke to Qiu Zeng: "Now that you have taken the Southern Culmen as your master, is this not exalted? All this arises from the karmic conditions of your past lives. You must diligently cultivate the supreme practice, broadly deliver heaven and humanity, and when your merits are complete and your virtue perfected, you shall naturally ascend to the rank of Perfected, transcend the Three Clarities, swiftly traverse the Nine Radiant Mists, and attend the court of the Great Mystery."

Qiu Zeng bowed his head before the Dao: "In my former life, I was fortunate to be born into the world of the Dao, encountering the Heavenly Perfected. Though I dwelt in the hidden chamber, my form reeked and my bones were foul, yet within the sacred altar my spirit was awakened, my heart responding beyond the body. I cast aside my remains and entrusted my life, hoping for even the slightest salvation. The Most High’s mysterious gaze turned to deliver me—having transformed my form, I now attend the Heavenly Worthy, and further, by the grace of the Southern Culmen, I have received the teachings of a master. Joy and awe fill my heart, yet I know not how to express them. I only pray for your fulfillment, illuminating what I have never heard, and bestowing upon me the jade instructions and treasured mysteries."

The Most High Dao Lord commanded the Vermilion Thearch’s numinous youth to open the nine-frost jade case and the seven-colored treasury, bringing forth two scrolls of the *Lingbao Vermilion Script Jade Instructions*, which he entrusted to the Southern Culmen to transmit to Qiu Zeng in accordance with their covenant. The assembled immortals witnessed the pact and all proclaimed its goodness.

**Jade Instructions of the Primordial Vermilion Script: Ingesting the Green Molar and Guiding the Qi of the Ninefold Azure Heaven**

The *Five Chapters of the Primordial Vermilion Script* emerged within the Great Void before the radiance of heaven and earth, before the dawn of creation. The five colors divided and shone, illuminating the five directions, appointing the Five Thearchs, and guiding yin and yang. They reverse the myriad kalpas to renew themselves, safeguarding the Five Molars in their countenance—truly the wondrous instructions of Lingbao, the ancestral teaching of the myriad sages.

**Method for Cultivating the Green Molar and Guiding the Qi of the Ninefold Azure Heaven of the East:**
On the day of *Lichun*, at cock’s crow, enter your chamber, face east, and bow nine times. Sit upright and click your teeth nine times. Visualize the Eastern Azure Treasure Flower Grove and the Azure Numinous Origin Elder Lord, whose surname is Men, personal name Kaiming, and style Lingweiyang. His form is nine inches tall, crowned with a cyan essence-jade coronet, clad in a ninefold qi azure feathered flying robe. He rides a chariot drawn by green dragons, bearing a quail banner, attended by ninety thousand officials of Jia-Yi and the Dark Elders, descending from the Nine Qi Azure Heaven into your chamber.

In an instant, azure qi is born, billowing like layered clouds, bathing your form. It enters through your mouth and descends directly into the liver palace. Then visualize the virtue of wood, shining brilliantly in the east, its light illuminating your body until all is distinct.

When finished, open your eyes and recite the incantation while looking upward:
*"Nine Qi Azure Heaven, primordial essence of the Primordial Beginning,
August Elder Divine Lord, clad in azure feathers,
Presiding over the celestial palace, shining like Jupiter,
Scattering radiance and flowing fragrance, refining my form.
Above, I feast on dawn’s mist; below, I guide the essence of wood.
I fortify and nourish the Green Molar, preserving decaying years.
My liver palace overflows, jade mushrooms sprout naturally.
Reversing a hundred million kalpas, my complexion returns to youth.
The Five Qi harmonize, heaven and earth endure together."*

When finished, guide the azure qi and swallow it nine times, then ingest the twelve characters of the Eastern Vermilion Script Jade Text.

These twelve characters are the names of the Nine Qi Azure Heaven. Guide the qi of the Azure Thearch and ingest the Green Molar—write them in vermilion on white paper, visualize them, then swallow them whole. The Nine Qi will descend of their own accord, the Azure Thearch will manifest at the sound of your voice, the Green Molar will be fortified in the Eastern Peak, and jade mushrooms will sprout in your liver palace.

Place the numinous youth in vigil beside your sleeping quarters, with azure-clad attendants serving for nine years. Through accumulated resonance and transformation, you will swiftly attain immortality and transcend the world, standing unshaken for ten thousand kalpas.

At cock’s crow, when the yang light first divides, face east and click your teeth nine times. Rub your palms until warm, then wipe your face nine times. Recite the incantation while looking upward:
*"Eastern Green Molar, ingesting the Green Molar,
Drinking the morning’s blossoms."*

When finished, use your tongue to stroke the outer edge of your upper teeth three times, then lick your lips three times, filling your mouth with Jade Spring and swallowing it three times. Guide the azure qi nine times to settle within your liver. This completes the method.

*Five Qi of the Mysterious Heavens, Cavern Yin Solitary Obscurity, Five Numinous Dark Elder, Black Thearch; Mysterious Nourishment Five Qi Heavenly Lords; Supreme Numinous Lords; Night-Shining Jade Maidens; Northern Precinct’s Numinous Officials—[I,] Perfected of the Thearch [Name], [Your Name], bow twice before the five incenses, prostrate, and humbly invite you to descend through the Yin Birth Vast Numinous Gate.*

**Invocation for the Host of Perfected:**
*Nine Heavens’ Host of Numinous Ones, Perfected of the Five Peaks and Numinous Mountains; Three Offices and Nine Bureaus of the Rivers and Four Waterways; Numinous Officials, Earth Immortals, Jade Maidens; Flying Immortals of the Five Peaks, Divine Immortals, and all Perfected Officials—[I,] Perfected of the Thearch [Name], [Your Name], bow twice before the five incenses, prostrate, and humbly invite you.*

Descend through the Primordial Yellow High Morning Gate on the right. Place the five vermilion-written tablets beneath the five incense flames. After reading each tablet, invite one Thearch, bow twice, and deposit the tablet, proceeding in order according to the rite. The final tablet should be positioned to the right of the center. Once the Celestial Officials have all been sent off, bury the tablets in the five directions of the mountain. This is the ancient canon of the Mysterious Capital; the pattern must not be altered, lest the Heavenly Perfected fail to descend and misfortune befall the omen.

After arranging the tablets, modulate your voice and declare of your own accord:
*On the [day] of the [month] of the [year], [Your Name], Perfected of the Thearch of [Place], aged [number] years, having received on the [day] of the [month] of the [year] from [Name], Perfected of the [Peak] Peak, the Five Elder Perfected Writs of the Most High Numinous Treasure—Five Chapters of the Spontaneous Vermilion Script and Mandates—now, in reverent accordance with the ancient canon and ritual code of the Mysterious Capital, purify myself with fasting and ablutions, suffuse the divine chamber with incense, and humbly invite the Five Thearch Lords, the Five Thearch Numinous Officials, Perfected Ones, Divine Immortals, and Jade Maidens. With the solemnity of the wild goose and egret, I offer fragrant wine, sweet fruits, and pure sincerity, purifying body and spirit to receive the Most High August Heavenly Worthy. I beseech the dispatch of the Five Body Perfected Officials, the Three Hun and Seven Po, and the Three Palaces’ Perfected Ones to ascend to the Nine Heavens, to the palaces of the Nine Heavens, the Three Heavens, the Five Outer Regions, the Azure Tooth Heaven, the Vermilion Cinnabar Heaven, the Great Thearch’s Mountain, the Central Yellow Heaven, the Bright Stone Heaven, the Mysterious Nourishment Heaven, and the courts of the Five Thearch Perfected Ones of the Eight Directions. May they convey my entreaty, uphold the fast, and observe the rites with empty heart and reverent gaze, that the numinous chariot may turn and briefly descend to [Place], illuminating my sincere devotion. May the Perfected of the Five Talismans descend to partake of this humble offering.*

Conclude with two bows, prostrate for a long while, then rise to kneel. Take the Eastern tablet, read the text, and return it to its place. Again invite the supreme deities. Humbly welcome the descent of:
*The Eastern Numinous Might Azure Thearch Lord, Azure Tooth Nine Qi Heavenly Lord, Most High Perfected King, Azure Waist Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Eastern Precinct.*

Proceed to read the Southern tablet in the same manner. Humbly welcome the descent of:
*The Southern Blazing Might Vermilion Thearch Lord, Vermilion Cinnabar Three Qi Heavenly Lord, Primordial Qi Venerable, Vermilion Palace Great Cinnabar Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Southern Precinct.*

Proceed to read the Central tablet in the same manner. Humbly welcome the descent of:
*The Central Pivot-Embracing Yellow Thearch Lord, Great Thearch Perfected One, Vermilion Child Yellow Court Earth-Aether Granary Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Central Great Thearch’s Court.*

Proceed to read the Western tablet in the same manner. Humbly welcome the descent of:
*The Western Radiant Soul Treasure White Thearch Lord, Bright Stone Seven Qi Grand Master, Most High White Simplicity Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Western Precinct.*

Proceed to read the Northern tablet in the same manner. Humbly welcome the descent of:
*The Northern Concealed Might Black Thearch Lord, Mysterious Nourishment Five Qi Heavenly Lord, Most High Numinous Lord, Night-Shining Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Northern Precinct.*

Proceed to read the tablet for the Host of Numinous Ones in the same manner. Humbly welcome the descent of:
*The Host of Numinous Ones of the Nine Heavens, Perfected Ones of the Five Peaks and Numinous Mountains, Numinous Officials of the Three Offices and Nine Bureaus of the Rivers and Four Waterways, Earth Immortals, Jade Maidens, Flying Immortals of the Five Peaks, Divine Immortals, and all Perfected Officials.*

For each of the six positions of the Five Thearchs and Host of Perfected, bow twice, totaling twelve bows to welcome the Thearchs’ descent. Upon completion, send off the Thearchs, addressing them as *I humbly labor the [Title] Thearch*. Bow twice again, totaling eleven bows. The rite of libation concludes here.

After inviting the Heavenly Perfected, offer wine five times and burn incense, then declare of your own accord:
*I, [Your Name], by fortunate karmic affinity from past lives, have in this kalpa of the Nine Heavens been granted the grace to encounter this luminous era, wherein the Dao and its methods flourish. Thus, this unworthy self has been permitted to partake in the Five Chapters of the Vermilion Script, the Five Talismans, and the Treasure Scriptures. Since my presumptuous receipt of these, I have revered the Supreme Perfected, yearned for divine transcendence, yet my sincerity remains shallow and feeble, unable to move the numinous. I constantly fear my sinful self will sink into the clamor of defilement, drowning in the Nine Springs. Yet the Heavenly Compassion is vast; may it extend to my humble efforts, as I uphold faith and devotion, maintain perpetual fasting, contemplate the divine, cultivate goodness, and aspire to boundless deliverance. Yet my sincerity is narrow and weak, unable to manifest itself. The profound mysteries of the Numinous Writs and the distant majesty of the Heavenly Worthy deter me from presuming to approach. Today, on this auspicious day, I purify body and fast, offering sacrifice to the Five Numinous Ones, Five Elders, Five Thearchs, and all Lords and Venerables. I humbly labor the radiance of the divine, beseeching the Most True Heavenly Worthy to condescend to my lowly state with compassion and reverence. Overwhelmed by the Heavenly Light’s far-reaching gaze, which leaves nothing unseen, I now make this declaration. Following the ancient canon of my former masters, I have pledged in vermilion and ink, observing silence in my practice, daring not to divulge [the teachings]. Only after five times eight [days] may they be revealed, to secure the covenant of transcendence. May the Five Thearchs take heed: I seek the true talismans, scriptures, and charts, with divine attendants to guard and protect my person. Whether ascending mountains, traversing ridges, entering forests, or crossing ravines, may all my pursuits and aspirations be fulfilled. May metal and stone open, and divine spirits commune with me, granting all my wishes. In gathering herbs and fungi, may none remain hidden. May mountain spirits submit and conceal themselves, and all trials leave me unharmed. May tigers, wolves, and venomous stings not afflict me. May Jade Maidens and Divine Lads attend me in all directions. May the Five Thearchs’ numinous qi descend into my form, settling and stabilizing the Five Palaces, sharpening inner and outer senses, enlightening mind and intent, granting foresight of fortune and misfortune. May the Three Corpses vanish, the Nine Worms perish, and my body grow wondrous hairs, hastening my attainment of divine transcendence. I implore the Most August Great Thearch to bestow compassion upon this humble one among the masses, granting my entreaties. Overwhelmed by this vast grace, I dedicate myself to diligent service. With utmost reverence and awe, I prostrate and bow twice.*

Offer wine three more times and prostrate. If there are private matters to declare, present them as you see fit. After stating your wishes, humbly labor the Eastern Numinous Might Azure Thearch, Azure Tooth Nine Qi Heavenly Lord, Most High Perfected King, Azure Waist Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Eastern Precinct to return to their divine chambers. Then scatter incense and bow twice.

Then honor the Southern Numinous Might Vermilion Thearch, Vermilion Tooth Three Qi Heavenly Lord, Primordial Qi Elder, Vermilion Palace Great Cinnabar Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Southern Precinct to return to their divine chambers. Then scatter incense and bow twice.

Next honor the Central Pivot-Containing Yellow Thearch, Supreme Thearch Perfected, Vermilion Child Yellow Court Earth Granary Jade Maiden, Central Yellow Supreme Thearch Officials, and all Numinous Officials to return to their divine chambers. Then scatter incense and bow twice.

Then honor the Western Radiant Soul Treasure White Thearch, Bright Stone Seven Qi Grand Master, Supreme White Simplicity Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Western Precinct to return to their divine chambers. Then scatter incense and bow twice.

Next honor the Northern Concealed Marquis Black Thearch, Mysterious Nourishment Five Qi Heavenly Lord, Supreme Numinous Lord, Night Radiance Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Northern Precinct to return to their divine chambers. Then scatter incense and bow twice.

Then honor the multitude of numinous beings of the Nine Heavens, the Perfected of the Five Marchmounts and Numinous Mountains, the Numinous Officials and Earth Immortals and Jade Maidens of the Three Offices and Nine Treasuries of the rivers and four floods, and the Flying Immortals and Divine Immortals and Perfected Lords of the Five Marchmounts to return to their divine chambers. Then scatter incense and bow twice.

The ritual of offering and libation is now complete. Retrieve the tablets and bury them beneath the five gates, with the tablets of the multitude of Perfected buried beneath the central gate.

This rite is performed once every three years, and three times in nine years, after which it ceases.

---

*Ritual of the Five Chapters of the Numinous Treasure True Writs and Jade Instructions for Transmission from the Mysterious Capital*

The Perfected Master of the Numinous Treasure and Grotto-Mysterious [such-and-such] Marchmount, your humble servant [so-and-so], prostrates and bows twice, kowtows in fear of death, and respectfully addresses the Jade Augustness of the Most High, Utmost Perfected, and Greatly Sagely Venerable Lords, the Five Elders of Primordial Beginning:

Your humble servant, born in the lower world, has encountered karmic conditions in this life. Through the kalpas of the Nine Heavens, I have revolved without cessation. Yet by the accumulated blessings of former lives, my fortune has extended to the present body, allowing me to enter the Dharma-gate. My name is recorded in the imperial register of the Thearch, inscribed in the august scrolls, and my person bears the numinous tally. I have received the Golden Writs of the Three Caverns, the Purple Scripts and Vermilion Chapters of the Upper Clarity, and the Five Vermilion Writs of the Numinous Treasure and Grotto-Mysterious Five Chapters of True Writs.

My former master, the Perfected Master of [such-and-such] Marchmount, [so-and-so] Lord, transmitted these to me for wearing upon my person. They guard and protect the Perfected, command qi and dispatch spirits, and enact the Orthodox Dao. By this grace, disasters have vanished and misfortunes have receded. My family and state enjoy peace, and the efficacy of the Dao has become manifest—its luminous Way should be transmitted.

In the past, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month of the [such-and-such] year, I ascended [such-and-such] Marchmount to swear an oath before the Nine Heavens, vowing that within forty years, I would transmit these teachings to one whose bones and appearance accord with the charts and who meets the ritual requirements.

Since receiving the Dharma, the allotted years have been fulfilled. Now there is an advanced disciple, the Perfected of [such-and-such] Marchmount, [so-and-so], born in the [such-and-such] year of the [such-and-such] life, aged [such-and-such] years, born in the [such-and-such] month. His fate belongs to the Eastern Dipper, his name is recorded on Mount Tai, and his register is kept by the Azure Marchmount. His qi and bones harmonize with the Perfected. He has already received the Numinous Writs of the Nine Heavens and the Upper Dharma, yet his understanding remains shallow and narrow. He has not beheld the origin of the Dao, nor plumbed the roots of Heaven. The Five Thearchs do not oversee him, and the Nine Heavens have not yet heard of him. Yet he has faithfully and arduously sought the cinnabar elixir, accumulating years of supplication. He has laid bare his heart in oaths, moving both humans and spirits.

I now present twenty-four thousand coins of gold, corresponding to the twenty-four qi of life, along with nine taels of refined gold to swear an oath before the Nine Heavens. I offer forty feet of patterned silk for each of the Five Thearchs to entreat the Five Elders and Supreme Perfected.

These gold coins are not found in the Red Continent; I humbly request that various treasures be accepted as their equivalent to fulfill the required amount. I prostrate and make this entreaty, swearing a covenant for my seven ancestors, binding both life and death to this vow. Should I violate the mysteries of the Nine Heavens’ Upper Dharma, I accept death as punishment. In life and death, my parents and I will be consigned to the offices of ghostly officials, swallowing our voices and stifling our breath, daring not to speak.

Your humble servant [so-and-so], with a sincere heart and earnest devotion, has been blessed by accumulated fortune to partake of the Numinous Writs. Having perused their scrolls and beheld their contents, I am fit to attain the perfection of the Dao. I have fasted and purified myself, ascended the numinous mountain, and sworn an oath before Heaven to transmit the Writs. Following the clear statutes, I now confer them upon this disciple.

Daring not act presumptuously, I prostrate upon the altar of the Great Yang’s Numinous Platform and present a memorial on yellow silk with vermilion text to make this known. May the High Numinous Venerable Lords, the Chancellors of the Nine Heavens, deign to reflect upon my petition and take pity on my sincere heart.

Should the August Ones above deign to proclaim this, may the Heavenly Perfected of the Five Thearchs and Five Marchmounts, the Numinous Treasure and Primordial Beginning Great Spirits, deliver my nine generations of ancestors to ascend into the Southern Palace. May their withered bones be crowned and girdled, their decayed frames restored to bloom, and their exhausted souls, revolving in suffering, be transformed to enter the gates of immortality. May the spirits already ascended advance in rank within the immortal palaces, their names inscribed in jade, recorded in the golden registers and treasure repositories of the Nine Heavens’ immortal records.

I entreat the Azure Tooth Azure Thearch of the Nine Qi Azure Heaven, the Azure Waist Jade Maiden, and the Numinous Officials of the Eastern Precinct, along with the Azure Dragon troops and generals of the Jia-Yi offices, numbering nine hundred million each, to descend as one into the disciple’s body and guard the Palace of the Liver.

I entreat the Vermilion Tooth Three Qi Heavenly Lord, the Primordial Qi Elder, the Vermilion Palace Great Cinnabar Jade Maiden, and the Numinous Officials of the Southern Precinct, along with the Vermilion Dragon troops and generals of the Bing-Ding offices, numbering three hundred million each, to descend as one into the disciple’s body and guard the Crimson Palace of the Heart.

I entreat the Yellow Thearch of the Primordial Grotto’s Supreme Thearch Mountain, the Supreme Thearch Perfected, the Vermilion Child Yellow Court Earth Granary Jade Maiden, the Central Yellow Supreme Thearch Officials, and the Numinous Officials, along with the Yellow Dragon troops and generals of the Wu-Ji offices, numbering twelve hundred million each, to descend as one into the disciple’s body and guard the Palace of the Spleen.

I entreat the White Thearch of the Seven Qi Heaven, the Bright Stone Seven Qi Grand Master, the Supreme White Simplicity Jade Maiden, and the Numinous Officials of the Western Precinct, along with the White Dragon troops and generals of the Geng-Xin offices, numbering seven hundred million each, to descend as one into the disciple’s body and guard the Palace of the Lungs.

I entreat the Black Thearch of the Five Qi Mysterious Heaven, the Mysterious Nourishment Five Qi Heavenly Lord, the Supreme Numinous Lord, the Night Radiance Jade Maiden, and the Numinous Officials of the Northern Precinct, along with the Black Dragon troops and generals of the Ren-Gui offices, numbering five hundred million each, to descend as one into the disciple’s body and guard the Palace of the Kidneys.

I entreat the Perfected Ones of the Five Marchmounts with their troops and cavalry, the Perfected Ones of the Four Waterways with their troops and cavalry, the Perfected Ones of the Nine Palaces with their troops and cavalry, and the divine immortals and flying immortals with their mounts, numbering nine hundred million each, to descend as one into the disciple’s body, dispersing through the offices and palaces to securely guard the physical form within the Five Viscera and Six Palaces, the Nine Palaces and Three Primes, following the protective and defensive qi, harmonizing the hun and restraining the po, preserving the spirit and nurturing the essence, gathering qi and refining the immortal, coagulating the marrow and transforming the bones, and refining the blood vessels into perfection.

At dawn, they ingest the primordial efflorescence and the five-toothed mushroom blossoms, rinse the Jade Pool, and let the fluids generate spontaneously, filling the interior and overflowing externally, their radiance and luminosity penetratingly bright. A circular image appears upon the neck, illuminating the ten directions. They roam the world, greeted by the officials of the Three Realms, the celestial and terrestrial deities of the Five Marchmounts and Four Waterways, who bow in attendance and escort them. The myriad spirits guard the Perfected, summoning clouds and descending rain, commanding the Eight Might to summon dragons, performing a thousand transformations and ten thousand changes, instantly responding to the natural order.

When the great kalpas cycle and vast calamities surge from the four directions, the body attains flight and traverses heavenly disasters. Amid the Eight Difficulties and a thousand perils with ten thousand poisons, all are dissolved and extinguished. Demons are vanquished and trials repelled, malevolent spirits slain and treachery severed. They perceive the hidden and the manifest, discern fortune and misfortune in reverse, and command the celestial officials. Sitting, they summon the divine immortals of the ten directions to arrive spontaneously, transforming their radiance and refining their form, sitting or standing at will, vanishing or appearing. They ascend to the Upper Clarity, accompanying their nine generations of ancestors to ascend the Nine Heavens together.

After the disciple receives the Perfection, they close their mouth and cultivate in secrecy, awaiting the celestial Perfected. Fathers do not instruct sons; it resides solely within the self. After seven years and within forty years, if one encounters a person of immortal attainment, they shall report to the Nine Heavens for transmission, where the Four Controllers, Five Thearchs, and Three Officials will summon and examine the disciple’s nine generations of ancestors, overseeing the covenant and scrutinizing their conduct and adherence to the precepts, ensuring no violation of the celestial numina. In life and death, they shall attain immortality together.

Should they transgress the celestial statutes, divulging the Perfected Texts midway, the living and deceased parents, along with the disciple’s own body, shall confess their sins before the Four Luminaries, enduring the Wind Blade for ten thousand kalpas and the Three Paths and Five Sufferings, never daring to seek pardon. Before the disciple fully participates in the Great Rites, their thousand transgressions and ten thousand sins are beseeched for absolution. From this day forth, they renew their vows and present their petition, which ascends to be memorialized before the Supreme, the Cavernous Mystery, the Numinous Treasure, the Primordial Jade August, and the Five Elder Thearchs.

May they deign to bestow their luminous regard and universally inform the myriad spirits, all wishing the disciple’s name to endure as a Perfected One, illumined by the Three Luminaries and eternally abiding with the Five Qi. We implore the August and Venerable Supreme Dao of the Utmost Perfection of the Nine Heavens, the Celestial Perfected, to discern and compassionately attend to this plea.

Your servant, with utmost reverence and trepidation, prostrates in submission, kowtowing repeatedly to memorialize this entreaty. Your servant, of the surname [X] from the prefecture and county of [Y],

To the Supreme, Primordial, August, and Venerable Supreme Dao; the Cavernous Mystery and Numinous Treasure; the Five Elder Jade August Thearchs; and the Great Sage, Jade August Sovereign.

In the year [Z], the month [A], and the day [B], presented at the Golden Dragon Post of [C] Mountain Peak in the prefecture and county of [D].

The ancient statutes of the Mysterious Capital confer the rites of the Upper Perfected, inscribed in vermilion upon yellow silk. When transmitting the scriptures and rites upon the numinous marchmounts, the texts are exposed for three days and three nights, undisturbed by wind or drifting, thereby deemed suitable for the Perfected. If encountered by wind, transmission is withheld. Should the texts be exposed to wind thrice, causing the memorial to flutter, such a person is deemed unsuitable, and transmission must not proceed. These celestial statutes are severe; master and disciple must together deliberate and exercise utmost caution, ensuring alignment with the celestial numina.

Here ends the Lower Scroll of the *Wondrous Scripture of the Vermilion Writ and Jade Instructions of the Cavernous Mystery and Numinous Treasure of the Supreme*.

chunks.original_text: 太上洞玄灵宝赤书玉诀妙经 经名：太上洞玄灵宝赤书玉诀妙经。 简称《赤书玉诀》。 撰人不详，约出於东晋。 系古《灵宝经》之一。 二卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞玄部本文类。 太上洞玄灵宝赤书玉诀妙经卷上 尔时元始天尊、太上大道君、五老上帝、十方大神，会於南丹洞阳上馆，坐明珠七色宝座。 时有五帝大圣、玄和玉女，五万二千五百众诣座。 天洒香华，神龙妓乐，无鞅数众，紫云四敷，三景齐明，天元合庆，众真齐驾。 时有精进学士王龙赐侍座，请受法戒。 道告龙赐：吾於七百万劫，奉修灵宝，立愿布施，持戒执斋，勤苦不退，展转生死，忍辱精进，断除异念，空受无想，积感玄寂，得作众圣道尊。 常用慈念，欲令广度众生，是男是女，好愿至人，咸使得见灵宝妙法。 尔有善心，来归法门，由尔前生万劫，已奉至真，功满德足，致生道世，值遇法兴。 今当为尔解说凝滞十部妙经，使尔救度十方诸天人民，勤为用心，勿使魔言。 道曰：生死因绿，轮转福愿，莫不由身。 人身难得，道世难遇，经法难值，诀言难闻。 吾所以敷张玄旨，解说要言者何。 感念十方天人受生，不能保度其身，长处苦恼，甘心履罪，展转五道，无能觉者。 是故广明法教，开导愚蒙，咸使天人得入无上正真之门，普度一切生值此世，真以宿缘所从，真人皆得过度。 吾受元始真文旧经，说经度世万劫，当还元上宛利天。 过世后五浊之中，运命不达，是男是女，不见明教，常处恶道，生寿无机，而忧恼自婴，多受枉横，自生自死，轮转五道，堕於三途八难之中，殃对相寻，无有极已，生死分离，无有豪贱，实为痛心。 今解说诸要，以度可度。 汝好正意谛受吾言。
chunks.translated_text:
**The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scarlet Script Jade Instructions Sublime Sutra**

**Sutra Title:** *The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scarlet Script Jade Instructions Sublime Sutra* (abbreviated as *Scarlet Script Jade Instructions*).
Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. One of the ancient *Numinous Treasure Sutras*. Two scrolls.
Source text: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Cavern Mystery Division, *Original Texts* category.

---

**The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scarlet Script Jade Instructions Sublime Sutra, Scroll One**

At that time, the Celestial Venerable of Original Beginning, the Supreme Lord of the Great Dao, the Five Elder Thearchs, and the Great Deities of the Ten Directions convened in the Upper Palace of Vermilion Yang within the Southern Cavern. They were seated upon seven-jeweled thrones of luminous pearls in seven hues. Then, the Five Thearchic Great Sages and the Jade Maidens of Mystic Harmony, along with fifty-two thousand five hundred in assembly, approached the dais. Heavenly perfumes and blossoms rained down, divine dragons and celestial musicians—innumerable hosts—filled the air. Purple clouds spread in all directions, the Three Radiant Ones shone in unison, the Celestial Origin rejoiced in harmony, and the assembled perfected ones arrived in procession.

At that time, the diligent scholar Wang Longci, who had been granted attendance at the seat, entreated to receive the precepts and commandments. The Dao addressed Longci:

"For seven million kalpas, I have reverently cultivated the Numinous Treasure, established vows to bestow and disseminate, upheld the precepts, observed fasts, endured hardship without retreat, revolved through birth and death, practiced forbearance and diligence, severed heterodox thoughts, and embraced emptiness and non-conception. Through the accumulation of these practices, I attained the profound quiescence that elevated me to the honored rank of the Sagely Dao.

Ever moved by compassion, I desire to broadly deliver all beings—whether male or female, those of noble aspiration and utmost sincerity—so that all may behold the wondrous Dharma of the Numinous Treasure. You, possessing a virtuous heart, have come to seek refuge in the Dharma Gate. This is due to your past lives across ten thousand kalpas, wherein you already revered the Utmost Perfected. Your merit is complete, your virtue fulfilled, enabling your rebirth in the Dao-world at this time of flourishing Dharma.

Now, I shall expound for you the *Ten Sections of Sublime Sutras on Resolving Obstructions*, that you may deliver the multitudes of the Ten Directions—celestial and human alike. Apply yourself diligently and take heed, lest you be swayed by demonic words."

The Dao declared:
"The causes and conditions of birth and death, the revolving of blessings and vows—none arise apart from the body. The human body is difficult to obtain, the Dao-world difficult to encounter, the sutras difficult to attain, and the decisive teachings difficult to hear. Why, then, do I unfold the profound purport and expound the essential words?

Moved by compassion for the beings of the Ten Directions who, upon receiving birth, cannot preserve and deliver their bodies, dwell long in suffering and affliction, willingly tread the path of transgression, and revolve through the Five Realms—none awakening—I broadly illuminate the Dharma teachings to guide the ignorant and benighted. Thus, all celestial and human beings may enter the Gate of the Supreme Orthodox and Perfected, universally delivering all who are born into this world. By virtue of their past karmic connections, the perfected ones shall all be enabled to transcend.

I have received the ancient sutras of the Original Beginning’s true scriptures, expounding the Dharma to deliver the world for ten thousand kalpas. I shall return to the Primordial Profound Joy Heaven. After this world passes into the Five Turbidities, when the mandate of destiny is obstructed, whether male or female, they shall not behold the luminous teachings. They will abide perpetually in the evil destinies, their lifespans devoid of opportunity, beset by sorrow and torment, enduring unjust suffering. Born and dying of themselves, they revolve through the Five Realms, falling into the Three Wretched Paths and the Eight Difficulties. Calamities and retributions pursue one another endlessly, and in the separation of birth and death, there is no distinction of noble or base—truly a cause for grieving the heart.

Now, I expound these essential teachings to deliver those who can be delivered. You must rectify your mind and attentively receive my words."
