chunks.original_text: 於是注诀，龙赐稽首，伏受教旨。 道日：子受灵宝大戒，当起北向，首体投地，礼於十方，东向伏听十戒。 一者心不恶妬，无生阴贼，检口慎过，想念在法。 二者守仁不杀，愍济群生，慈爱广救，润及一切。 三者守贞让义，不淫不盗，常行善念，损己济物。 四者不色不欲，心无放荡，贞洁守慎，行无点污。 五者口无恶言，言不华绮，内外忠直，不犯口过。 六者灭酒节行，调和气性，神不损伤，无犯众恶。 七者不得嫉人胜己，争竞功名，每事逊让，退身度人。 八者不得评论经教，訾毁圣文，躬心承法，常如对神。 九者不得斗乱口舌，评详四辈，天人咎恨，伤损神气。 十者举动施为，平等一心，人和神睦，行常使然。 修奉清戒，每合天心。 常行大慈，愿为一切普度厄世，慊慊尊教，不得中怠。 宁守善而死，不为恶而生。 於是不退，可得拔度五道，不履三恶，诸天所护，万神所敬，长斋奉戒，自得度世。 道言：灵宝开法度人，有十二可从而得度世者，尔宜从之，自得正直，终入无为。 一者见真经出法，开度一切，便发道意，心愿后世，得登大圣。 二者常行慈心，愿念一切，普得见法，开度广远，无有障翳。 三者好乐经教，深远览达，意志坚明，开化愚暗。 四者尊受师训，广开劝化，令入法门，远离盲道。 五者信向玄妙，尊奉经诀，晨夕念诵，无有怠倦。 六者不务荣华，断俗因缘，专心定志，所营在法。 七者勤诵大经，愿念一切，广开桥梁，为来生作绿。 八者常生善心，不邪不伪，无嫉无害，无恶无妬。 九者在所随生，常值圣世，与灵宝法教相值不绝。 十者洁身持戒，修斋建功，广救群生，咸得度脱。 十一者学业广览，宣通经法，预以天人，普令开度。 十二者常与明师世世相值，受教宣化，度人无量。 是为十二妙诀。 能行此善念，世世得见圣文，与道结缘，诸天友识，独步三界，无所挂碍，长离三恶五道八难。 神明敬护，地祇拥卫，门户清肃，万灾不干。 诸所求愿，读诵此经，皆得成就。 是善男子，善女人，精心尊奉，皆为十方大圣所有，洞达自然，身生水火，变化形影，飞升上清，功德未满，应经灭度，即为五帝所迎，径升天宫，不过泰山，化生贵门，与经道相遇，俓得度世。 道告龙赐：勤行谛受，勿为懈息。 龙赐稽首，伏承戒日。 道言：真文咒说，高上法度，旧文宛奥，不可寻详，后来学者，难可施用。 故高下注笔，以解曲滞。 玉诀真要，开演古文，微辞玄妙，诸天所尊。 披诵玉章，十方遥唱，上天设礼，神魔降伏，鬼妖灭爽。 侍文玉童、玉女各五十人，自无前生万劫题名太玄，不得见此玉文。 运会遭遇，克得神仙，福延九祖，润流玄孙，皆得度脱三恶五道八难之中。 斯文尊贵，妙不可胜。 元始灵宝告水帝削除罪简上法 灵宝某帝，先生某甲，年如干岁，某月生，愿神愿仙，长生不死，三元同存。 九府水帝、十二河源、江河淮济、瞑泠大神，乞削罪名，上闻九天，请诣水府，金龙驿传。 太岁某年某月某朔某日某时，於某国告文。 右朱书银木简上，以青纸裹简，青丝缠之，金龙负简以投三河之渊。 初用金钮九只，连简沉之后投，不须三过都止。 投简当於清泠之渊，北向叩齿三通，读简文咒曰：
chunks.translated_text:
Then, having received the talismanic instructions, Long Ci bowed his head to the ground, prostrate in reverent acceptance of the teachings.

The Dao declared: "You who receive the Great Precepts of the Numinous Treasure must rise and face north, your entire body prostrated upon the earth, paying homage to the ten directions. Then, turn eastward and listen in prostration to the Ten Precepts:

First: Let your heart be free of malice and envy, without the hidden thieves of yin. Guard your speech and be mindful of transgressions, keeping your thoughts fixed upon the Dharma.

Second: Uphold benevolence and refrain from killing; show compassion and succor all living beings. Let your kindness and love extend broadly to save all, bestowing moisture upon all things.

Third: Maintain chastity and yield to righteousness; neither lust nor steal. Constantly cultivate good thoughts, diminishing yourself to aid others.

Fourth: Be free of sensuality and desire; let your heart not wander. Preserve purity and caution, ensuring your conduct remains unstained.

Fifth: Let your mouth be free of evil speech; your words neither ornate nor deceitful. Be loyal and upright within and without, avoiding transgressions of the mouth.

Sixth: Abstain from wine and regulate your conduct, harmonizing your qi and nature. Let your spirit not be harmed, and refrain from all evils.

Seventh: Do not envy those who surpass you or contend for fame and merit. In all matters, yield and retreat, delivering others before yourself.

Eighth: Do not criticize the scriptures or slander the sacred texts. Apply your heart to upholding the Dharma, ever as though standing before the gods.

Ninth: Do not engage in quarrels or disputes, nor pass judgment on the four classes of beings. Let neither gods nor humans bear resentment, nor your spirit and qi be harmed.

Tenth: In all actions and undertakings, maintain equanimity and a unified heart. Let harmony prevail between humans and gods, and let this be your constant practice.

By cultivating and upholding these pure precepts, you shall ever align with the heart of Heaven. Constantly practice great compassion, vowing to universally deliver all from this world of suffering. With reverence for the teachings, never grow lax. Better to die upholding goodness than to live in evil.

Through unwavering practice, you may extricate yourself from the Five Realms and avoid the Three Wretched Paths. You shall be protected by all heavens, revered by the myriad spirits, and by maintaining a perpetual fast and upholding the precepts, you shall naturally attain deliverance from the world."

The Dao continued: "The Numinous Treasure reveals the Dharma to deliver beings, and there are twelve ways by which one may attain deliverance from the world. You should follow them, and by so doing, you shall naturally attain uprightness and ultimately enter the realm of non-action.

First: Upon witnessing the true scriptures emerge to deliver all beings, arouse the intention for the Dao, and vow that in future lives you may ascend to the rank of Great Sage.

Second: Constantly practice a compassionate heart, wishing that all beings may behold the Dharma, be broadly and universally delivered, without obstruction or hindrance.

Third: Delight in the scriptures and teachings, deeply and extensively studying them. Let your will be firm and your understanding clear, enlightening the ignorant and benighted.

Fourth: Reverently receive the instructions of your teacher, broadly exhorting and transforming others, guiding them into the Dharma gate, and distancing them from blind paths.

Fifth: Have faith in and turn toward the profound and wondrous, reverently upholding the scriptures and their instructions. Recite them morning and evening without weariness or slackening.

Sixth: Do not pursue glory and splendor, severing worldly entanglements. Focus your heart and stabilize your will, directing all your endeavors toward the Dharma.

Seventh: Diligently recite the great scriptures, wishing for all beings, and broadly build bridges for them, creating karmic conditions for future lives.

Eighth: Constantly cultivate a good heart, neither perverse nor false, without envy, harm, evil, or malice.

Ninth: Wherever you are born, may you always encounter a sagely age, and may the teachings of the Numinous Treasure Dharma never be interrupted.

Tenth: Purify your body and uphold the precepts; perform fasts and establish merit. Broadly save all living beings, that all may attain deliverance.

Eleventh: Extensively study and broadly disseminate the scriptures and Dharma, preparing for the company of gods and humans, universally guiding and delivering all.

Twelfth: Constantly encounter enlightened teachers life after life, receiving their teachings and propagating them, delivering countless beings.

These are the Twelve Wondrous Instructions. By cultivating these good thoughts, you shall life after life behold the sacred texts, form affinities with the Dao, and be recognized as friends by all heavens. You shall stride alone through the Three Realms, unobstructed, forever departing from the Three Wretched Paths, the Five Realms, and the Eight Difficulties. Divine luminaries shall respect and protect you; earthly deities shall surround and guard you. Your gates and households shall be pure and solemn, and the myriad calamities shall not encroach. All your aspirations and vows, through the recitation of this scripture, shall be fulfilled.

This good man or good woman, with a sincere heart and reverent devotion, shall belong to the Great Sages of the Ten Directions, penetrating the natural and spontaneously attaining the ability to traverse water and fire, transform their form and shadow, and ascend to the Upper Clarity. Before their merit is complete and they should pass through extinction, they shall be welcomed by the Five Emperors and ascend directly to the heavenly palaces, bypassing Mount Tai. They shall be transformed and born into noble lineages, encountering the scriptures and the Dao, and thus attain deliverance from the world."

The Dao addressed Long Ci: "Diligently practice and attentively receive these teachings; do not grow remiss."

Long Ci bowed his head to the ground, prostrate in acceptance of the precepts.

The Dao declared: "The true scriptures and incantations expound the supreme Dharma for deliverance. The ancient texts are profound and abstruse, difficult to fathom in detail, and later scholars find them hard to apply. Therefore, I have annotated them in both elevated and plain styles to resolve obscurities. The jade instructions and true essentials elucidate the ancient texts, their subtle words and wondrous mysteries revered by all heavens. Upon reciting these jade chapters, the ten directions echo them from afar. In the heavens above, rituals are established; gods and demons are subdued, and ghosts and malevolent spirits are extinguished.

Fifty jade youths and fifty jade maidens attend the scriptures. From former lives through ten thousand kalpas, their names have been inscribed in the Supreme Mystery, yet they have not beheld these jade texts. Through the convergence of karmic conditions and encounters, they may attain immortality as divine transcendents. Their blessings extend to nine generations of ancestors, and their grace flows to distant descendants, all delivered from the Three Wretched Paths, the Five Realms, and the Eight Difficulties. This scripture is most noble and wondrous beyond compare."

**The Numinous Treasure’s Method for the Water Emperor to Erase Sin Tablets**

Numinous Treasure [Name] Emperor, Master [Name], aged [Number] years, born in the [Number] month, vowing to become a spirit immortal, to attain eternal life without death, and to preserve the Three Origins in unity.

The Nine Mansion Water Emperors, the Twelve River Sources, the gods of the Jiang, He, Huai, and Ji rivers, and the great spirits of the Mingling, beseech the erasure of sin names, that they may be reported to the Nine Heavens. They request to proceed to the Water Palace, conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

In the year of [Celestial Stem and Branch], the [Number] month, the [Number] day of the new moon, at the [Number] hour, the document is proclaimed in [Name] kingdom.

Inscribe this in red upon a silver-wood tablet, wrap the tablet in blue paper, bind it with blue silk, and have a golden dragon carry the tablet to cast it into the depths of the Three Rivers. First, use nine golden clasps, attaching them to the tablet before sinking it; thereafter, no further offerings are required.

When casting the tablet, face north, click your teeth three times, and recite the tablet’s incantation, saying:

chunks.original_text: 元始五老，上帝高尊，十方至真，太华灵仙，赤文告命，无幽不闻，上御九天，请下玉文，日月五星，北斗七元，中告五岳，四方灵山，下告河海，十二泉源，九府水帝，溟泠大神，今日上告，万愿开陈，请投玉简，乞削罪名，千曾万祖，九族种亲，罪根连染，及得我身，普蒙削除，绝灭种根，记名水府，言上帝前，七祖父母，去离八难，上登九天，衣食自然，我罪释散，万神咸闻，请以金钮，关明水官，请如斯陈，金龙驿传。 太上洞玄灵宝赤书玉诀妙经卷上 元始灵宝告五岳灵山除罪求仙上法 灵宝某帝，先生某甲，年如干岁，某月生，命属某帝，名系泰山，愿神愿仙，长生度世，飞行上清。 五岳真人、至神至灵，乞削罪籍，上闻九天，请诣灵山，金龙驿传。 太岁某甲子某月某朔某日某时，於某岳告文。 右朱书银木简，青纸裹之，青丝缠之，金钮九只，金龙负之，埋本命之岳，悉如上法。 於本命之岳，束向叩齿九通，读简文竟，咒曰： 玄上开明，元始监真，上帝五老，赤书丹文，天地本始，总领三元，摄气召会，催促降仙，高上符命，普告十天，日月星宿，五岳灵山，天下地上，溟泠大神、监生主录，南上三门，开领玉简，勒名丹篇，削落罪书，上补帝臣，千曾万祖，九族种亲，皆蒙解脱，五道八难，去离三恶，魂升九天，生死开度，万劫长存，今日上告，万神咸闻，请以金钮，关盟真官，请如所告，金龙驿传。 元始灵宝告九地土皇灭罪言名求仙上法 灵宝某帝，先生某甲，年如干岁，某月生，命系九天，东斗领籍，愿神愿仙，长生度世，飞行上清。 中皇九地戊己黄神、土府五帝，乞削罪录，勒上太玄，请诣中宫，投简记名，金钮自信，金龙驿传。 太岁某甲子某月某朔某日某时，於某郡县中告文。 右朱书银木简，青纸裹之，青丝缠之，金纽九只，金龙负之，埋所住中官，悉如上法。 於中庭向壬叩齿十二通，读简文竟，咒曰： 天开地张，九炁分灵，三元同符，十方朗清，五老上帝，开真领生，丹书赤文，元始上精，普告天下，九土皇灵，今日上告，万仙定生，我愿我仙，请投玉名，土府太皇，勒除罪刑，奏简上宫，列簿华青，早得飞腾，天地同灵，九祖种亲，腐骸更荣，魂升南宫，受化仙庭，日吉告命，万神咸听，请以金钮，表盟至情，请如所告，金龙驿呈。 道曰：尔有志心，发无上道意，欲度诸天人民善男善女，咸使得离三恶五道八难之中。 得过恶世，与道相值，当以八节甲子之日，投三元玉简，除宿罪簿，言名上天，事事三过。 诸天三官九府，更相嘱寄，上天分别，万神敬护，五帝侍卫，三界司迎，门户整肃，天下地祇，日月来朝，千魔万精，不敢妄干。 志愿坚白，蠲向咸成，七祖父母，即得解脱三途五苦，上升天宫，生死福庆，影响相酬。 三官九府，书人功过，其理甚明，世世因缘，毫分无亏。 尔谛奉行，勿为懈怠，使魔坏尔真。 东方九炁青天真文赤书玉诀 东方九炁，始皇青天，碧霞郁垒，中有老人，总校图录，摄炁降仙。 其二十四字，主召九天上帝，校神仙图录。 学仙道士，常以本命、甲子、立春之日，青书二十四字於白刺，记姓名年月於刺下，投灵山之岳。 九年仙官到，使青腰玉女九人，身得飞仙。

The Primordial Five Elders, the Most High and Revered Lord, the Perfected of the Ten Directions, the Divine Immortals of Mount Taihua—your red-script decrees resound where none is hidden. Ascending to govern the Nine Heavens, we beseech the descent of jade texts. The sun, moon, and five stars; the Seven Origins of the Northern Dipper; the Five Marchmounts at the center; the sacred mountains of the four quarters; the rivers and seas below; the Twelve Fountainheads; the Water Lords of the Nine Palaces; and the great spirits of the Mingling—today we make this supreme declaration. May all ten thousand vows be laid bare: we request to cast this jade tablet, beseeching the erasure of sin names. For our thousandfold and myriad ancestors, the nine clans and all kin—whose sins have entwined and stained even our own selves—may all be universally expunged, their roots of transgression severed and annihilated. Record their names in the Water Palace, proclaim them before the Lord on High. May our seven generations of fathers and mothers depart from the Eight Difficulties, ascend to the Nine Heavens, and be clothed and fed by nature itself. As our sins dissolve and scatter, may the myriad spirits all bear witness. We entreat with golden clasps to enlighten the Water Officials. Let this petition be thus conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

*Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Red-Script Jade Formula Scripture, Scroll One*
*The Primordial Numinous Treasure’s Method for Petitioning the Five Marchmounts and Sacred Mountains to Remove Sins and Seek Immortality*

Numinous Treasure [Name] Emperor, Master [Name], aged [Number] years, born in the [Number] month, life governed by [Name] Emperor, name registered at Mount Tai, yearns for divinity and immortality, to attain eternal life and transcend the world, to soar through the Supreme Clarity.

May the Perfected of the Five Marchmounts, most divine and numinous, beseech the erasure of sin records, that they may be reported to the Nine Heavens. We request to proceed to the sacred mountains, conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

In the year of [Celestial Stem and Branch], the [Number] month, the [Number] day of the new moon, at the [Number] hour, the document is proclaimed at [Name] Marchmount.

Inscribe this in red upon a silver-wood tablet, wrap the tablet in blue paper, bind it with blue silk, attach nine golden clasps, and have a golden dragon bear the tablet to bury it at the Marchmount of one’s life destiny, all in accordance with the method above.

At the Marchmount of one’s life destiny, face east, click the teeth nine times, and upon completing the recitation of the tablet’s text, recite the incantation, saying:

Mystic and supreme, luminous and clear, the Primordial oversees the Perfected. The Five Elders of the Lord on High, red-script cinnabar texts—foundation of heaven and earth, governing the Three Origins—gather qi and summon assemblies, hastening the descent of immortals. This exalted talismanic decree universally proclaims to the Ten Heavens, the sun, moon, and stellar lodges, the Five Marchmounts and sacred mountains, all above the earth and below the heavens, the great spirits of the Mingling, the Overseers of Life and Keepers of Records. Open the Three Southern Gates, receive the jade tablet, inscribe names upon the cinnabar register, erase the records of sins. Promote them to serve as imperial ministers. May the thousandfold and myriad ancestors, the nine clans and all kin, all attain liberation; may the Five Paths and Eight Difficulties be departed from, the Three Evils left behind. May souls ascend to the Nine Heavens, life and death be transcended, and all endure through ten thousand kalpas. Today we make this supreme declaration; may the myriad spirits all bear witness. We entreat with golden clasps to ally with the Perfected Officials. Let this petition be thus conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

*The Primordial Numinous Treasure’s Method for Petitioning the Earth Sovereigns of the Nine Lands to Eradicate Sin Names and Seek Immortality*

Numinous Treasure [Name] Emperor, Master [Name], aged [Number] years, born in the [Number] month, life registered in the Nine Heavens, governed by the Eastern Dipper, yearns for divinity and immortality, to attain eternal life and transcend the world, to soar through the Supreme Clarity.

May the August Yellow Deities of the Nine Lands, the Earth Sovereigns of the Central Palace, beseech the erasure of sin records, that they may be inscribed upon the Great Mystery. We request to proceed to the Central Palace, to cast the tablet and record names. Let the golden clasps serve as our pledge, conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

In the year of [Celestial Stem and Branch], the [Number] month, the [Number] day of the new moon, at the [Number] hour, the document is proclaimed in the central precinct of [Name] commandery and county.

Inscribe this in red upon a silver-wood tablet, wrap the tablet in blue paper, bind it with blue silk, attach nine golden clasps, and have a golden dragon bear the tablet to bury it at the central palace of one’s dwelling, all in accordance with the method above.

In the central courtyard, face north, click the teeth twelve times, and upon completing the recitation of the tablet’s text, recite the incantation, saying:

Heaven unfolds, earth extends, the nine qi divide and manifest. The Three Origins unite in harmony, the Ten Directions shine with clarity. The Five Elder Lords on High open the Perfected and govern life. Cinnabar texts and red scripts, the supreme essence of the Primordial—universally proclaimed to the world below, the numinous sovereigns of the Nine Lands. Today we make this supreme declaration; may the ten thousand immortals be destined for life. We vow for our divinity, for our immortality, beseeching to cast our jade names. May the August Sovereign of the Earth Palace eradicate our sins and punishments, present the tablet to the Upper Palace, and inscribe it in the registers of Splendid Azure. May we swiftly attain flight, our spirits harmonizing with heaven and earth. May the nine generations of ancestors and all kin, their decayed bones renewed in glory, ascend in soul to the Southern Palace, transformed in the immortal courts. On this auspicious day, we proclaim our decree; may the myriad spirits all heed. We entreat with golden clasps to manifest our utmost sincerity. Let this petition be thus conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

The Dao declares: If you possess a sincere heart and arouse the intention for the supreme Dao, desiring to deliver all beings—men and women of goodness—from the Three Evils, the Five Paths, and the Eight Difficulties, that they may pass through this wicked age and encounter the Dao, you should cast the Three Origin Jade Tablets on the eight solar terms and the days of the celestial stems and branches. Erase the records of past sins, proclaim names to heaven, performing each act three times. The Three Officials of the Heavens and the Nine Palaces of the Earth will entrust one another, distinguishing all above in heaven. The myriad spirits will reverently protect, the Five Emperors will attend and guard, the administrators of the Three Realms will receive and welcome. Gates and doors will be ordered and solemn; the earthly deities below and the heavenly spirits above, the sun and moon, will come to pay homage. The thousand demons and myriad spirits dare not rashly interfere. If your aspirations are firm and pure, all vows will be fulfilled. Your seven generations of fathers and mothers will immediately be liberated from the Three Paths and Five Sufferings, ascending to the heavenly palaces. Life and death will be blessed, and retribution will correspond accordingly. The Three Officials and Nine Palaces record the merits and transgressions of people—this principle is most clear. Through generations of karmic conditions, not a hair’s breadth will be lacking. You must earnestly uphold and practice this, never growing lax, lest demons corrupt your true nature.

*Eastern Nine Qi Azure Heaven True Script Red-Script Jade Formula*

The Nine Qi of the East, the August Azure Heaven, where verdant mists rise in layered ranks. Within dwells an Elder who oversees the registers and charts, gathering qi to descend immortals.

Its twenty-four characters govern the summoning of the Nine Heavenly Lords on High and the verification of the registers of divine immortals.

Students of the immortal Dao should, on their life-destiny days, the days of the celestial stems and branches, and the day of the Beginning of Spring, inscribe the twenty-four characters in blue upon a white thornwood tablet, recording their names and the year and month below, and cast it at the sacred Marchmount. After nine years, the immortal officials will arrive, dispatching nine jade-maidens with azure waists, and you will attain flight as an immortal.

chunks.original_text: 岁星辅肝，角亢镇真，氐房心尾，四景回旋，箕主七辰，正斗明轮，承炁捕非，扫除灾群。 其三十二字，主召天宿星官，正天分度。 诸以天灾，星宿越错，朱书三十二字於青纸上，露於中庭九日九夜，夕夕依法别咒讫，以火焚，散灰於青烟之中。 并刻书三十二字於青石上，埋东方，天灾自消，星宿复位。 东山神阮，摄召九天，赤书符命，制会酆山，东魔送鬼，所诛无蠲，悉诣木宫，敢有稽延。 其三十二字主摄鬼魔，正九天炁。 行此法，朱书青木刺上，以文向东北而依别咒文三咒，鬼自束形，万妖自灭，精心行之。 下制东河，溟海水神，大劫洪灾，蛟龙负身，水府开道，通径百千，上帝赤文，风火无间。 其三十二字主摄东海水帝大劫天灾之数，召蛟龙及水神事。 遇水灾及欲渡大水，黄书三十二字於青纸上，依别咒以投水中，身自得过，蛟龙负载，河伯奉迎，水下可行也。 合一百二十字，皆元始自然之书，一名生神宝真洞玄章，一名东山神咒八威策文。 南方三炁丹天真文赤书玉诀 南方丹天，赤帝玉堂，中有大神，号曰赤皇，上炎流烟，三炁勃光，神仙受命，应运太阳。 其三十二字，主九天神仙图录宿名。 学仙道士，常以本命、甲子、立夏之日，朱书三十二字於白刺上，记姓名年月於刺下，投灵山之岳。 九年仙官到，使朱陵玉女三人，身得飞仙。 荧惑辅心，井鬼守房，柳星张翼，统御四乡，轸总七宿，回转天常，召运促会，正道驿行，赤文命灵。 其三十六字，主召星官，明度数，正天分度。 南方星宿越错，有诸灾异，当朱书青纸上，露於中庭三日三夜，夕夕南向，依别咒法讫，以火烧文，散之於青烟之中。 并别刻书三十六字於赤石上，埋南方，天灾自消，星宿复位。 北摄酆山，束送魔宗，符教所讨，明列罪源，南山神咒，灭伏百千，群妖灭爽，万试摧亡。 其三十二字，主制北酆正鬼炁。 行此法，黄书赤木刺上，以文向北，而依别咒文。 三行此法，鬼精自灭，万魔束形，宜精心行之。 南河水帝，太伯龙王，神咒流行，普扫不祥，洪水飞灾，止蛟召龙，开除水径，千道万通，敢有干试，摄送火宫，赤书所告，莫有不从。 其四十八字，主摄南海水帝。 大运交，洪水四出，召蛟龙水神事。 遇此灾及渡大水，皆黄书四十八字，於青纸上，依别咒，以投水中，自得过度，水官奉迎。 合一百四十八字，皆南方梵宝昌阳丹灵真老君自然之书，一名南云通天宝灵袊，一名九天神咒，一名赤天八威策文。 中央黄天真文赤书玉诀 中央总灵，黄上天元，始生五老，中黄高尊，摄炁监真，总领群仙，典录玄图，宿简玉文，催运上炁，普告万神。 其四十字，主神仙玉简宿名，总归仙炁。 学仙道士，以本命、甲子、春分、夏至之日，黄书四十字於白刺上，记姓名年月於剌下，投灵山之岳。 九年仙官到，使黄素玉女十二人，身得神仙。 镇星辅脾，回度北元，魁@主非，截邪斩根，@＠＠＠，扫秽除氛，魒正玄斗，明度天关，九天符命，金马驿传。 其四十字，主摄星官，正天度数。 诸中央星宿越错，生诸灾异，当以朱书四十字於青纸，露於中庭十二日十二夜，夕夕向王依别呢法讫，以火烧文，散之於青烟之中。 并刻书四十字於黄石上，埋中央，天灾自消，星宿复位。
chunks.translated_text:
The Year Star aids the liver, Horn and Neck guard the true,
Root and Chamber, Heart and Tail—four seasons revolve in turn,
Winnow governs the seven luminaries, the Dipper’s bright wheel aligns,
Receiving qi to seize the false, sweeping away calamitous hosts.

Its thirty-two characters command the summoning of the celestial asterisms and rectify the celestial divisions.
For all celestial disasters where asterisms deviate from their courses, inscribe the thirty-two characters in vermilion upon blue paper, expose it in the central courtyard for nine days and nine nights, and each evening recite the separate incantation as prescribed. Then burn it with fire and scatter the ashes into the azure smoke.
Also carve the thirty-two characters upon blue stone and bury it in the east; celestial disasters will vanish of themselves, and the asterisms will return to their proper positions.

The Eastern Mountain Spirit Ruan commands the summoning of the Nine Heavens,
With vermilion-script talismanic writs that convene the Feng Mountain assembly.
Eastern demons deliver ghosts—what is slain knows no reprieve,
All hasten to the Wooden Palace; none dare delay.

Its thirty-two characters govern the subjugation of demonic spirits and rectify the qi of the Nine Heavens.
To perform this method, inscribe in vermilion upon a blue thornwood tablet, face the northeast with the text, and recite the separate incantation three times. Ghosts will bind their forms of their own accord, and myriad demons will perish; practice this with utmost sincerity.

Below, it controls the Eastern River and the deities of the Brine Sea.
When great kalpas bring flood disasters, dragons bear the burden,
The Water Palace opens paths, a thousand thoroughfares emerge.
The vermilion writ of the Supreme Lord operates without hindrance through wind and fire.

Its thirty-two characters govern the subjugation of the Eastern Sea’s Water Thearch and the reckoning of great kalpa celestial disasters, as well as the summoning of dragons and water deities.
When encountering flood disasters or wishing to cross great waters, inscribe the thirty-two characters in yellow upon blue paper, recite the separate incantation, and cast it into the water. You will cross safely of your own accord, dragons will bear you, the River Earl will receive you, and the waters will become passable.

In total, one hundred twenty characters—all are the spontaneous writings of the Primordial Beginning, also called the *Precious Writ of Spirit-Generating Perfected Wonder*, or the *Eight Mightful Writs of the Eastern Mountain Spirit Incantation*.

---

The Vermilion Writ of the Southern Three Qi’s Cinnabar Heaven, Vermilion-Script Jade Formula

The Southern Cinnabar Heaven, the Vermilion Thearch’s Jade Hall,
Within dwells a great spirit named the Vermilion Sovereign.
Flaming mists rise upward, the three qi surge with radiance,
Divine immortals receive their mandates, responding to the Great Yang’s movement.

Its thirty-two characters govern the registers of the Nine Heavens’ divine immortals and the names of the asterisms.
Students of the immortal Dao should, on their life-destiny days, the days of the celestial stems and branches, and the day of the Beginning of Summer, inscribe the thirty-two characters in vermilion upon a white thornwood tablet, record their names and the year and month below, and cast it at the sacred Marchmount. After nine years, the immortal officials will arrive, dispatching three Jade Maidens of the Vermilion Mound, and you will attain flight as an immortal.

Mars aids the heart, Well and Ghost guard the chambers,
Willow, Star, Spread, and Wing—commanding the four quarters,
Chariot governs the seven lodgings, revolving the celestial constant.
Summoning and hastening assemblies, rectifying the Dao’s courier routes,
The vermilion writ commands the numinous.

Its thirty-six characters command the summoning of the asterism officials, illuminating the degrees and rectifying the celestial divisions.
When southern asterisms deviate from their courses, bringing various disasters and anomalies, inscribe in vermilion upon blue paper, expose it in the central courtyard for three days and three nights, facing south each evening. Follow the separate incantation method, then burn the text with fire and scatter the ashes into the azure smoke.
Also carve the thirty-six characters upon red stone and bury it in the south; celestial disasters will vanish of their own accord, and the asterisms will return to their proper positions.

Subjugating the Feng Mountain of the north, binding and dispatching demonic lineages,
The talismanic teachings execute judgment, clearly listing the sources of transgressions.
The Southern Mountain incantation extinguishes and subdues the myriad thousands,
Demonic hordes are annihilated, all trials are shattered and destroyed.

Its thirty-two characters govern the control of the northern Feng’s true ghostly qi.
To perform this method, inscribe in yellow upon a red thornwood tablet, face north with the text, and recite the separate incantation.
After performing this method three times, ghostly essences will perish of themselves, and myriad demons will bind their forms; practice this with utmost sincerity.

The Southern River’s Water Thearch, the Great Earl Dragon King,
The divine incantation flows forth, universally sweeping away inauspiciousness.
Flood disasters and flying calamities are halted, dragons are summoned,
Waterways are opened and cleared, a thousand paths and ten thousand passages emerge.
Should any dare to test this, they will be seized and sent to the Fire Palace.
None disobey the commands of the vermilion writ.

Its forty-eight characters govern the subjugation of the Southern Sea’s Water Thearch.
When the great kalpa turns and floods spread in all directions, for the summoning of dragons and water deities:
When encountering such disasters or wishing to cross great waters, inscribe the forty-eight characters in yellow upon blue paper, recite the separate incantation, and cast it into the water. You will cross safely of your own accord, and the water officials will receive you.

In total, one hundred forty-eight characters—all are the spontaneous writings of the Southern Cloud’s *Precious Numinous Flourishing Yang Cinnabar Spirit Perfected Elder Lord*, also called the *Nine Heavens’ Divine Incantation* or the *Eight Mightful Writs of the Vermilion Heaven*.

---

The Vermilion Writ of the Central Yellow Heaven, Vermilion-Script Jade Formula

The Central Yellow Heaven, sovereign of all numina,
The Yellow Supreme Celestial Origin, first-born of the Five Elders,
The August Yellow One of the Center, gathering qi to oversee the true,
Commanding the host of immortals, presiding over the mysterious charts,
The jade writs of the asterisms, hastening the ascent of the supreme qi,
Universally proclaiming to the myriad spirits.

Its forty characters govern the jade tablets of the divine immortals’ asterism names, all converging in the immortal qi.
Students of the immortal Dao should, on their life-destiny days, the days of the celestial stems and branches, the days of the Spring Equinox and Summer Solstice, inscribe the forty characters in yellow upon a white thornwood tablet, record their names and the year and month below, and cast it at the sacred Marchmount. After nine years, the immortal officials will arrive, dispatching twelve Jade Maidens of the Yellow Simplicity, and you will attain divine immortality.

Saturn aids the spleen, revolving the northern origin’s degrees,
The Demon-Catcher governs the false, severing evil at its root,
@@@@, sweeping away filth and dispelling miasmas,
The Demon-Queller rectifies the Mysterious Dipper, illuminating the celestial passes,
The Nine Heavens’ talismanic writs are transmitted by the Golden Horse couriers.

Its forty characters govern the subjugation of the asterism officials and the rectification of the celestial degrees.
For all deviations of the central asterisms that give rise to various disasters and anomalies, inscribe the forty characters in vermilion upon blue paper, expose it in the central courtyard for twelve days and twelve nights, facing the center each evening. Follow the separate incantation method, then burn the text with fire and scatter the ashes into the azure smoke.
Also carve the forty characters upon yellow stone and bury it in the center; celestial disasters will vanish of their own accord, and the asterisms will return to their proper positions.

chunks.original_text: ＠摄北帝，遏塞鬼门，剪除不详，莫有当前。 其十六字，主摄北帝正天气，检鬼精。 行此法，白书十六字於黄木刺上，以文向东北，而依别咒文。 三行此法，鬼精自灭，天魔束形，宜心行之。 中山神咒，召龙上云，制会黄河，九水河源，不得怠纵，善恶悉分，千妖万奸，上对帝君，莫有干试，太阳激焚，赤书玉字，宣告普闻。 其四十八字，主摄中海水帝四源之水，洪灾涌溢之数，召水神及蛟龙事。 欲过洪水之灾，及渡大水，皆当黄书四十八字於青纸上，依别咒，投水中，自得过渡，水官奉迎。 合一百四十四字，皆中央玉宝元灵元老君自然之书，一名宝劫洞清九天灵书，一名黄神大咒，一名黄帝威灵策文。 西方七天炁素天赤书玉诀 西方素天，白帝七门，金灵皓映，太华流氛，白石峨峨，七炁氤氲，上有始生，皇老大神，总领肺气，主校九天，检定图录，制召上仙。 其四十八字，主召仙炁。 学仙道士，常以本命、甲子、立秋之日，白书四十八字於白刺上，记姓名年月於刺下，投灵山之岳。 九年仙官到，使太素玉女七人，身得神仙。 太白检肺，奎娄守魂，胃昴毕觜，主制七关，参总斗魁，受符北元。 其二十四字，主白帝星官正明天度。 诸西方星宿越错，有诸灾异，当以朱书青纸上，露於中庭七日七夜，夕夕向西，依别咒法讫，以火烧文，散灰於青烟之中。 并刻书二十四字於白石上，埋西方，天灾自消，星宿复位。 赤书玉字，九天正文，摄召万炁，普归帝君。 其十六字，主摄六天鬼炁。 行此法，黑书十六字於白木刺上，以文向东北，而依别咒文，七过行之，鬼精自灭，万魔束形，宜精心行之。 西山神咒，八威七传，符水上龙，召山送云，在此授得，同到帝门，辅卫上真，斩灭邪源，若有不祥，截以金关，赤书符命，风火驿传。 其四十八字，主摄西海水帝及水中万精，召云龙以防水灾。 欲知水中精物，及洪水弥天，欲度此灾，皆黄书四十八字於青纸上，依别咒法，投文水中，立知水中万精形象，蛟龙负以渡水灾，水官奉迎也。 合一百三十六字，皆西方七宝金门皓灵皇老君自然之书，一名金真宝明洞微篇，一名西山神咒，一名八威召龙文。 北方五炁玄天真文赤书玉诀 北方玄天，五炁徘徊，中有黑帝，双皇太微，总领符命，仙炼八威，青裙羽褐，龙文凤衣，上帝所降，制列玉阶。 其四十字，主诸真人神仙图录。 学仙道士，常以本命、甲子、立冬之日，黑书四十字於白刺上，记姓名年月於刺下，投灵山之岳。 五年仙官到，使太玄玉女五人，名上仙籍矣。 北辰辅肾，斗牛卫扉，女虚危室，豁落四开，璧总七星，执凶纠非，却灾扫秽，明道洞辉。 其三十二字，主北方星官正天炁。 诸以北方星宿越错，有诸灾异，当以朱书三十二字於青纸上，露於中庭五日五夜，夕夕向北，依别咒法讫，以火烧文，散灰於青烟之中。 并刻书三十二字於黑石上，埋北方，天灾自消，星宿复位。 北山神咒，激阳起雷，流铃焕落，玃天振威，北酆所部，万妖灭摧。 其二十四字，主摄天魔北帝万鬼事。 行此法，青书二十四字於黑木刺上，以文向东北，而依别咒文。 五过行之，鬼精自灭，万魔束形，宜精心行之也。 九河倾竭，乌母群飞，蛟龙通道，水脉洞开，赤文玉书，驿龙风驰。

The [missing character] subdues the Northern Thearch, sealing the Ghost Gate,
Severing inauspicious omens so none may stand before it.
Its sixteen characters govern the subjugation of the Northern Thearch and the rectification of celestial qi, restraining ghostly essences.
To perform this method, inscribe the sixteen characters in white upon a yellow wooden tablet, direct the text toward the northeast, and follow the separate incantation.
Thrice performing this method, ghostly essences will vanish of their own accord, celestial demons will be bound in form—proceed with focused intent.

The Central Mountain Divine Incantation summons dragons to ascend the clouds,
Commands the confluence of the Yellow River, the nine rivers’ sources,
Permitting no negligence or indulgence, discerning good and evil,
A thousand demons and ten thousand treacheries stand before the Thearch,
None dare test their fate—scorched by the blazing sun,
Vermilion script and jade characters proclaimed for all to hear.
Its forty-eight characters govern the subjugation of the Central Sea’s Water Thearch and the four sources’ waters,
The reckoning of surging flood disasters, and the summoning of water spirits and dragons.
To pass through the calamity of floods or cross great waters,
Inscribe the forty-eight characters in yellow upon blue paper, follow the separate incantation, and cast it into the water—
You will safely traverse, and the water officials will receive you.

Together, these one hundred forty-four characters are the Central Jade Treasure’s Primordial Numinous Elder Lord’s spontaneous script,
Also called the *Precious Kalpa Cavern-Pure Nine Heavens Numinous Writ*, the *Yellow Thearch’s Mighty Incantation*, or the *Yellow Thearch’s Potent Talismanic Text*.

---

**Western Heavens’ Seven Qi: Azure Heaven’s Vermilion Script and Jade Formula**

The Western Azure Heaven, White Thearch’s seven gates,
Golden numina gleam resplendent, Taihua’s ethereal mist flows,
White stones towering, seven qi swirling,
Above abides the Primordial Elder Great Spirit,
Overseeing lung qi, governing the nine heavens’ reckoning,
Verifying and fixing the registers, commanding the ascent of immortals.
Its forty-eight characters govern the summoning of immortal qi.
Students of the Dao should, on their natal day, the first *jiazi*, or the day of Autumn’s Beginning,
Inscribe the forty-eight characters in white upon a white tablet, record their name and date beneath, and cast it upon a sacred mountain’s peak.
After nine years, the immortal officials will arrive, dispatching seven Azure Jade Maidens—
You will attain the body of a divine immortal.

Tai Bai inspects the lungs, Kui and Lou guard the hun-soul,
Wei, Mao, Bi, and Zi govern the seven passes,
Shen unites the Dipper’s handle, receiving the talisman from the Northern Origin.
Its twenty-four characters govern the rectification of the White Thearch’s stellar officials and the celestial degrees’ clarity.
For all deviations of the western asterisms that give rise to various disasters and anomalies,
Inscribe the twenty-four characters in vermilion upon blue paper, expose it in the central courtyard for seven days and seven nights, facing west each evening.
Follow the separate incantation method, then burn the text with fire and scatter the ashes into the azure smoke.
Also carve the twenty-four characters upon white stone and bury it in the west—
Celestial disasters will vanish of their own accord, and the asterisms will return to their proper positions.

Vermilion script and jade characters, the Nine Heavens’ true writ,
Subduing and summoning the myriad qi, universally returning them to the Thearch.
Its sixteen characters govern the subjugation of the Six Heavens’ demonic qi.
To perform this method, inscribe the sixteen characters in black upon a white wooden tablet, direct the text toward the northeast, and follow the separate incantation.
Sevenfold performing this method, ghostly essences will vanish of their own accord, the myriad demons will be bound in form—proceed with focused intent.

The Western Mountain Divine Incantation, Eight Might and Seven Transmissions,
Talismanic water summons dragons, calls forth mountains and dispatches clouds,
Here received and conveyed together to the Thearch’s gate,
Assisting and protecting the perfected, severing and extinguishing the roots of evil.
Should any inauspiciousness arise, block it with the Golden Pass,
Vermilion script and talismanic writs transmitted by wind and fire couriers.
Its forty-eight characters govern the subjugation of the Western Sea’s Water Thearch and the myriad essences within the waters,
Summoning cloud dragons to prevent water disasters.
To know the forms of water spirits or when floods overwhelm the heavens,
Inscribe the forty-eight characters in yellow upon blue paper, follow the separate incantation, and cast the text into the water—
Instantly, you will perceive the myriad water spirits’ forms, and dragons will bear you across the floodwaters, the water officials receiving you.

Together, these one hundred thirty-six characters are the Western Seven Treasures’ Golden Gate’s Radiant Numinous Elder Lord’s spontaneous script,
Also called the *Golden Perfected’s Precious Luminous Cavern-Subtle Chapter*, the *Western Mountain Divine Incantation*, or the *Eight Might Dragon-Summoning Text*.

---

**Northern Heavens’ Five Qi: Mysterious Heaven’s True Writ of Vermilion Script and Jade Formula**

The Northern Mysterious Heaven, five qi meandering,
Within abides the Black Thearch, the Dual August Great Tenuity,
Overseeing talismanic writs, refining immortals in the Eight Might,
Clad in azure skirts and feathered cloaks, dragon-patterned phoenix robes,
Descended by the Supreme Thearch, arrayed along jade steps.
Its forty characters govern the registers of all perfected and divine immortals.
Students of the Dao should, on their natal day, the first *jiazi*, or the day of Winter’s Beginning,
Inscribe the forty characters in black upon a white tablet, record their name and date beneath, and cast it upon a sacred mountain’s peak.
After five years, the immortal officials will arrive, dispatching five Supreme Mystery Jade Maidens—
Your name will be recorded in the immortal registers.

The Northern Asterism assists the kidneys, Dipper and Oxguard the gates,
Maiden, Void, Rooftop, and Encampment open the four directions,
Wall unites the seven stars, seizing the inauspicious and rectifying wrongs,
Averting disasters and sweeping away defilements, illuminating the Dao with resplendent brilliance.
Its thirty-two characters govern the rectification of the northern stellar officials and celestial qi.
For all deviations of the northern asterisms that give rise to various disasters and anomalies,
Inscribe the thirty-two characters in vermilion upon blue paper, expose it in the central courtyard for five days and five nights, facing north each evening.
Follow the separate incantation method, then burn the text with fire and scatter the ashes into the azure smoke.
Also carve the thirty-two characters upon black stone and bury it in the north—
Celestial disasters will vanish of their own accord, and the asterisms will return to their proper positions.

The Northern Mountain Divine Incantation stirs the yang to raise thunder,
Flowing bells gleam and fall, the simian heavens shake with might,
The Northern Feng’s legions, the myriad demons crushed and destroyed.

chunks.original_text: 其二十四字，主摄北海水帝，制水中万精，召蛟龙以负身。 欲渡大水洪灾，及遇水难中万物，黄书二十四字於青纸上，依别咒文，投水中万物形象，身得渡水灾，蛟龙开水道，水官出迎也。 合一百二十字，皆北方洞阴朔单郁绝五灵玄老君自然之书，一名元神生真宝明文，一名北山神咒，一名八威制天文。 诸以启愿求道，投刺行事，莫不悉先东向叩齿三通，捻香咒曰： 无上三天玄元始三炁太上老君，召出我身中三五功曹、左右官使者、左右捧香驿龙骑吏、侍香金童、传言玉女、五帝直符，各三十六人出关。 启此间土地、四面真官，我今正尔烧香关启，愿得十方正真之炁入我身中，令所启上闻，俓御无上至真大圣尊神玉帝几前。 凡学道有所求愿，及修行上法，不先关启则为邪魔所干，不得上达，所修无感，神明不鉴，徒劳无益。 元始五老修道求仙赤书真文玉诀 道言：夫学上法，思神念道，山居静志，修斋诵经，转度七祖，身求神仙，当行《五老赤书真文》上法。 依按旧文，皆先叩齿十二通，咒曰： 玄上高灵，元始尊神，大圣徘徊，万神临轩，三景敷晖，庆云四陈，上告校图，推等九天，今日启愿，投刺灵山，丹书赤字，自然真文，上告五帝，记名玉篇，万神鉴映，日月明言，愿度愿生，愿神愿仙，天地星宿，玄照我身，三官九府，五岳大神，普告无穷，削除罪根，元始大开，莫不纳言，七祖幽魂，受福自然，三途五苦，永离八难，得与三景，同晖紫晨，轮转不灭，身得飞仙。 毕，读刺竟，投於绝岩之中，便散香灵山之上，又叩齿三通，向本命咒曰： 元始监映，仙名已书，三官九府，罪莫不除，散香五帝，告盟太虚，请如所陈，万劫长居。 毕仰咽九炁止。 元始五老禳星宿客灾明天分度真文玉诀 道言：诸天星宿，各有分度，至於俓道错越，更相侵犯，或有异见於四方境域，皆由天气运度否激之灾，有所防出其分国，故以天光转照，玄告不祥。 故元始垂文，和天安地，解灾卸患，安国宁民。 至士精心，依法修行。 灾见之日，书真文如旧法，露於中庭，向方面叩齿十二通，散发仰祝曰： 元始上天，三光高明，回景照耀，四方朗清，运度所冲，激扬流星，五界错越，三统失宁，五斗总辰，七宿明灵，真君大魁，厥讳玉精，夫人皇妃，字曰育婴，总御玄关，回转诸天，今有客灾，玄告不祥，请以真文，赤书上呈，散发谢愆，披露丹诚，惟垂玄监，回复天经，炁不横越，灾不横生，焚烧灵文，散烟玉庭，上景监度，普告万灵，气清三关，灾灭九冥，阴阳调和，国土太平，请以金龙，风马驿呈。 毕，露真文於中庭，金龙镇之。 假令灾在东方，则九日九夜竟，而烧真文，散灰於青烟之中。 凡禳天灾安国宁民法，皆随方然灯，照诸天光。 假令东方，则然九灯，亦可九十灯，亦可九百灯，用金龙一两一枚。 灾在东方，用青缯九十尺，九日九夜。 灾在南方，则然三灯，亦可三十灯，亦可三百灯，用绛缯三十尺，三日三夜。 灾在中央，则然十二灯，亦可百二十灯，亦可千二百灯，用黄缯百二十尺，十二日十二夜。 灾在西方，则然七灯，亦可七十灯，亦可七百灯，用白缯七十尺，七日七夜。 灾在北方，则然五灯，亦可五十灯，亦可五百灯，用黑缯五十尺，五日五夜。

Its twenty-four characters govern the subjugation of the Northern Sea’s Water Thearch, the control of the myriad spirits within waters, and the summoning of dragons to bear one’s body. Should one wish to cross great floods or disasters, or encounter aquatic perils endangering all beings, inscribe the twenty-four characters in yellow upon blue paper, follow the separate incantation, and cast the written form of all beings into the waters—thus may one traverse the flood, dragons will open the waterways, and the Water Officials shall emerge in welcome.

Together, the one hundred twenty characters comprise the *Writ of the Northern Cavern’s Dark Yin, the Solitary North, the Stifled, the Severed, and the Five Numinous Ones of the Mysterious Venerable Lord*—also called the *Spontaneous Writ of the Primordial Spirit’s Birth of True Treasure Radiance*, the *Northern Mountain Divine Incantation*, or the *Eightfold Might’s Celestial Control Writ*. For all who initiate vows to seek the Dao, present petitions, or perform rites, none may proceed without first turning east, knocking the teeth thrice, and holding incense to recite the incantation:

*"Supreme Three Heavens’ Mysterious Primordial Three Qi, Most High Venerable Lord, summon forth the Three and Five Merit Officers within my body, the Left and Right Official Envoys, the Left and Right Incense-Bearing Dragon Couriers, the Golden Lads Attending Incense, the Jade Maidens Transmitting Words, and the Five Thearchs’ Direct Talismans—thirty-six each—to emerge from the passes. I now invoke this land’s earth spirits and the true officials of the four directions. As I burn incense and open the passes, may the qi of the ten directions’ true and numinous ones enter my body, that my supplications ascend and reach the presence of the Most High, Perfectly True, Greatly Sage, Honored Divine Jade Thearch."*

For all who study the Dao and make petitions, or cultivate the supreme methods, failure to first open the passes invites interference by demonic forces, preventing ascent—all efforts will lack resonance, the spirits will not witness them, and labor will be in vain.

**The Five Venerables’ Red Writ of True Writs and Jade Formulas**
The Dao states: Those who study the supreme methods, contemplate the spirits, and meditate upon the Dao—dwelling in mountains with tranquil intent, observing fasts, reciting scriptures, liberating the seven ancestors, and seeking transcendence for themselves—must practice the *Supreme Method of the Five Venerables’ Red Writ of True Writs*. According to the ancient texts, one must first knock the teeth twelve times and recite the incantation:

*"Mysterious and Lofty Numinous Ones, Primordial Honored Spirits, Great Sages who wander, the myriad spirits attend the hall. The Three Radiant Ones spread their brilliance, auspicious clouds array the four quarters. I report to the celestial registers, ascending through the nine heavens. Today I initiate my vow, presenting my petition to the numinous mountain. Vermilion script and red characters, the spontaneous true writ, I report to the Five Thearchs, inscribing my name in the Jade Chapters. The myriad spirits bear witness, the sun and moon illuminate my words. May my vows for deliverance and rebirth, for spirithood and transcendence, be seen by the heavens, earth, and stellar lodges. May the Three Officials and Nine Bureaus, the great spirits of the Five Peaks, universally proclaim without end: sever my roots of sin. The Primordial opens all, none shall reject my words. May the seven ancestors’ imprisoned souls receive blessings spontaneously, forever departing the Three Paths and Five Sufferings, escaping the Eight Perils. May I join the Three Radiant Ones, shining with the Purple Dawn, revolving without end, attaining the flight of transcendence."*

Upon completion, read the petition aloud, cast it into an abyssal cliff, then scatter incense upon the numinous mountain. Knock the teeth thrice more and recite toward your life’s origin:

*"The Primordial oversees and witnesses, my immortal name is inscribed. The Three Officials and Nine Bureaus shall erase all sins. Scatter incense to the Five Thearchs, pledge alliance with the Great Void. As I have petitioned, may I abide for ten thousand kalpas."*

Conclude by inhaling nine qi and ceasing.

**The Five Venerables’ Jade Formula for Dispelling Stellar Calamities and Illuminating Heaven’s Allotted Degrees**
The Dao states: The stellar lodges of the various heavens each hold allotted degrees. When their paths deviate or trespass, encroaching upon one another, or when omens appear in the four directions’ domains, these arise from the misfortune of celestial qi’s cyclical obstructions, forcing them beyond their allotted lands. Thus, the celestial light shifts to illuminate and mystically report the inauspicious.

Therefore, the Primordial bequeathed this writ to harmonize heaven and pacify earth, dispel disasters and relieve afflictions, secure the state and tranquilize the people. Those of utmost sincerity must cultivate this method with devotion. On the day the calamity appears, inscribe the true writ as in the ancient method and expose it in the central courtyard. Face the afflicted direction, knock the teeth twelve times, loosen the hair, and raise a prayer:

*"Primordial of the Upper Heavens, the Three Luminaries’ lofty brilliance, revolving radiance illuminates the four directions’ clarity. Where the cyclical degrees clash, meteors surge and stream. The Five Borders transgress, the Three Systems lose peace. The Five Celestial Dipper’s total stars, the Seven Lodges’ numinous spirits, the True Lords and Great Leaders—whose tabooed name is Jade Essence—with the Empress and Royal Consort, styled ‘Nurturing Infant,’ together govern the Mysterious Pass, revolving the myriad heavens. Now, with this guest calamity, I mystically report the inauspicious. I present the true writ, the red script, to ascend in offering. With loosened hair, I confess my transgressions, revealing my vermilion sincerity. May the Mysterious One deign to witness, restoring the celestial canon. May qi not trespass, disasters not arise wantonly. I burn the numinous writ, scattering smoke in the Jade Court. The Upper Radiance oversees the degrees, universally proclaiming to the myriad spirits. May the Three Passes’ qi be purified, the Nine Darks’ calamities be extinguished. Yin and yang harmonized, the land shall know great peace. I present this with golden dragons and wind-borne couriers."*

Conclude by exposing the true writ in the central courtyard and anchoring it with a golden dragon. If the calamity lies in the east, burn the true writ after nine days and nights, scattering the ashes in the blue smoke.

For all methods to dispel celestial calamities and pacify state and people, light lamps corresponding to the afflicted direction to illuminate the celestial lights. If the east is afflicted, light nine lamps—or ninety, or nine hundred—and use one liang and one piece of golden dragon. For eastern calamities, use ninety feet of blue silk over nine days and nights. For southern calamities, light three lamps—or thirty, or three hundred—and use thirty feet of crimson silk over three days and nights. For central calamities, light twelve lamps—or one hundred twenty, or one thousand two hundred—and use one hundred twenty feet of yellow silk over twelve days and nights. For western calamities, light seven lamps—or seventy, or seven hundred—and use seventy feet of white silk over seven days and nights. For northern calamities, light five lamps—or fifty, or five hundred—and use fifty feet of black silk over five days and nights.

chunks.original_text: 此元始灵宝上元科法。 元始五老禳大劫洪水召蛟龙水官度灾真文玉诀 道言：天地大劫之交，洪水四出，荡秽除恶，万无遗一。 当此之时，天地冥合，人民漂流，无复善恶。 唯有志学之士，得灵宝真文，大劫、小劫之符，乃可乘飞羽而高观，登灵岳而浮翔。 当此之时，神人自当使蛟龙为通路，开水径以渡身，河伯伺迎，不挂津梁也。 乃明灵文之妙，岂拘大劫之交。 遇此之际，当依其文施用，北向叩齿五通，闭气二十五息。 存己身心中生火，火出头顶，而烧四方山林草木，及己身都尽，形骸皆成灰尘，一时飞翔入青烟之上，无复所遗。 思大水浩浩荡荡天下，己身化成蛟龙，随水而流。 因又叩齿二十五通，仰咒曰： 上始回灵，开明九元，天推地转，二炁流传，五行相促，运度机关，阴阳否激，结成灾冲，大劫倾汔，荡秽除氛，九河受对，洪灾激川，水母徘徊，鸟马合群，日月冥会，三景停关，上选种臣，推校玉文，弃恶遗善，清浊永分， 我参帝简，名列九天，大灾四会，赤书所蠲，是日告命，万神咸闻，日月五星，照明我魂，五岳灵山，浮渡我身，九河水府，溟泠大神，开除水径，通利河津，蛟龙应符，摄山送灵，负我渡我，惊驰四奔，丹书赤字，元始真文，金龙驿呈，时刻无间，立须告御，上对帝尊。 毕，引气二十五咽，须臾，自当有开水之神以渡兆身也。 在山，山则浮。 在水，水自开。

This is the *Shangyuan* ritual method of the Primordial Numinous Treasure. The *True Writs and Jade Formulas of the Five Venerables of the Primordial Beginning for Dispelling the Great Kalpa’s Deluge, Summoning the Flood Dragons, and the Water Officials to Deliver from Disaster*.

The Dao declares: When the great kalpa of heaven and earth converges, the deluge surges forth in all directions, sweeping away filth and eradicating evil, leaving nothing behind. At this time, heaven and earth merge in darkness, and the people drift without distinction of good or ill. Only those scholars of resolute aspiration, who obtain the true writs of the Numinous Treasure and the talismans of the great and minor kalpas, may ride upon flying feathers to ascend in lofty observation, or mount the numinous peaks to soar freely. At this moment, divine beings shall command the flood dragons to clear the paths, opening waterways to ferry the body, while the River Earl awaits in attendance, sparing one from the need for bridges or ferries. Thus is the marvel of the numinous writs revealed—how could it be confined to the convergence of the great kalpa?

When encountering such a time, one must follow the writ’s instructions: face north, click the teeth five times, and hold the breath for twenty-five cycles. Visualize a fire arising from within one’s heart and mind, emerging from the crown of the head to burn the mountains, forests, grasses, and trees of the four directions, as well as one’s own body entirely, reducing form and bones to ashes, all of which ascend in a wisp of blue smoke, leaving nothing behind. Envision the great waters surging boundlessly across the world, while one’s body transforms into a flood dragon, drifting with the current.

Then, click the teeth twenty-five times again and recite the incantation while looking upward:

*"The Primordial Beginning revolves the numinous,
Illuminating the Nine Origins.
Heaven turns, earth shifts,
The two qi flow and transmit.
The Five Phases press onward,
The mechanism of destiny revolves.
Yin and yang clash in opposition,
Binding calamity into collision.
The great kalpa nears its end,
Sweeping filth and dispelling miasma.
The Nine Rivers receive their reckoning,
The deluge rages through the streams.
The Water Mother lingers,
Birds and horses gather in herds.
Sun and moon meet in darkness,
The Three Luminaries halt their course.
The exalted select their ministers,
Examining the jade writs in judgment.
Abandoning evil, preserving good,
The pure and turbid are forever divided.
I partake in the imperial register,
My name inscribed in the Nine Heavens.
At the convergence of the four great disasters,
The Red Writs absolve all.
This day, the decree is proclaimed,
All spirits hear it in unison.
Sun, moon, and the Five Stars
Illuminate my soul.
The numinous mountains of the Five Peaks
Float and ferry my body.
The Water Palaces of the Nine Rivers,
The vast and cold great spirits,
Open and clear the waterways,
Unblocking the river fords.
The flood dragons respond to the talisman,
Seizing mountains to escort the numinous.
Bearing me, ferrying me,
They gallop in startled haste in all directions.
The cinnabar script in red characters,
The true writs of the Primordial Beginning,
Presented by the golden dragon couriers,
Without delay, moment by moment,
Must be immediately reported,
Facing the imperial honor above."*

Upon completion, swallow the qi twenty-five times. In an instant, the spirits who open the waters shall appear to ferry your body. If in the mountains, the mountains will float. If in the water, the waters will part.

chunks.original_text: 可谓临危而济。 倏欻之顷，天地都平也。 元始五老摄召北酆鬼魔赤书玉诀 道言：夫受灵宝上法，致神明来降，存念响达，与天真交会，宜先分别鬼魔形象，遏塞干试。 魔精既伏，存思自感，神明易致。 行此之法，依上真文施行，便向东北叩齿三十六通，闭炁九息，而仰咒曰： 三元开明，迥转天常，运推数极，百六乘纲，大劫交会，万妖争行，北酆不拘，放逸鬼宗，群魔纵肆，祆闭天光，上帝有命，普告十方，演明天魔，法教开张，正道治民，扫除不祥，有何小妖，群聚为场，赤书玉文，检摄鬼乡，北酆三官，明速传行，千魔束爽，万鬼送形，流铃交焕，激气太阳，金虎四邀，天丁补亡，大小齐到，不得匿藏，元始所告，列奏上宫。 元始灵宝五帝真文玉诀 道士服青帝真符，束向叩齿九通，思青炁从口入注肝中，生九重青华宝光，彻映项后，书符置前，咒曰： 元上青精，九炁大灵，神光霞散，流映东青，华景郁勃，灌我身形，宫府安镇，宝魂自生，洞达八朗，飞升玉庭。 毕，引炁九咽，上应服者服，佩者佩。 道士服赤帝真符，南向叩齿三通，思赤炁从口入注心中，生三重丹华宝光，彻映胸前，书符置前，咒曰： 丹华流映，宝芝生光，神精彻幽，散灵八方，真符摄炁，啸命朱童，三精焕敷，注我绛宫，赤神安镇，五香溢充，洞映形外，表裹发光，身生水火，独步飞行。 毕，引炁三咽止，如上法。 道士服黄帝真符，向王叩齿十二通，思黄炁从口入注脾中，生十二重黄华宝光，洞映一身，书符置前，咒曰： 总元书灵，回神四乡，黄上散华，五帝交芳。 流精散慢，十二重光，混合我形，万神相迎。 安备黄脾，养炁中房，保龄度劫，永镇无穷。 毕，引炁十二咽止，如上法。 道士服白帝真符，向西叩齿七通，思白炁从口入注肺中，生七重素华宝光，洞映丹田，书符置前，咒曰： 金灵七炁，素华流氛，金精童子，首建元巾，带符摄炁，万神会门，宝光奕奕，照我命根，安镇肺华，万劫长存。 毕，引炁七咽止，如上法。 道士服黑帝真符，向北叩齿五通，思黑炁从口入注肾中，生五重玄宝华光，洞映背外，书符置前，咒曰： 北上太玄，五炁徘徊，宝华五重，流光焕晖，云景郁秀，洞映太微，仰注我身，肾府鲜开，安镇灵宅，万神总归，身生羽服，降形自飞。 毕，引炁五咽止，如上法。 当取灵山向王之竹，全长七尺七节，作神杖，使上下通直，甘竹乃佳。 书黑帝符，着下第二节中； 次白帝符，第三节中； 次黄帝符，第四节中； 次赤帝符，第五节中； 次青帝符，第六节中。 空上一节以通天，空下一节以立地。 蜡封上节，穿中印以元始之章。 又蜡封下节，穿中印以五帝之章。 绛纹作韬，长短大小足容杖。 卧息坐起，常以自随，行来可脱杖衣，隐以出入，每当别着挣处。 以杖指天，天神设礼。 指地，地祇司迎。 以杖指东北，万鬼束形。 乘杖行来，及欲施用，当叩齿三十六通，思五帝直符吏各一人，衣随方色，有五色之光，流焕杖上，五帝玉女各一人，合共卫杖左右。 微咒曰： 太阳之山，元始上精，开张天地，甘竹通灵，直符守吏，部御神兵，五色流焕，朱火金铃，辅翼上真，出幽入冥，召天天恭，摄地地迎，指鬼鬼灭，妖魔束形，灵符神杖，威制百方，与我俱成，与我俱生，万劫之后，以代我形，景为五解，神升上清，承符告命，靡不敬听。
chunks.translated_text:
This may be called deliverance in the face of peril.
In the blink of an instant, heaven and earth are wholly leveled.

The *Primordial Beginning’s Five Elders* summon the demons and devils of the Northern Feng with the *Red Writs and Jade Formulas*.

The Dao declares: Those who receive the supreme methods of the *Numinous Treasure* and cause divine luminaries to descend must first distinguish the forms of demons and devils to block and repel their trials. Once demonic essences are subdued, focused contemplation naturally induces resonance, and divine luminaries are readily summoned. To practice this method, proceed according to the writs of the *Supreme Perfected*:
Face the northeast, click the teeth thirty-six times, and hold the breath for nine cycles. Then, looking upward, recite the incantation:

*"The Three Origins unfold illumination,
Revolving and turning heaven’s constancy.
The reckoning advances to its limit,
A hundred and six weave the cosmic net.
At the great kalpa’s convergence,
Myriad demons contend in their courses.
The Northern Feng knows no restraint,
Releasing the ancestral ghosts.
Hordes of demons rampage wantonly,
Obstructing the light of heaven.
The August Emperor commands,
Proclaiming to the ten directions:
Unfolding the celestial demons’ clarity,
The Dharma’s teachings spread and flourish.
The true Dao governs the people,
Sweeping away inauspiciousness.
What petty demons dare
Gather in throngs?
The Red Writs and Jade Texts
Restrain and seize the demonic realms.
The Three Officials of the Northern Feng,
Swiftly transmit the decree.
A thousand demons bind their radiance,
Ten thousand ghosts surrender their forms.
Flowing bells intermingle in splendor,
Stirring the qi of the Great Yang.
Golden tigers patrol the four quarters,
Heavenly soldiers mend the void.
Great and small, all assemble,
None may conceal or hide.
What the Primordial Beginning proclaims,
Is reported in the Upper Palace."*

The *Primordial Beginning’s Numinous Treasure: True Writs and Jade Formulas of the Five Thearchs*

The Daoist ingests the *True Talisman of the Azure Thearch*, faces east, clicks the teeth nine times, and visualizes azure qi entering through the mouth to infuse the liver, generating nine layers of azure efflorescence and precious radiance that suffuse the nape. With the talisman placed before them, they recite the incantation:

*"Primordial azure essence,
Great spirit of the nine qi,
Divine radiance scattering like rosy clouds,
Flowing and illuminating the eastern azure.
Luminous splendor burgeons luxuriantly,
Irrigating my bodily form.
Palaces and bureaus are pacified and settled,
The precious soul naturally arises.
Penetrating the eightfold clarity,
Ascending to the Jade Court."*

Upon completion, draw in the qi nine times. Those who ingest do so; those who wear it, wear it.

The Daoist ingests the *True Talisman of the Vermilion Thearch*, faces south, clicks the teeth three times, and visualizes vermilion qi entering through the mouth to infuse the heart, generating three layers of cinnabar efflorescence and precious radiance that suffuse the chest. With the talisman placed before them, they recite the incantation:

*"Cinnabar efflorescence flows and illuminates,
Precious mushrooms radiate light.
Divine essence penetrates the obscure,
Dispersing numinous power to the eight directions.
The true talisman gathers qi,
Whistling to summon the Vermilion Youth.
Threefold essence unfolds in splendor,
Infusing my Crimson Palace.
The vermilion spirit is pacified and settled,
Five fragrances overflow and fill.
Luminous within and without,
Inner and outer emit radiance.
The body generates water and fire,
Striding alone in flight."*

Upon completion, draw in the qi three times, as in the method above.

The Daoist ingests the *True Talisman of the Yellow Thearch*, faces the center, clicks the teeth twelve times, and visualizes yellow qi entering through the mouth to infuse the spleen, generating twelve layers of yellow efflorescence and precious radiance that suffuse the entire body. With the talisman placed before them, they recite the incantation:

*"The *Comprehensive Primordial Writ* is numinous,
Revolving the spirit to the four quarters.
Yellow efflorescence scatters above,
The Five Thearchs intermingle their fragrance.
Flowing essence disperses languor,
Twelve layers of radiance.
Merging with my form,
Myriad spirits come to welcome.
Pacifying and preparing the yellow spleen,
Nurturing qi in the central chamber.
Preserving longevity through kalpas,
Eternally settled without end."*

Upon completion, draw in the qi twelve times, as in the method above.

The Daoist ingests the *True Talisman of the White Thearch*, faces west, clicks the teeth seven times, and visualizes white qi entering through the mouth to infuse the lungs, generating seven layers of pristine efflorescence and precious radiance that suffuse the cinnabar field. With the talisman placed before them, they recite the incantation:

*"Golden spirit of the seven qi,
Pristine efflorescence flowing in mist.
The Golden Essence Youth,
First dons the primordial kerchief.
Bearing the talisman to gather qi,
Myriad spirits assemble at the gate.
Precious radiance resplendent,
Illuminating my life-root.
Pacifying and settling the lung’s efflorescence,
Enduring through ten thousand kalpas."*

Upon completion, draw in the qi seven times, as in the method above.

The Daoist ingests the *True Talisman of the Black Thearch*, faces north, clicks the teeth five times, and visualizes black qi entering through the mouth to infuse the kidneys, generating five layers of mysterious precious efflorescence and radiance that suffuse the back. With the talisman placed before them, they recite the incantation:

*"Supreme Mystery of the northern heights,
Five qi meander and linger.
Precious efflorescence in five layers,
Flowing radiance gleaming and luminous.
Cloudy scenes luxuriant and elegant,
Suffusing the Great Subtlety.
Looking upward to infuse my body,
The kidney’s palace freshly opens.
Pacifying and settling the numinous abode,
Myriad spirits wholly return.
The body generates feathered raiment,
Descending in form, it flies of itself."*

Upon completion, draw in the qi five times, as in the method above.

Take bamboo from a numinous mountain facing the center, seven *chi* in length with seven nodes, to fashion a divine staff, ensuring it is perfectly straight from top to bottom; sweet bamboo is best. Inscribe the *Black Thearch’s Talisman* within the second node from the bottom; next, the *White Thearch’s Talisman* within the third node; then the *Yellow Thearch’s Talisman* within the fourth node; next, the *Vermilion Thearch’s Talisman* within the fifth node; and finally, the *Azure Thearch’s Talisman* within the sixth node. Leave the top node empty to connect with heaven, and the bottom node empty to stand upon the earth. Seal the top node with wax and impress it with the *Primordial Beginning’s Seal*. Seal the bottom node with wax and impress it with the *Five Thearchs’ Seal*. Wrap it in a crimson silk sheath, its length and size sufficient to contain the staff. In lying down, resting, sitting, or rising, always keep it by your side. When moving about, you may remove the staff from its sheath, concealing it as you come and go, and place it separately when resting. Point the staff toward heaven, and heavenly spirits will render homage. Point it toward the earth, and earthly deities will receive and welcome. Point it toward the northeast, and myriad ghosts will bind their forms. When riding the staff to travel or intending to employ it, click the teeth thirty-six times and visualize the *Straight Talisman Officers* of the Five Thearchs, each clad in the color of their direction, their five-colored radiance flowing and illuminating the staff. The Jade Maidens of the Five Thearchs, one each, together guard the staff on either side. Softly recite the incantation:

*"Mountain of the Great Yang,
Primordial essence of the Primordial Beginning,
Opening and unfolding heaven and earth,
Sweet bamboo connects with the numinous.
Straight Talisman Officers and Guardians,
Commanding and directing divine soldiers.
Five colors flow and illuminate,
Vermilion fire and golden bells.
Assisting the Supreme Perfected,
Exiting darkness and entering obscurity.
Summoning heaven, heaven obeys;
Seizing earth, earth welcomes.
Pointing at ghosts, ghosts perish;
Demons and devils bind their forms.
The numinous talisman and divine staff
Command authority in all directions.
With me they are perfected,
With me they are born.
After ten thousand kalpas,
They will replace my form.
Their luminosity dissolves into five,
The spirit ascends to the Upper Clarity.
Bearing the talisman to proclaim the decree,
None dare disobey."*

errying me,
They gallop in startled haste in all directions.
The cinnabar script in red characters,
The true writs of the Primordial Beginning,
Presented by the golden dragon couriers,
Without delay, moment by moment,
Must be immediately reported,
Facing the imperial honor above."*

Upon completion, swallow the qi twenty-five times. In an instant, the spirits who open the waters shall appear to ferry your body. If in the mountains, the mountains will float. If in the water, the waters will part.

chunks.original_text: 毕，引五方炁，各五咽，合二十五咽止。 行此道九年，精谨不慢，神真形见，杖则载人空行。 若欲尸解，杖则代形，绦欻之问已成真人。 朔望八节日，当烧香左右，朝拜此杖，则神灵感降，道则成矣。 灵宝八威神策玉诀 当朱书三天太上召伏蛟龙虎豹山精文，着一银木板上。 又书记年月、师姓讳，着一板上。 合二板，内囊裹。 朱书次文，着一板上，着囊外。 凡三板，合封为神策，如传之状。 板悉用银木，长一尺四寸，广二寸四分。 以绛纹之缯作囊，令长一丈二尺，衣之封外板上，下头印口中元始五老之章。 当以梧木函，绛纹作衣，衣函以请策文，着别室。 烧香左右，精心供养，受以佩身。 天下神灵朝夕朝门，给五帝玉童玉女各一十二人，出入游行，五帝侍卫，三界司迎。 生死无复三恶之难，不经泰山，径升九天，衣食自然，位同太极，要自成仙。 至学道士佩此文，施行神咒，以策文指天，天神设礼。 指地，地只朝拜，三界束带。 指神，神礼。 指鬼，鬼自灭爽。 指水，水神通道。 大劫交，洪灾四会，以策召龙，龙为负身。 长修积感，神灵交会，所在施召，降响立到。 千变万奇，适意所从。 出入行年，位唯太极。 皆前从飞龙，从导天钧，凤啸鸾鸣，十二华光，建三七色节，会灵之旛。 精思九年，天仪自备。 灵宝八威神策咒曰： 元始太真，五灵高尊，太华皓映，洞朗八门，五老告命，无幽不关，上御九天，中制酆山，下领河海，十二水源，八威神咒，灵策玉文，召龙负水，收气聚云，束魔送鬼，扫荡妖群，万精摧落，所诛无镯，日月五星，北斗七元，诸天诸地，诸水诸山，玉真所部，溟泠大神，仙王游宴，五帝杖旛，天丁前驱，金虎后奔，玃天猛兽，罗备四关，所呼立到，所召立前，赤书焕落，风火无间，所有摄验，金龙驿传。 毕，叩齿九通，仰天三啸，引天炁三咽，以策文指所告之地，闭炁九息而止。 元始五老镇灵求仙禳灾赤书玉诀 道士隐学，书青帝赤书真文，置东方，则东岳仙官至。 长斋百日，精思灵宝尊神，则天真下降，给青腰玉女九人，取东岳神仙芝草不死之药。 青帝鬼魔远舍九万里，一方凶勃，恶兽毒螫皆不生害心，反善仁人。 长斋修行二十四年，身得神仙，但佩此文，亦得尸解，转轮成仙。 国土东方及春三月有灾，欲使东乡安镇，当赤书青石上，镇东方九日，其灾自灭，凶逆自消。 一方仁人，苍龙来翔，善瑞自至，国土太平。 书文佩身，却诸祸殃，身无横患，常与神明相当，保国宁家，享福无穷。 道士书赤帝真文置南方，则南岳仙官至。 、长斋百日，精思灵宝尊神则天真下降，给朱陵玉女三人，取南岳神仙芝草不死之药。 赤帝鬼魔远舍三万里，一方凶勃恶兽毒螫皆不生害心，反善仁人。 长斋修行二十四年，身得神仙，但佩此文，亦得尸解，转轮成仙。 国土南方及夏三月有灾，欲使南乡安镇，当朱书赤石上，镇南方三日，其灾自灭，凶逆自消。 一方仁人善瑞显明，凤凰来迎，鸾鹤飞呜，天人歌咏，欣国太平。 书文佩身，万灾不生，禳凶却秽，坐致神灵，福庆无穷，延年长生，家致兴隆，国祚安宁。 道士书黄帝真文置中央，则中岳仙官至。 长斋百日，精思灵宝尊神，则天真下降，给黄素玉女十二人，取中岳神仙芝草不死之药。
chunks.translated_text:
When finished, draw the qi of the Five Directions, swallowing each five times, totaling twenty-five swallows to conclude. Practicing this Dao for nine years with utmost diligence and reverence, the divine spirits will manifest in form, and the staff will carry one through the air. Should one seek liberation through the corpse, the staff will replace one’s form, and in an instant, one will become a Perfected. On the first and fifteenth days of the lunar month and the eight seasonal nodes, burn incense to the left and right, and pay homage to this staff—then the numinous spirits will descend in response, and the Dao will be accomplished.

**Numinous Treasure Eight Might Divine Staff Jade Formula**
Inscribe in vermilion the *Three Heavens Supreme Venerable Summoning and Subduing Flood Dragons, Tigers, Leopards, and Mountain Spirits Text* upon a silverwood board. Record the year, month, and the master’s surname and given name on another board. Bind the two boards together and enclose them in a pouch. Inscribe the following text in vermilion on another board and place it outside the pouch. Altogether, three boards are sealed to form the Divine Staff, as in the transmission’s form. All boards must be made of silverwood, one foot and four inches in length, two inches and four fen in width. Use crimson silk to make a pouch twelve feet in length, wrapping it around the outer board, and impress the seal of the Primordial Beginning’s Five Elders at the lower end. Encase it in a sterculia wood box, clad in crimson silk, and store it in a separate chamber with the invocation text for the staff. Burn incense to the left and right, and reverently attend to it. When received, wear it on the body. All divine spirits under heaven will attend at the gates day and night, accompanied by twelve Jade Lads and Jade Maidens of the Five Emperors. When traveling, the Five Emperors will serve as guards, and the administrators of the Three Realms will welcome you. No longer will you face the three evil destinies in life or death; you will bypass Mount Tai and ascend directly to the Nine Heavens. Clothing and sustenance will come naturally, and your rank will equal that of the Great Ultimate. Ultimately, you will attain immortality.

When a Daoist adept wears this text and employs the divine incantations, pointing the staff text toward heaven, the heavenly spirits will offer rites. Pointing it toward earth, the earth spirits will bow in reverence, and the Three Realms will gird their sashes. Pointing it toward spirits, they will pay homage. Pointing it toward ghosts, they will perish and scatter. Pointing it toward water, the water spirits will clear the way. When great kalpas intersect and floods converge from all directions, use the staff to summon dragons, and they will bear you upon their backs. Through long cultivation and accumulated resonance, divine spirits will gather in response—wherever you invoke them, they will arrive instantly. A thousand transformations and ten thousand wonders will follow your will. In your comings and goings through the years, your rank will be that of the Great Ultimate. You will be preceded by flying dragons and guided by the Celestial Pivot, with phoenixes wailing and simurghs singing, twelve radiant blossoms, and the banners of the Three Sevens. After nine years of focused practice, the celestial regalia will naturally be complete.

**Incantation of the Numinous Treasure Eight Might Divine Staff:**
*"Supreme Perfected of the Primordial Beginning,
Five Numinous Ones of exalted honor,
Great Flower’s luminous radiance,
Pervading brightness through the Eight Gates.
The Five Elders proclaim the decree,
No hidden place beyond their reach.
Above, they govern the Nine Heavens;
At the center, they command Mount Feng;
Below, they oversee rivers and seas,
The twelve water sources.
The Eight Might Divine Incantation,
Numinous Staff Jade Text—
Summon dragons to bear the waters,
Gather qi and assemble clouds,
Bind demons and dispatch ghosts,
Sweep away demonic hordes.
Ten thousand spirits crumble,
None escape destruction.
Sun, moon, and Five Stars,
Northern Dipper’s Seven Origins,
All heavens, all earths,
All waters, all mountains,
The Jade Perfected’s retinue,
Vast and profound great spirits,
Immortal Kings at their banquets,
Five Emperors’ staffs and banners,
Celestial Soldiers leading the way,
Golden Tigers rushing behind,
Mighty beasts of the Heavenly Apes,
Arrayed at the Four Passes.
What is called arrives instantly,
What is summoned stands before you.
Vermilion script blazes forth,
Wind and fire unceasing.
All that is commanded is verified,
Transmitted by Golden Dragons."*

When finished, knock the teeth nine times, raise the head and roar thrice toward heaven, draw the celestial qi three times, and point the staff text toward the designated place. Hold the breath for nine cycles, then cease.

**Primordial Beginning Five Elders’ Numinous Stabilizing, Immortality-Seeking, and Disaster-Averting Vermilion Script Jade Formula**
When a Daoist engages in reclusive study, inscribe the Vermilion Script of the Azure Emperor and place it in the East—then the immortals of the Eastern Marchmount will arrive. After a hundred days of fasting and focused meditation upon the Numinous Treasure Venerable Spirits, the Heavenly Perfected will descend, granting nine Azure-Waisted Jade Maidens to gather the Eastern Marchmount’s divine immortality-bestowing lingzhi herbs. The Azure Emperor’s demonic forces will retreat ninety thousand li, and all malevolent influences, ferocious beasts, and venomous creatures in the region will cease their harmful intentions, instead showing kindness to the virtuous. After twenty-four years of fasting and cultivation, one will attain divine immortality. Merely wearing this text will also allow one to achieve liberation through the corpse and transform into an immortal. If the land in the East or during the three months of spring faces calamity, and one wishes to pacify and stabilize the eastern region, inscribe the Vermilion Script upon green stone and place it in the East for nine days—the disaster will vanish, and malevolent rebellions will dissolve. The region will flourish with virtuous people, green dragons will soar, and auspicious omens will arrive spontaneously, bringing great peace to the land. Wearing the inscribed text will avert all misfortunes, shield one from untimely harm, and keep one in constant alignment with the divine. It will protect the nation and secure the household, ensuring boundless blessings.

chunks.original_text: 五炁玄天中有元始黑灵之童，讳玉滋，典黑帝赤书真文。 黑灵童长五寸，衣黑羽衣，手执黑幢，侍文后。 学者应思此神降己身，百日精念，灵真见形，所求立感。 有佩真文，此童亦常在己肾府之中，致玄牙之精。 此五帝灵童，与元始五老同生，主五篇真文，上统九天之炁，下领五岳，中主人五藏，引牙之精补养人身。 服食五牙，不知此神，终而无感，徒劳疲懃。 太上洞玄灵宝赤书玉诀妙经卷上竟 ● 赤书：原误作「赤帝」，据前后文例改。 太上洞玄灵宝赤书玉诀妙经卷下 元始上帝、灵宝尊神、十方大圣、妙行真人，常以一年三诣南帝洞阳官，校定天元，推数劫会，开明赤书五老真文，封题玉碛以付五帝。 元始五炁常以鸡呜上会灵宝玉京玄都上宫，阳光初明，散元始之晖，流观诸天，其气郁郁，其晖熏熏，精如月珠，光如紫云，五气运转，如车之轮，上御九天之阙，中固五帝灵山，下注学士五牙之根。 上宫众圣大智真人皆以其时餐食其晖，仰咽其精，与天相承，致得无穷。 太上道君请注其文，以传至真。 依灵宝玄科，四万劫一传。 如是灵宝明见，出法度人。 十方大圣尊神、妙行真人，同会南圃丹霍之阿三元洞室，封题玉碛，众真侍座，香华伎乐，五千万众。 真文奕奕，光明洞达，五气观晖，照映内外，云景秀朗，如星中之月，奇相众好，不可胜量。 是时北室有精进贤者王福度。 有女名曰阿丘曾，厥年十六，时在浴室中，浴香汤自洗，见金光明曲照，疑有不常，出宇登墙，南向望见道真，神精炜烁，容景焕日。 女意欢喜，叉手作礼，遥称：名丘曾，今遭幸会，身觐天尊，归身十方天中之天，愿赐禁戒，遵承法文，拔诸恶根，早得转轮，改为男形，万劫之后，冀得飞仙。 五帝魔王见女发心大愿，恐过我界，因化作五帝老人，往告女曰：我受十方尊神使命，来语女灵宝法典。 吾道方行，法使仁爱，慈孝为本。 始闻汝父当出女身，已受人言，不可得违。 宜先从之，人道既备，礼训亦足，余可投身。 天监尔心，汝不从父，仙无由度。 女答魔曰：我前生不幸，宿无因绿，功德未充，致作女身。 晨夕悔念，誓守一心，用意坚固，出於自然。 生由父母，命归十天，诚违父教，不如君言。 魔见女执心秉直，不可得干，於是便退。 丘曾自云：道既高邈，无缘得畅，仍聚柴登墙，焚烧我身，冀我形骸，得成飞尘，随风自降，往至道前。 於是火然，丘曾叉手向天言：十方无极天尊，今日归形骸天中之天，愿得时畅，如之散尘。 便投身火中，愤尔无着，身如蹈空，俄顷之问，已见女身化成男子，径至道前，於是受诚。 元始即命南极尊神为女之师，授女真文，给太华玉女、金晨玉童各三百人，众好佩发三十二相，洞映女身。 道告南极尊神：此女前生已奉灵宝，转轮万劫，今得化生人中，见吾出法，即得化形，当更度人九万九千，乃得至真大神。 是时，十方是男是女，皆发正真道意，莫不精心持斋奉戒，修承灵宝，顶有至愿，皆得度世。 道告阿丘曾曰：南极尊神，昔往亦为女子，生於禅黎世界赤明天中，大作功德，诸天所称。 道业未成，乃值火劫数交，天地易位，其在弃荡之例。 南上感其丹至，朱官书其紫名，化其形骸於元君之胞，一劫乃生，得为男身，於南丹洞阳上馆明珠七色宝林，师赤帝梵宝昌阳丹灵真老君，赤书道成，位登南极。
