Within the Five *Qi* Mysterious Heaven resides the Primordial Black Numinous Lad, named Yuzī, who oversees the Vermilion Script of the Black Emperor. The Black Numinous Lad is five inches tall, clad in black feathered robes, and holds a black banner, standing behind the text. Practitioners should meditate upon this spirit descending into their body; after a hundred days of focused contemplation, the numinous perfected will manifest, and prayers will be swiftly answered. Those who wear the true text will have this lad ever present within their kidney palace, bestowing the essence of black *qi*.

These Five Thearch Numinous Lads, born together with the Primordial Five Elders, govern the Five Chapters of the True Text. Above, they command the *qi* of the Nine Heavens; below, they preside over the Five Marchmounts; and within, they master the five viscera, drawing the essence of the Five *Qi* to nourish the human body. Those who ingest the Five *Qi* yet remain ignorant of these spirits will ultimately fail to receive response, their efforts spent in vain.

Thus concludes the *Upper Scroll of the Wondrous Scripture of the Vermilion Script and Jade Formulae of the Numinous Treasure of the Cavernous Mystery*.

---

The *Lower Scroll of the Wondrous Scripture of the Vermilion Script and Jade Formulae of the Numinous Treasure of the Cavernous Mystery*

The Primordial Thearch, the Numinous Treasure Venerable Divinity, the Ten Directions’ Great Sages, and the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct customarily visit the Southern Thearch’s Cavernous Yang Palace thrice yearly to audit the celestial origins, reckon the kalpas’ conjunctions, and unveil the Vermilion Script of the Five Elders’ True Text, sealing it upon jade tablets to bestow upon the Five Thearchs.

The Five *Qi* of the Primordial Thearch regularly ascend at cock’s crow to convene at the Numinous Treasure’s Jade Capital and the Mysterious Metropolis’ Upper Palace. As the yang light first brightens, it scatters the radiance of the Primordial Thearch, surveying the myriad heavens. Its *qi* is lush and luxuriant, its brilliance warm and pervasive, its essence like moonlit pearls, its light like purple clouds. The Five *Qi* revolve like a chariot’s wheel, ascending to govern the gates of the Nine Heavens, securing the numinous mountains of the Five Thearchs in the center, and descending to infuse the roots of the Five *Qi* within the scholars. The assembly of sages and Perfected of Great Wisdom in the Upper Palace all partake of its radiance at that hour, inhaling its essence, aligning with heaven to attain boundlessness.

The Most High Dao Lord requested the transcription of this text to transmit it to the utmost perfected. According to the Mysterious Regulations of the Numinous Treasure, it is transmitted once every forty thousand kalpas. Thus, the Numinous Treasure’s illumination emerges to deliver beings through the Dharma.

The Ten Directions’ Great Sage Venerable Divinities and the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct convened together at the Three Primes’ Cavern Chamber on the Crimson Glow’s Slope in the Southern Garden, sealing the jade tablets. The host of perfected attended in assembly, with fragrant flowers, ritual music, and fifty million in attendance. The True Text shone resplendently, its luminosity penetrating within and without. The Five *Qi* surveyed the radiance, illuminating all directions. Cloudscapes were clear and bright, like the moon amidst stars, their wondrous forms and manifold excellences beyond measure.

At that time, in the Northern Chamber, there was a diligent and worthy man named Wang Fudu. He had a daughter named Aqiuceng, aged sixteen, who was then in the bathhouse, washing herself with fragrant water. She saw a golden light curving and shining, suspecting something unusual. She exited the chamber, climbed the wall, and gazing southward, beheld the Perfected of the Dao. Their divine essence blazed brilliantly, their countenance and luminosity outshone the sun. The girl rejoiced in her heart, clasped her hands in salutation, and called out from afar: “My name is Qiuceng. Today, I am fortunate to encounter this assembly, to behold the Heavenly Venerable, and to return my being to the Heaven within the Heavens of the Ten Directions. I beseech the precepts, to uphold and follow the Dharma texts, to eradicate all evil roots, to swiftly attain rebirth, to transform into a male form, and after ten thousand kalpas, to aspire to become a flying immortal.”

The Five Thearchs’ Demon Kings, seeing the girl make such a great vow, feared she might transcend their realm. They transformed into five elderly thearchs and approached the girl, saying: “We have received the mandate of the Venerable Divinities of the Ten Directions to convey to you the regulations of the Numinous Treasure’s Dharma. Our Dao is now spreading, and its Dharma promotes benevolence and love, with filial piety as its foundation. We have heard that your father intended to marry you off, having already accepted another’s proposal, which cannot be revoked. You should first comply with this, fulfill your human duties, and complete your rites and teachings. Thereafter, you may offer yourself. Heaven observes your heart; if you defy your father, there will be no means for the immortals to deliver you.”

The girl replied to the demons: “In my past life, I was unfortunate, lacking karmic conditions, and my merits and virtues were insufficient, resulting in my rebirth as a woman. From dawn to dusk, I repent and reflect, vowing to maintain a single heart, my resolve firm and arising naturally. My life comes from my parents, but my destiny lies with the Ten Heavens. Though I sincerely defy my father’s teachings, it is not as you say.” The demons, seeing the girl’s steadfast heart and upright conduct, could not sway her, and thus retreated.

Qiuceng declared: “The Dao is lofty and remote, and I have no means to attain it. I shall gather firewood, climb the wall, and burn my body, hoping that my form may become flying ashes, carried by the wind to descend before the Dao.” Thereupon, the fire ignited. Qiuceng clasped her hands toward heaven and said: “Venerable Ones of the Ten Directions’ Boundless Heavens, today I return my form to the Heaven within the Heavens. May I attain timely liberation, to disperse like dust.” She then cast herself into the fire. Suddenly, she felt no attachment, her body as if treading empty space. In an instant, she saw her female form transform into a male, who proceeded directly before the Dao and there received the precepts.

The Primordial Thearch then commanded the Venerable Divinity of the Southern Culmen to be the girl’s master, transmitting to her the True Text. He assigned three hundred Jade Maidens of Great Florescence and three hundred Jade Lads of Golden Dawn, all adorned with the thirty-two marks, their brilliance illuminating the girl’s body. The Dao addressed the Venerable Divinity of the Southern Culmen: “This girl, in her past life, had already revered the Numinous Treasure. After ten thousand kalpas of rebirth, she has now been reborn among humans. Upon witnessing my revelation of the Dharma, she immediately attained transformation of form. She shall further deliver ninety-nine thousand beings before attaining the rank of Great Perfected Divinity.”

At that time, all beings—whether male or female—awakened to the intent of the True Dao, none failing to diligently uphold the fasts and precepts, cultivate and follow the Numinous Treasure. With utmost aspiration in their crowns, all attained deliverance from the world.

The Dao addressed Aqiuceng: “The Venerable Divinity of the Southern Culmen was once also a woman, born in the world of Chanli within the Crimson Brightness Heaven. She performed great merits, praised by all heavens. Before her Dao could be accomplished, she encountered the kalpa of fire, when heaven and earth exchanged positions, and she was among those cast aside. The Southern Culmen was moved by her utmost sincerity, and the Vermilion Palace inscribed her purple name. Her form was transformed within the womb of the Primordial Lady. After one kalpa, she was reborn as a male, dwelling in the Seven-Colored Jeweled Grove of the Upper Bright Pearl Palace in the Southern Vermilion Cavernous Yang. She studied under the Red Thearch’s Brahma Treasure and the Perfected Elder of the Vermilion Yang of the Flourishing Sun. Having mastered the Vermilion Script, she ascended to the rank of the Southern Culmen.”

chunks.original_text: 汝前生与南极同在禅黎世界，於丹阳栢林舍下同发道意。 尔时南极姓皇，字度明，执汝右手，俱题赤石，记姓名南官，即书汝笔迹，题於南轩，今犹尚在，石字亦存，汝忆之否。 丘曾心悟，降目见南极所住南璧刻书：太甲岁七月一日，皇度明、阿丘曾同於丹阳栢林舍下发愿。 合二十三字，字甚分明，忆此未久，忽经天地三易劫运，今乃得生灵宝之世。 道语丘曾：尔今得师南极，岂不高乎。 皆由尔身宿缘所致。 当勤加上业，广度天人，功满德备，自当令尔位及至真，超凌三清，迅足九霞，朝宴太玄也。 丘曾稽首道前：丘曾先身有幸，得生道世，获遇天真，曲逮幽室，光瘾臭形，神启坛内，心应形外，投骸归命，万希一全。 高上玄鉴，转度我身，既得化形，侍对天尊，复蒙南极，得训师宗。 喜惧之怀，靡知所陈。 惟垂成就，明所未闻，玉诀宝妙，愿特哀矜。 太上道君登命赤帝灵童，开九霜玉笈七色之蕴，出灵宝赤书玉诀二卷，以付南极，使依盟授受丘曾，众仙监盟，一时称善。 元始赤书服食青牙导引九炁青天玉诀 元始赤书五篇真文，生於太空之中，天地未光，开辟未明，潜结元根，三景成立，五气行焉。 五色分彩，焕照五方，置以五帝，导以阴阳，轮转九天之纽，运明五星之光，殖地五岳以安镇，澳人五府以养神。 是以至真之人常依阳光之始明，上导九天之和气，下引玉泉之流芳，致元精於太极，招五帝於灵童。 溉之者不衰，存之者无穷。 回万劫而更始，保五牙於颜容，实灵宝之妙诀，恢万圣之宗也。 修养青牙导引束方九黑青天之法：当以立春之日，鸡鸣入室，东向九拜，平坐叩齿九通。 思东方安宝华林青灵始老君，姓焖，讳开明，字灵威仰。 形长九寸，头冠青精玉冠，衣九气青羽飞衣，驾乘苍龙之舆，建鹑旗，从甲乙玄老之官九万人，从九炁青天中下降室内。 须臾化生青炁，郁郁如云之沓烟，溉覆己形，从己口中而入，直下肝府。 又思木德，焕明东方，光照我身，皆令分明。 竟，便开目仰咒曰： 九炁青天，元始上精，皇老尊神，衣服羽青，设御天官，焕明岁星，散晖流芳，陶激身形，上餐朝霞，服引木精，固养青牙，保镇朽龄，肝府充溢，玉芝自生，回年亿劫，色反童婴，五气和合，天地长并。 毕，引青炁九咽止，便服东方赤书玉文一十二字。 右十二字，则九炁青天之名。 导引青帝九炁，服食青牙，皆朱书白纸上，存思讫而顿服之，则引九炁而自降，青帝应声而见形，青牙坚固於东岳，肝府玉芝而自生。 灵童斋真文於寝侧，青腰辅翼而使令九年，积感变化，立成神仙度世，万劫不倾也。 当以鸡鸣阳光始分，东向叩齿九通，摩两掌令热，以手摩试面目九过，仰咒曰： 东方青牙，服食青牙，饮以朝华。 毕，便以舌撩上齿之表，舐唇三过，令玉泉满口而咽之三过。 又引青炁九咽，令镇肝之中，其道毕也。 元始赤书服食赤牙导引三炁丹天玉诀 修养丹牙导引南方丹天之法：当以立夏之日，鸡呜入室，南向三拜，平坐叩齿三通。 思南方梵宝昌阳丹灵真老君，姓洞浮，讳极炎，字赤飘弩。 形长三寸，头冠丹精玉冠，衣三炁丹羽飞衣，驾乘丹龙玉舆，建朱旗，从丙丁越老之官三十万人，从三炁丹天中下降室内。
chunks.translated_text:
In your former life, you dwelled with the Southern Culmen in the world of Chanli, where beneath the cypress grove of Vermilion Yang, you together awakened the intent for the Dao. At that time, the Southern Culmen bore the surname Huang and the style Duming. He took your right hand, and together you inscribed red stone, recording your names in the Southern Palace. Your brushstrokes were also inscribed upon the southern veranda, and they remain there to this day—the stone inscriptions still endure. Do you recall this?

Qiu Zeng’s heart awakened, and lowering his gaze, he beheld the carved script on the southern wall where the Southern Culmen resided: *"On the first day of the seventh month in the year Tai Jia, Huang Duming and A Qiu Zeng together vowed beneath the cypress grove of Vermilion Yang."* Twenty-three characters in all, each distinct and clear. Yet scarcely had he recalled this when suddenly three kalpas of heaven and earth had passed, and now he was reborn into the world of Lingbao.

The Dao spoke to Qiu Zeng: "Now that you have taken the Southern Culmen as your master, is this not exalted? All this arises from the karmic conditions of your past lives. You must diligently cultivate the supreme practice, broadly deliver heaven and humanity, and when your merits are complete and your virtue perfected, you shall naturally ascend to the rank of Perfected, transcend the Three Clarities, swiftly traverse the Nine Radiant Mists, and attend the court of the Great Mystery."

Qiu Zeng bowed his head before the Dao: "In my former life, I was fortunate to be born into the world of the Dao, encountering the Heavenly Perfected. Though I dwelt in the hidden chamber, my form reeked and my bones were foul, yet within the sacred altar my spirit was awakened, my heart responding beyond the body. I cast aside my remains and entrusted my life, hoping for even the slightest salvation. The Most High’s mysterious gaze turned to deliver me—having transformed my form, I now attend the Heavenly Worthy, and further, by the grace of the Southern Culmen, I have received the teachings of a master. Joy and awe fill my heart, yet I know not how to express them. I only pray for your fulfillment, illuminating what I have never heard, and bestowing upon me the jade instructions and treasured mysteries."

The Most High Dao Lord commanded the Vermilion Thearch’s numinous youth to open the nine-frost jade case and the seven-colored treasury, bringing forth two scrolls of the *Lingbao Vermilion Script Jade Instructions*, which he entrusted to the Southern Culmen to transmit to Qiu Zeng in accordance with their covenant. The assembled immortals witnessed the pact and all proclaimed its goodness.

---

**Jade Instructions of the Primordial Vermilion Script: Ingesting the Green Molar and Guiding the Qi of the Ninefold Azure Heaven**

The *Five Chapters of the Primordial Vermilion Script* emerged within the Great Void before the radiance of heaven and earth, before the dawn of creation. They silently wove the primordial root, establishing the Three Luminaries and setting the Five Qi in motion. The five colors divided and shone, illuminating the five directions, appointing the Five Thearchs, and guiding yin and yang. They turned the pivot of the Nine Heavens, revolved the brilliance of the Five Stars, nurtured the Five Peaks to stabilize the earth, and nourished the Five Palaces to cultivate the spirit.

Thus, the Perfected constantly rely upon the first light of yang to guide the harmonious qi of the Nine Heavens above and draw the fragrant flow of Jade Springs below, summoning primordial essence to the Great Ultimate and calling the Five Thearchs to the numinous youth. Those who bathe in it do not decline; those who preserve it know no end. They reverse the myriad kalpas to renew themselves, safeguarding the Five Molars in their countenance—truly the wondrous instructions of Lingbao, the ancestral teaching of the myriad sages.

**Method for Cultivating the Green Molar and Guiding the Qi of the Ninefold Azure Heaven of the East:**
On the day of *Lichun*, at cock’s crow, enter your chamber, face east, and bow nine times. Sit upright and click your teeth nine times. Visualize the Eastern Azure Treasure Flower Grove and the Azure Numinous Origin Elder Lord, whose surname is Men, personal name Kaiming, and style Lingweiyang. His form is nine inches tall, crowned with a cyan essence-jade coronet, clad in a ninefold qi azure feathered flying robe. He rides a chariot drawn by green dragons, bearing a quail banner, attended by ninety thousand officials of Jia-Yi and the Dark Elders, descending from the Nine Qi Azure Heaven into your chamber.

In an instant, azure qi is born, billowing like layered clouds, bathing your form. It enters through your mouth and descends directly into the liver palace. Then visualize the virtue of wood, shining brilliantly in the east, its light illuminating your body until all is distinct.

When finished, open your eyes and recite the incantation while looking upward:
*"Nine Qi Azure Heaven, primordial essence of the Primordial Beginning,
August Elder Divine Lord, clad in azure feathers,
Presiding over the celestial palace, shining like Jupiter,
Scattering radiance and flowing fragrance, refining my form.
Above, I feast on dawn’s mist; below, I guide the essence of wood.
I fortify and nourish the Green Molar, preserving decaying years.
My liver palace overflows, jade mushrooms sprout naturally.
Reversing a hundred million kalpas, my complexion returns to youth.
The Five Qi harmonize, heaven and earth endure together."*

When finished, guide the azure qi and swallow it nine times, then ingest the twelve characters of the Eastern Vermilion Script Jade Text.

These twelve characters are the names of the Nine Qi Azure Heaven. Guide the qi of the Azure Thearch and ingest the Green Molar—write them in vermilion on white paper, visualize them, then swallow them whole. The Nine Qi will descend of their own accord, the Azure Thearch will manifest at the sound of your voice, the Green Molar will be fortified in the Eastern Peak, and jade mushrooms will sprout in your liver palace.

Place the numinous youth in vigil beside your sleeping quarters, with azure-clad attendants serving for nine years. Through accumulated resonance and transformation, you will swiftly attain immortality and transcend the world, standing unshaken for ten thousand kalpas.

At cock’s crow, when the yang light first divides, face east and click your teeth nine times. Rub your palms until warm, then wipe your face nine times. Recite the incantation while looking upward:
*"Eastern Green Molar, ingesting the Green Molar,
Drinking the morning’s blossoms."*

When finished, use your tongue to stroke the outer edge of your upper teeth three times, then lick your lips three times, filling your mouth with Jade Spring and swallowing it three times. Guide the azure qi nine times to settle within your liver. This completes the method.

---

**Jade Instructions of the Primordial Vermilion Script: Ingesting the Vermilion Molar and Guiding the Qi of the Threefold Cinnabar Heaven**

**Method for Cultivating the Vermilion Molar and Guiding the Qi of the Threefold Cinnabar Heaven of the South:**
On the day of *Lixia*, at cock’s crow, enter your chamber, face south, and bow three times. Sit upright and click your teeth three times. Visualize the Southern Brahma Treasure Flourishing Yang Vermilion Numinous Elder Lord, whose surname is Dongfu, personal name Jiyan, and style Chibiaonu. His form is three inches tall, crowned with a cinnabar essence-jade coronet, clad in a threefold qi vermilion feathered flying robe. He rides a chariot drawn by cinnabar dragons, bearing a vermilion banner, attended by three hundred thousand officials of Bing-Ding and the Luminous Elders, descending from the Three Qi Cinnabar Heaven into your chamber.

chunks.original_text: 须臾化生赤炁，焕焕如火之明，溉覆己形，从己口中而入，直下心宫。 又思火星焕明南方，光照我身，皆令分明。 竟，便开目仰咒曰： 三炁丹天，朱宫灵童，元始上帝，参驾赤龙，丹羽飞衣，锦被明光，驱策灵官，运导阴阳，三炁吐晖，灌我绛宫，赤子保镇，炼牙饬容，朝餐朱景，玉芝满充，回停劫年，朽骸反童，长龄天地，水享无穷，身生水火，变化百方。 毕，引赤炁三咽止，便服南方赤书玉文一十二字。 右十二字，则三炁丹天之名。 导引赤帝三炁，服食丹牙，皆赤书白纸上，存思讫而顿服之，则引赤炁而充溢，芳芝玄注於绛官。 赤帝降真於存思，受赤文於灵童，保丹牙以永固，养三炁於祝融，策赤圭以通灵，运五篇以召神。 长斋感於太寂，上天书名於南窗，可谓坐致而不难，永享而无穷也。 当以鸡鸣阳光始分，南向叩齿三通，摩两掌令热，以摩试面目三过，仰咒曰： 南方朱丹，服食朱丹，饮以丹池。 毕，以舌撩下齿之表，舐唇嗽口，令玉芝满口而三咽之。 又引赤炁三咽，令镇心宫之中，其道毕也。 元始赤书服食戊己导引元炁黄天玉诀 修养黄牙导引戊己十二炁黄天之法：当以春分、夏节、秋分、冬节四日，鸡呜入室，向王十二拜，平坐叩齿十二通。 思中央玉宝元灵元老君，姓通斑，讳元氏，字含枢纽。 形长一尺二寸，头冠黄精玉冠，衣五色黄羽飞衣，驾乘黄龙玉舆，建黄旗，从神戊己伧老之官十二万人，从十二炁黄天中下来降室内。 须臾化生黄炁，勃勃如景云之吐晖，灌覆己形，从口中而入，直下脾府。 又思土星焕明中天，光照我身，皆使分明。 竟，便开目仰咒曰： 中黄嵩山，元炁徘徊，上有元老，总统四垂，参驾黄龙，五色羽衣，运导九天，转轮璇玑，焕明土星，流光散晖，玉英芳芝，充溢四肢，陶灌我身，脾府鲜开，养牙餐精，万神总归，检魂制魄，仙炼八威，表裹洞明，长生不衰，通真达灵，升入太微。 毕，引黄炁十二咽止，便服中央赤书玉文一十六字。 右十六字，则中央黄天之名。 导引黄帝十二炁、服食黄牙，皆赤书白纸上，存思讫，顿而服之。 则上引元炁於九天，下注玄膺於妙门，太仓气粮而自充，脾府不澳而自熏。 黄老应响以玄和，灵童披襟而告文。 黄素运走，给命东西，妙哉玉诀，为万仙之端。 当以鸡鸣阳光始分，向王叩齿十二通，摩两掌令热，以摩拭面目十二过，咒曰： 中央戊己，昂昂太山，服食精炁，饮以醴泉。 毕，以舌撩舌上玄膺，取玉泉，舐唇三过，咽之。 又引黄炁一十二咽，令镇脾府之中，其道毕也。 元始赤书服食素牙导引七炁素天玉诀 修养素牙导引七炁素天之法：当以立秋之日，鸡呜入室，西向七拜毕，平坐叩齿七通。 思西方七宝金门皓灵皇老君，姓上金，讳昌开，字曜魄宝。 形长七寸，头冠白精玉冠，衣白羽飞衣，驾乘白龙玉舆，建素旗，从神庚辛胡老之官七十万人，从七炁素天中下来降室内。 须臾化生白炁，皓皓如秋云之罗天，灌覆己形，从口中而入，直下肺府。 又思金星焕明，西方光照我身，皆使分明。 竟，便开目仰咒曰： 七灵七门，皓映西华，中有素皇，元始之家，参驾白龙，七炁峨峨，徘徊玉门，散精朱霞，金星吐晖，芳芝滂沱，玄澳我身，养我素牙，明石鲜光，万劫不殂，服以流泉，餐以太和，九天上帝，给以玉华，保年驻颜，白景敷罗，长存天地，三光同遐。

After a moment, a vermilion qi arises, radiant as the brilliance of fire, bathing and enveloping your form. It enters through your mouth and descends directly into the Heart Palace. Then visualize the Fire Star blazing brightly in the south, its light illuminating your body in full clarity.

When this is complete, open your eyes and recite the incantation while looking upward:

*"Threefold Qi Cinnabar Heaven,
Vermilion Palace Numinous Youth,
Primal Thearch of the Origin,
Attended by a triad of crimson dragons,
Clad in a feathered flying robe of cinnabar,
Adorned with a luminous brocade of radiance,
Driving and commanding the numinous officials,
Directing and guiding yin and yang,
The Threefold Qi exhales its splendor,
Irrigating my Crimson Palace.
The Red Child preserves and stabilizes,
Refining the molar and adorning the countenance.
At dawn, I feast upon vermilion effulgences,
Jade mushrooms fill me to abundance.
The turning of kalpas halts,
Withered bones revert to youth.
Longevity spans heaven and earth,
Endless as the waters’ flow.
Body born of water and fire,
Transforming in a hundred directions."*

When finished, guide the vermilion qi and swallow it three times, then cease. Next, ingest the twelve vermilion-script jade characters of the Southern Heaven.

These twelve characters are the names of the Threefold Cinnabar Heaven. To guide the Threefold Qi of the Vermilion Thearch and ingest the cinnabar molar, write them in vermilion script on white paper. After visualization, consume them at once, thereby drawing in the vermilion qi to fill and overflow, while fragrant mushrooms and mysterious infusions pour into the Crimson Palace. The Vermilion Thearch descends in true form through visualization, receiving the vermilion script from the Numinous Youth. Preserve the cinnabar molar to ensure permanence, nurture the Threefold Qi within Zhurong, wield the vermilion jade tablet to commune with the numinous, and employ the Five Chapters to summon the spirits. Through prolonged fasting and devotion in profound stillness, your name is inscribed in the Southern Window of Heaven. This may be called effortless attainment, yielding boundless and eternal fruition.

At cock’s crow, when yang light first divides, face south, click your teeth three times, rub your palms until warm, and wipe your face and eyes three times. Then recite the incantation while looking upward:

*"Vermilion of the South,
Ingest the vermilion,
Drink from the Vermilion Pool."*

When finished, use your tongue to stroke the outer side of your lower teeth, lick your lips, and rinse your mouth until jade mushrooms fill it, then swallow three times. Again, guide the vermilion qi and swallow it three times, allowing it to settle within the Heart Palace. With this, the method is complete.

---

**Primal Vermilion Script for Ingesting the Molar and Guiding the Primal Qi of the Yellow Heaven**

**Method for Cultivating the Yellow Molar and Guiding the Twelvefold Qi of the Yellow Heaven of the Center:**
On the days of the Spring Equinox, Summer Solstice, Autumn Equinox, and Winter Solstice, at cock’s crow, enter your chamber, face the center, and bow twelve times. Sit upright and click your teeth twelve times. Visualize the Central Jade Treasure Primal Numinous Elder Lord, whose surname is Tongban, personal name Yuanshi, and style Han Shuniu. His form is one foot two inches tall, crowned with a yellow essence-jade coronet, clad in a five-colored yellow feathered flying robe. He rides a chariot drawn by yellow dragons, bearing a yellow banner, attended by one hundred twenty thousand officials of Wu-Ji and the Luminous Elders, descending from the Twelvefold Qi Yellow Heaven into your chamber.

After a moment, a yellow qi arises, vibrant as the effulgence of auspicious clouds, bathing and enveloping your form. It enters through your mouth and descends directly into the Spleen Palace. Then visualize the Earth Star blazing brightly in the center of the sky, its light illuminating your body in full clarity.

When this is complete, open your eyes and recite the incantation while looking upward:

*"Central Yellow Song Mountain,
Primal Qi meanders in cycles,
Above resides the Primal Elder,
Governor of the Four Quarters,
Attended by a triad of yellow dragons,
Clad in a five-colored feathered robe,
Directing and guiding the Nine Heavens,
Turning the wheel of the celestial pivot.
The Earth Star blazes resplendent,
Its flowing light scatters radiance.
Jade blossoms and fragrant mushrooms
Fill and suffuse the four limbs.
They refine and irrigate my body,
The Spleen Palace unfurls in freshness.
Nurturing the molar and ingesting essence,
The myriad spirits converge in unity.
Governing the hun and restraining the po,
Refining the Eight Potencies in immortality’s alchemy.
Inner and outer shine with luminous clarity,
Eternal life without decay,
Communing with the numinous and attaining the real,
Ascending into the Grand Tenuity."*

When finished, guide the yellow qi and swallow it twelve times, then cease. Next, ingest the sixteen vermilion-script jade characters of the Central Heaven.

These sixteen characters are the names of the Central Yellow Heaven. To guide the Twelvefold Qi of the Yellow Thearch and ingest the yellow molar, write them in vermilion script on white paper. After visualization, consume them at once. This will draw the Primal Qi from the Nine Heavens above and infuse the Mysterious Gullet below, while the Granary of Qi naturally fills, and the Spleen Palace, unobstructed, steams with fragrance. The Yellow Elder responds in mysterious harmony, and the Numinous Youth unfastens his robe to reveal the script. The Yellow Simplicity circulates and flows, bestowing destiny to east and west. Wondrous indeed is this jade formula, the origin of the myriad immortals.

At cock’s crow, when yang light first divides, face the center, click your teeth twelve times, rub your palms until warm, and wipe your face and eyes twelve times. Then recite the incantation:

*"Central Wu-Ji,
Lofty and majestic as Mount Tai,
Ingest the essence of qi,
Drink from the Sweet Spring."*

When finished, use your tongue to stroke the Mysterious Gullet above the tongue, gather the Jade Spring, lick your lips three times, and swallow. Again, guide the yellow qi and swallow it twelve times, allowing it to settle within the Spleen Palace. With this, the method is complete.

---

**Primal Vermilion Script for Ingesting the White Molar and Guiding the Sevenfold Qi of the White Heaven**

**Method for Cultivating the White Molar and Guiding the Sevenfold Qi of the White Heaven of the West:**
On the day of *Liqiu*, at cock’s crow, enter your chamber, face west, and bow seven times. Sit upright and click your teeth seven times. Visualize the Western Seven Treasures Golden Gate Radiant Numinous August Elder Lord, whose surname is Shangjin, personal name Changkai, and style Yaopo Bao. His form is seven inches tall, crowned with a white essence-jade coronet, clad in a white feathered flying robe. He rides a chariot drawn by white dragons, bearing a white banner, attended by seven hundred thousand officials of Geng-Xin and the Hu Elders, descending from the Sevenfold Qi White Heaven into your chamber.

After a moment, a white qi arises, luminous as autumn clouds veiling the sky, bathing and enveloping your form. It enters through your mouth and descends directly into the Lung Palace. Then visualize the Metal Star blazing brightly in the west, its light illuminating your body in full clarity.

When this is complete, open your eyes and recite the incantation while looking upward:

*"Seven Numinous Seven Gates,
Resplendent in the glory of the Western Florescence,
Within resides the White August,
Abode of the Primal Origin,
Attended by a triad of white dragons,
The Sevenfold Qi towering and majestic,
Meandering at the Jade Gate,
Scattering the essence of vermilion auroras.
The Metal Star exhales its splendor,
Fragrant mushrooms cascade in abundance.
The Mysterious Gullet irrigates my body,
Nurturing my white molar.
Luminous stones gleam with fresh radiance,
Undying through ten thousand kalpas.
I drink from the flowing spring,
Feast upon the Great Harmony.
The Nine Heavens’ Thearch
Bestows jade blossoms.
Preserving years and halting aging,
White effulgences spread and unfold.
Abiding long with heaven and earth,
The Three Luminaries share eternity."*

When finished, guide the white qi and swallow it seven times, then cease. The method is now complete.

chunks.original_text: 毕，引白炁七咽止，便服西方赤书玉文一十二字。 右十二字，则西方七炁素天之名。 导引白帝七炁、服食素牙，皆赤书白纸上，存思讫，顿而服之。 则七炁天神玄注素晖，灌溉明石，自生玉芝，肺宫开明而纳真，太仓不哺而自熏，素灵应响而驱策，参承九天之门，养之不休，寿与元始同年。 当以鸡呜阳之始分，向西叩齿七通，摩两掌令热，以摩拭面目七过，仰咒曰： 西方明石，服食明石，饮以灵液。 毕，以舌撩齿上，舐唇漱口，令玉芝满口，便三咽之。 又引白炁七咽，令镇肺府之中，其道毕也。 元始赤书服食玄牙导引五炁玄天玉诀 修养玄牙导引五炁玄天之法：当以立冬之日，鸡鸣入室，北向五拜毕，平坐叩齿五通。 思北方洞阴朔单郁绝五灵玄老君，姓黑节，讳灵会，字隐侯局。 形长五寸，头冠玄精玉冠，衣玄羽飞衣，驾乘黑龙玉舆，建皂旗，从神壬癸羌老之官五十万人，从五炁玄天中下来降室内。 须臾化生黑晖，黑晖相杳，光若流星之焕曜，灌覆己形，从口中而入，直下肾府。 又思水星焕明，北方光照我身，皆使分明。 竟，便开目仰咒曰： 北方玄天，五炁散灵，上有大神，始老元精，驾龙建旗，游宴上京，是日元吉，庆云敷荣，飞芝流洒，滂沱四盈，玉女玄澳，灌我身形，肾宫充镇，朽牙坚生，五府纳真，上通神明，五老降接，仙道早成，变化水火，衣服羽青，飞行太空，游造帝庭。 寿同三景，万劫长龄。 毕，引黑炁五咽止，便服北方赤书玉文一十二字。 右十二字，则北方五熙玄天之名。 导引黑帝五熙、服食玄牙，皆赤书白纸上，存思‘讫，顿而服之。 则玄老负籍於朱官，灵童题简於赤文，五炁流芝，澳於枯宅，玉泉滂沱，生於端门，神镇灵阙，肾府生需，太玄玉女，役使东西，万劫不衰，玄老同存。 当以鸡鸣阳光始分，北向叩齿五通，摩两掌令热，以摩拭面目五过，仰咒曰： 北方玄滋，服食玄滋，饮以玉饴。 毕，以舌撩下齿之裹，舐唇漱口，令玉芝满口，三咽。 又引黑炁五咽，令镇肾府之中，其道毕也。 道言：导引餐牙之法，当以八节之日，各依其方入室清斋，存思五老形象，咒祝毕，各随方导引服诸天名。 行之八年，仙官下降，玉女侍卫，身生光明，照映十方，出入游行，五帝稽首，三界司迎。 此位准三天上真之号。 此文具藏南圃赤洞五城之内，三天仙官备守，仙楼十二重，藏以紫玉之匮，刻以黄金之札，封以丹芝光草，印以太上中章，皆授宿有仙籍、名书丹台、应为三天上真之人。 自无此挺，终不得盼篇目。 旧科四百年一出传。

After visualization, burn and ingest them. Then the celestial spirits of the Sevenfold Qi will infuse with a pristine radiance, irrigating the luminous stones, and jade mushrooms will sprout spontaneously. The Lung Palace opens in clarity to receive the true, the Granary of Great Harmony ceases its feeding yet remains suffused, and the white numen responds in resonance to drive and command. At the first cock’s crow, when yang begins to divide, face west, knock the teeth seven times, rub the palms until warm, and wipe the face and eyes seven times. Then recite while looking upward:
*"Western luminous stone,
Consume the luminous stone,

When finished, use the tongue to stroke the upper teeth, lick the lips, and rinse the mouth until jade mushrooms fill it, then swallow three times. Again, guide the white qi and swallow it seven times to settle within the Lung Palace. The method is now complete.

**Primal Origin’s Vermilion Script: Ingesting the Mysterious Molar and Guiding the Fivefold Qi of the Mysterious Heaven Jade Formula**

**Method for Cultivating the Mysterious Molar and Guiding the Fivefold Qi of the Mysterious Heaven:**
On the day of the Winter Solstice, at cock’s crow, enter the chamber, face north, and perform five bows. Sit upright and knock the teeth five times. Visualize the Dark Elder Lord of the Five Numinous Spirits of the Northern Cavern-Yin, Solitary and Boundless, named Black Nodes, with the style Hidden Marquis Bureau. His form is five inches tall, crowned with a Dark Essence Jade Diadem, clad in a dark feathered flying robe, riding a black dragon jade chariot, bearing a black banner. He is attended by five hundred thousand officials of the Ren and Gui divisions, the Qiang and Elder ranks, descending from the midst of the Fivefold Qi’s Mysterious Heaven into the chamber. In an instant, black radiance arises, merging into obscurity, its brilliance like streaming stars. It washes over one’s form, entering through the mouth and descending directly to the Kidney Palace. Next, visualize the Water Star shining brightly, its northern light illuminating the body, all made distinct.

When finished, open the eyes and recite while looking upward:
*"Northern Mysterious Heaven,
Fivefold Qi dispersing numinosity,
Above resides the Great Spirit,
Primal Elder of the Original Essence.
Riding dragons and bearing banners,
Roaming and feasting in the Upper Capital.
This day is supremely auspicious,
Auspicious clouds spread their glory.
Flying mushrooms stream and scatter,
Abundant in all four directions.
Jade maidens of the Mysterious Gullet
Irrigate my form.
The Kidney Palace is firmly settled,
Decayed teeth regrow and strengthen.
The Five Palaces receive the true,
Communing upward with the numinous spirits.
The Five Elders descend to welcome,
The immortal path is swiftly achieved.
Transforming water and fire,
Clad in feathered azure robes.
Soaring through the Great Void,
Roaming to the Imperial Court.
Lifespan equals the Three Luminaries,
Eternal through ten thousand kalpas."*

When finished, guide the black qi and swallow it five times, then cease. Next, ingest the twelve-character Vermilion Script Jade Text of the Northern Quarter. These twelve characters are the names of the Fivefold Radiance of the Northern Mysterious Heaven. Guide the Black Thearch’s Fivefold Radiance and consume the mysterious molar—both inscribed in vermilion on white paper. After visualization, burn and ingest them. Then the Dark Elder will bear records in the Vermilion Palace, and the numinous youths will inscribe the red script. The Fivefold Qi flows with mushrooms, irrigating the withered abode. Jade springs surge abundantly, sprouting at the Central Gate. The spirit settles the numinous chamber, the Kidney Palace flourishes with vitality, and the Jade Maidens of the Great Mystery are dispatched east and west. Unwaning through ten thousand kalpas, one abides together with the Dark Elder.

At the first cock’s crow, when yang light begins to divide, face north, knock the teeth five times, rub the palms until warm, and wipe the face and eyes five times. Then recite while looking upward:
*"Northern mysterious essence,
Consume the mysterious essence,
Drink the jade nectar."*

When finished, use the tongue to stroke the inner side of the lower teeth, lick the lips, and rinse the mouth until jade mushrooms fill it, then swallow three times. Again, guide the black qi and swallow it five times to settle within the Kidney Palace. The method is now complete.

---

The Dao states: The method for guiding and consuming the molar should be practiced on the days of the eight solar terms. Enter the chamber in each respective direction, purify with a fast, visualize the forms of the Five Elders, and recite the incantations. Afterward, guide and ingest the names of the heavens according to each direction. Practicing this for eight years, immortal officials will descend, jade maidens will attend, and the body will emanate light, illuminating the ten directions. Moving in and out, the Five Thearchs will bow in reverence, and the three realms’ administrators will welcome you. This rank corresponds to the titles of the Perfected of the Three Heavens.

This text is preserved within the Southern Garden’s Red Cavern and Five Cities. The immortal officials of the Three Heavens guard it in full, stored within a twelve-tiered immortal tower, encased in a purple jade coffer, inscribed on yellow gold tablets, sealed with cinnabar mushrooms and luminous grass, and stamped with the Central Seal of the Most High. It is only transmitted to those whose names are recorded in the immortal registers, inscribed on the Cinnabar Terrace, and destined to become the Perfected of the Three Heavens. Without such inherent endowment, one will never glimpse its pages. By ancient statutes, it is transmitted once every four hundred years.

chunks.original_text: 当以鸡鸣安身定神，以次行事，先服东方青牙炁，次南方，次中央，次西方，次北方，如常法五帝。 毕，便叩齿三十六通，咽黑二十五过止，又都咒曰： 白石岩岩，行源涌泉，洞以玉浆，饮之长生，寿命益长。 毕，以舌撩口上下中央，令玉芝满口而三三咽。 又引炁二十五过，极炁而咽之，其道都毕也。 元始五老存思五岳五帝招灵求仙玉诀 凡修灵宝五篇真文，思神念仙，诸所求欲，时闻九天真人诣房，身得神仙。 当以立春后甲寅、乙卯日沐浴清斋，平旦入室，东向九拜，平坐叩齿九通，关启身神。 毕，闭眼思东岳泰山青帝君，姓玄丘，讳目陆。 形长九寸九分，头戴青玉通天宝冠，衣青羽飞衣，驾乘青龙，从青腰玉女十二人，从东方来降兆室。 良久，青帝君化为婴儿始生之状，在青炁之中，随炁从兆口入，径至肝中。 思心生赤炁，以灌绕肝府，青赤二炁混沌相着，如庆云之杳烟，觉肝中熏热，便九咽，仰咒曰： 东天九门，中有始皇，出入三清，遨宴华房，安镇灵岳，役运句芒，上绕青霞，九千万重，参驾羽辈，十二飞龙，左侍青腰，右卫神童，把执简籍，青札玉文，校定仙名，列言上宫，今日王吉，请陈所言，身佩赤书，名参帝堂，愿神愿仙，青录簿中，上回灵驾，来降我房，二炁混合，化形婴蒙，安治肝府，招致华光，灵晖流灌，面生金容，坐致自然，神明交通，身得长生，天地无穷。 毕，引青炁九咽止。 行此道九年，则东岳灵官青帝降真，致青腰玉女九人，为兆通达，上闻九天，生死父母、罪书责役，配属束岳，则神明更相嘱付，灭除罪名，自得解脱，升上福堂。 此法妙重，生死津梁。 当以立夏后丙午、丁巳之日，沐浴清斋，正中入室，南向三拜，平坐叩齿三通，关启身神。 毕，闭目思南岳霍山赤帝君，姓爓，讳洋光。 形长三寸三分，头戴赤玉通天宝冠，衣丹羽飞衣，驾乘赤龙，从赤圭玉女十二人，从南方来降兆室。 良久，赤帝君化为婴儿始生之状，在赤炁之中，随炁从兆口入，径至心中。 思脾生黄炁以灌绕心宫，黄赤二炁混沌相着，如炎火之烂光，觉心中熏热，便三咽，仰咒曰： 丹天三炁，南上玉门，中有大神，赤帝灵君，衣丹带符，飞文羽裙，驾乘赤龙，玉舆绛云，南霍灵山，万神高尊，出入三清，上宴九玄，赤圭侍役，玉童卫真，把执简录，绛簿玉文。 校定仙品，轻重上闻，今日大王，灵岳开仙，上回万神，降我三门，变化婴儿，镇心安魂，混合二炁，缠我命根，长与祝融，驾乘景云，逍遥南阿，天地长存。 毕，引赤炁三咽止。 行此道三年，则南岳霍山灵官、赤帝降真，致赤圭玉女三人为兆驱使，通致启愿，万求皆从。 生死父母、罪书刑责，配属南岳，皆得解除，刑名释散，升上天官。 其法妙重，生死开通也。 当以春分、夏节、秋分、冬节后戊辰、戊戌、己丑、己未之日，沐浴清斋，日映入室，向王十二拜，平坐叩齿十二通，关启身神。 毕，闭眼思中岳嵩山黄帝君，姓角，讳普生。 形长一尺二寸，头戴黄玉通天宝冠，衣黄羽飞衣，驾乘黄龙，从黄素玉女十二人，从中岳来降兆室。 良久，黄帝君化为婴儿始生之状，在黄炁之中，随炁从兆口入，径至脾府。 思肺生白炁，灌绕脾宫，黄白二炁混沌相着，似黄云之回天，觉脾中熏热，便十二咽，仰咒曰：

At cock’s crow, compose the body and settle the spirit, then proceed in order. First ingest the green-toothed qi of the Eastern Direction, then the Southern, then the Central, then the Western, then the Northern, following the standard method of the Five Thearchs. When finished, knock the teeth thirty-six times, swallow saliva twenty-five times, and conclude with the incantation:

*"White rock, sheer and steep,
Flowing source, gushing spring,
Washed with jade nectar,
Drink and live forever,
Lifespan ever lengthening."*

When done, stir the tongue around the upper, lower, and central parts of the mouth until jade mushrooms fill the mouth, then swallow three times in sets of three. Again draw qi twenty-five times, hold it to the utmost, and swallow. The Dao is now complete.

**The Primordial Five Elders’ Visualization of the Five Peaks and Five Thearchs: Jade Formula for Summoning Spirits and Seeking Immortality**

Whenever cultivating the Five Chapters of the Numinous Treasure’s true writs, visualizing deities and reciting immortal names, or seeking any desire, one will at times hear the Perfected of the Nine Heavens arrive at one’s chamber and attain the body of a divine immortal.

On the *jiayin* or *yimao* day after the Beginning of Spring, bathe, purify, and fast. At dawn, enter the chamber, face east, and bow nine times. Sit upright, knock the teeth nine times, and summon the body’s spirits. When finished, close the eyes and visualize the Green Thearch Lord of Mount Tai of the Eastern Peak, surnamed Xuānqiū, personal name Mùlù. His form is nine inches and nine parts tall, wearing a green jade *tongtian* precious crown, clad in a green feathered flying robe, riding a green dragon, attended by twelve green-waisted jade maidens. He descends from the Eastern Direction into your chamber. After a long while, the Green Thearch Lord transforms into the form of a newborn infant, within green qi, following the qi through your mouth to enter directly into the liver. Visualize the heart generating red qi to bathe and surround the liver palace. The green and red qi merge in primordial chaos, like auspicious clouds in boundless mist. When you feel the liver suffused with warmth, swallow nine times and recite the incantation while looking upward:

*"Nine gates of the Eastern Heaven,
Within dwells the Primordial August One,
Who enters and exits the Three Clarities,
Roaming and feasting in the Flowery Chambers.
Pacifying and guarding the numinous peak,
Commanding and dispatching Gou Mang,
Above entwined with green auroras,
Ninety million layers thick.
Attended by feathered ranks,
Twelve flying dragons,
Left served by green-waisted maidens,
Right guarded by divine youths,
Holding jade tablets and registers,
Inscribed with green writs.
Examining and determining immortal names,
Reporting them to the Upper Palace.
Today, O August King, is most auspicious.
I present my petition:
My body bears the Red Writ,
My name enters the Thearch’s hall.
I vow to attain divinity, I vow to attain immortality,
Recorded in the green register.
Turn back your numinous carriage,
Descend into my chamber.
The two qi merge and blend,
Transforming into an infant’s form.
Pacifying and governing the liver palace,
Summoning radiant brilliance.
Numinous splendor flows and bathes,
My face assumes a golden countenance.
Seated, I attain spontaneity,
Spirits and gods commune.
My body attains longevity,
Heaven and Earth know no end."*

When finished, draw green qi and swallow nine times.

Practicing this Dao for nine years, the numinous officials of the Eastern Peak and the Green Thearch will descend in truth, sending nine green-waisted jade maidens to serve you, enabling communication with the Nine Heavens. Your parents in life and death, your karmic records and punitive labors, assigned to the Eastern Peak, will have their spirits re-entrusted, sins erased, and liberation attained, ascending to the Hall of Blessings. This method is wondrous and profound, a bridge between life and death.

On the *bingwu* or *dingsi* day after the Beginning of Summer, bathe, purify, and fast. At noon, enter the chamber, face south, and bow three times. Sit upright, knock the teeth three times, and summon the body’s spirits. When finished, close the eyes and visualize the Red Thearch Lord of Mount Heng of the Southern Peak, surnamed Yán, personal name Yángguāng. His form is three inches and three parts tall, wearing a red jade *tongtian* precious crown, clad in a cinnabar feathered flying robe, riding a red dragon, attended by twelve red-jade maidens. He descends from the Southern Direction into your chamber. After a long while, the Red Thearch Lord transforms into the form of a newborn infant, within red qi, following the qi through your mouth to enter directly into the heart. Visualize the spleen generating yellow qi to bathe and surround the heart palace. The yellow and red qi merge in primordial chaos, like blazing flames in resplendent light. When you feel the heart suffused with warmth, swallow three times and recite the incantation while looking upward:

*"Three qi of the Cinnabar Heaven,
Southern Upper Jade Gate,
Within dwells the great spirit,
The Numinous Lord Red Thearch,
Clad in cinnabar, girded with talismans,
Flying patterns on feathered skirts.
Riding a red dragon,
Jade chariot on crimson clouds.
On the numinous Mount Heng of the South,
Myriad spirits hold him in highest reverence.
Entering and exiting the Three Clarities,
Feasting above in the Nine Mysteries.
Red-jade maidens attend and serve,
Jade youths guard the Perfected,
Holding jade tablets and registers,
Crimson writs on jade slips.
Examining and determining immortal ranks,
Reporting their weight to the heavens.
Today, O Great King,
The numinous peak opens the immortal path.
Turn back the myriad spirits,
Descend into my three gates.
Transforming into an infant,
Pacifying the heart and settling the hun-soul.
The two qi merge and blend,
Entwining my life’s root.
Ever with Zhu Rong,
Riding auroras,
Roaming the Southern Heights,
Heaven and Earth enduring forever."*

When finished, draw red qi and swallow three times.

Practicing this Dao for three years, the numinous officials of Mount Heng of the South and the Red Thearch will descend in truth, sending three red-jade maidens to serve you, fulfilling all petitions and granting every request. Your parents in life and death, your karmic records and punitive labors, assigned to the Southern Peak, will all be dissolved, criminal names released, and you will ascend to the Heavenly Offices. This method is wondrous and profound, opening the passage between life and death.

On the *wuchen*, *wuxu*, *jichou*, or *jiwei* day after the Spring Equinox, Summer Solstice, Autumn Equinox, or Winter Solstice, bathe, purify, and fast. At sunset, enter the chamber, face the center, and bow twelve times. Sit upright, knock the teeth twelve times, and summon the body’s spirits. When finished, close the eyes and visualize the Yellow Thearch Lord of Mount Song of the Central Peak, surnamed Jué, personal name Pǔshēng. His form is one foot and two inches tall, wearing a yellow jade *tongtian* precious crown, clad in a yellow feathered flying robe, riding a yellow dragon, attended by twelve yellow-silk jade maidens. He descends from the Central Peak into your chamber. After a long while, the Yellow Thearch Lord transforms into the form of a newborn infant, within yellow qi, following the qi through your mouth to enter directly into the spleen palace. Visualize the lungs generating white qi to bathe and surround the spleen palace. The yellow and white qi merge in primordial chaos, like yellow clouds swirling in the heavens. When you feel the spleen suffused with warmth, swallow twelve times and recite the incantation while looking upward:

chunks.original_text: 中天黄元，总统四灵，戊己中山，元始上精，黄帝大神，参驾飞轩，十二黄龙，上宴三清，玉女侍卫，神童使令，开山出图，校仙定名，徘徊中岳，日王敷灵，回真曲降，流灌我形，混元变化，老帝成婴，镇安黄宫，府藏华荣，身有奇毛，内外光明，真人交接，通达九清，得参黄軿，飞升玉庭。 毕，引黄炁十二咽止。 行此道十二年，则中岳灵官五帝降房，致黄素玉女十二人，为兆通达关启，上闻九天。 生死父母，罪书刑名，系於中岳，皆得解散，灭绝罪书，上名仙录，去离地宫，升入福堂，生死开泰，度人无量也。 当以立秋后庚申、辛酉之日，哺时沐浴，清斋入室，向西七拜，平坐叩齿七通，关启身神。 毕，闭眼思西岳华山白帝君，姓浩丘，讳元仓。 形长七寸七分，头戴素玉通天宝冠，衣素羽飞衣，驾乘白龙，从白素玉女十二人，从西岳来降兆室。 良久，白帝君化为婴，儿始生之状，在白炁之中，随炁入兆口中，径至肺府。 思肾生黑炁以灌绕肺宫，白黑二炁混沌相着，似庆云之杳霄，觉肺中熏热，便七咽，仰咒曰： 七炁之天，素皇金堂，白帝大神，安镇西方，华阴灵山，号曰神王，白羽飞裙，建旗御龙，上游玄清，出入华官，总领仙籍，列简诸方，吉日嘉辰，万圣宴降，徘徊九霞，流散晖光，金精焕焕，白石洋洋，开仙观灵，神敷四乡，愿道愿仙，愿生愿长，上愿既会，靡不吉昌，薄收通真，改我形容，变化自成，与炁同翔，身飞骨轻，上升紫房。 毕，引白熙七咽止。 行此道七年，则西岳灵官白帝降真，致白素玉女七人，为兆通灵关启，所求皆闻九天。 生死父母，罪书刑名，系於西岳，咸得解脱，罪书自除，名上仙籍，去离五道，永升福堂，生死开度，福庆自然也。 当以立冬后壬子、癸亥之日，子时沐浴，清斋入室，北向五拜，平坐叩齿五通，关启身神。 毕，闭眼思北岳恒山黑帝君，姓伏，讳通萌。 形长五寸五分，头戴玄玉通天宝冠，衣玄羽飞衣，驾乘黑龙，从太玄玉女十二人从北岳来降兆室。 良久，黑帝君化为婴儿始生之状，在黑炁之中，随炁入兆口中，径至肾府。 思肝生青黑，以灌绕肾府，青黑二炁混沌相着，如碧云之杳烟，觉肾中熏热，便五咽，仰咒曰： 五炁玄天，上始精流，结炁凝灵，号日仙庐，安镇北恒，黑帝所游，遨宴北单，参龙驾浮，今日王吉，万灵开图，五炁徘徊，庆云四敷，仙童执简，太玄度符，记我仙籍，金箓上书，回真曲降，混合婴孩，二炁交络，洞灌我躯，玄冥擭提，神仙为俦，永享天地，万劫无休。 毕，引黑炁五咽止。 行此道五年，则北岳灵官黑帝降真，致太玄玉女五人，给己使令，通致启乞，上闻九天。 生死父母，罪名刑书，系属北岳，并蒙解除，得度三恶之道，上升天堂，大妙上法，普度无穷也。 行此道，常当夷心静思，意注分明，灵真易感。 得其法式不移，年年而睹神行出入之向方，而天官司迎，魔灵消伏，不敢干前。 心聪意慧，自审吉凶，五岳五帝常为友宾，神明交通，立致神仙。 元始灵宝五帝醮祭招真玉诀 道言：灵宝赤书五篇真文，篇镇一方，皆元始自然之书，五老以五帝侍卫五方，灵官掌录，禁限一年三开，众仙庆真。 玄科旧典，上宫诸真人及五岳神仙，三年一奉灵宝五帝灵官，鸿鹭之鸟，香酒甘果，上献天真，以存灵炁。

Central Heaven’s Yellow Origin, sovereign over the Four Numinous Ones, earthly stems wù and jǐ of the Central Mountain, primordial essence of the Supreme Beginning—Great Spirit of the Yellow Thearch, ascending in a flying chariot drawn by three, twelve yellow dragons soaring to feast in the Three Clarities, jade maidens in attendance, divine youths as messengers, opening mountains to reveal charts, verifying immortals and fixing names, lingering upon the Central Peak, the Solar King dispenses numinous power, returning in a winding descent to pour and irrigate my form. In primordial chaos and transformation, the Ancient Thearch becomes an infant, settling and pacifying the Yellow Palace, its repository flourishing in splendor. My body bears wondrous hairs, radiant within and without. When perfected beings commune, I penetrate the Nine Clarities, ascend to join the Yellow Chariot, and fly upward to the Jade Court.

Conclude by drawing yellow qi and swallowing twelve times.

Practicing this Way for twelve years, the numinous officials of the Central Peak and the Five Thearchs descend to your chamber, sending twelve Yellow-Silk Jade Maidens to open and communicate your passages, making your prayers heard in the Nine Heavens. Parents of life and death, criminal records and penal names bound to the Central Peak—all are untied and dispersed, criminal records obliterated, your name inscribed in the immortal register. You depart the earthly palace and ascend into the Hall of Blessings, opening the passage between life and death, delivering countless beings.

Perform this on the gēngshēn or xīnyǒu day following the Autumn Equinox. At dusk, bathe, purify yourself, enter the chamber, face west, and bow seven times. Sit evenly and knock your teeth seven times to summon the spirits of your body.

Conclude by closing your eyes and visualizing the White Thearch Lord of the Western Peak Mount Hua, surnamed Hàojiū, personal name Yuáncāng. His form is seven inches and seven fen tall, wearing a plain-jade *tongtian* precious crown, clad in a plain feathered flying robe, riding a white dragon, attended by twelve White-Silk Jade Maidens. He descends from the Western Peak into your chamber. After a long while, the White Thearch Lord transforms into the form of a newborn infant, within white qi, following the qi through your mouth to enter directly into the lung palace. Visualize the kidneys generating black qi to bathe and surround the lung palace. The white and black qi merge in primordial chaos, like auspicious clouds vanishing into the empyrean. When you feel the lungs suffused with warmth, swallow seven times and recite the incantation while looking upward:

Heaven of the Seven Qi, the Pale Sovereign’s Golden Hall—Great Spirit of the White Thearch, pacifying and settling the West. The numinous mountain of Huàyīn, called the Divine King, clad in a white-feathered flying skirt, bearing banners and driving dragons, roams the Dark Clarity, entering and exiting the Flowery Palace. Overseer of the immortal registers, arranging the records of all directions, on auspicious days and propitious hours, myriad sages feast and descend, lingering amidst the Nine Rosy Clouds, scattering radiant splendor. Golden essence gleams, white stones surge. Opening the immortal’s vision of the numinous, the spirit spreads to the four quarters. Wishing for the Dao, wishing for immortality, wishing for life, wishing for longevity—when these highest wishes converge, none fail to prosper. Gathering and refining to penetrate the true, transform my form and appearance. Through spontaneous transformation, I soar with the qi, my body flying and bones light, ascending to the Purple Chamber.

Conclude by drawing white qi and swallowing seven times.

Practicing this Way for seven years, the numinous officials of the Western Peak and the White Thearch descend in truth, sending seven White-Silk Jade Maidens to open your numinous passages and communicate your prayers, all of which are heard in the Nine Heavens. Parents of life and death, criminal records and penal names bound to the Western Peak—all are released and absolved, criminal records self-erased, your name inscribed in the immortal register. You depart the Five Paths and forever ascend to the Hall of Blessings, opening the passage between life and death, with blessings and felicity naturally arising.

Perform this on the rénzǐ or guǐhài day following the Winter Solstice. At midnight, bathe, purify yourself, enter the chamber, face north, and bow five times. Sit evenly and knock your teeth five times to summon the spirits of your body.

Conclude by closing your eyes and visualizing the Black Thearch Lord of the Northern Peak Mount Heng, surnamed Fú, personal name Tōngméng. His form is five inches and five fen tall, wearing a dark-jade *tongtian* precious crown, clad in a dark feathered flying robe, riding a black dragon, attended by twelve Supreme Mystery Jade Maidens. He descends from the Northern Peak into your chamber. After a long while, the Black Thearch Lord transforms into the form of a newborn infant, within black qi, following the qi through your mouth to enter directly into the kidney palace. Visualize the liver generating blue-black qi to bathe and surround the kidney palace. The blue-black and black qi merge in primordial chaos, like azure clouds vanishing into mist. When you feel the kidneys suffused with warmth, swallow five times and recite the incantation while looking upward:

Heaven of the Five Qi, primordial essence flowing from the Supreme Beginning, congealing qi and coagulating numen—called the Immortal’s Abode. Settling and pacifying the Northern Heng, where the Black Thearch roams, feasting in the Northern Solitary Realm, ascending with dragons in a floating chariot. Today is the Solar King’s auspicious day, myriad spirits open the charts. The Five Qi linger, auspicious clouds spread to the four quarters. Immortal youths hold the registers, the Supreme Mystery transmits the talismans, inscribing my immortal record, the Golden Register written above. Returning in a winding descent, merging with the infant, the two qi intertwine, thoroughly irrigating my body. Dark and profound, I grasp the handle, immortals as my companions, eternally enjoying Heaven and Earth, enduring through ten thousand kalpas without end.

Conclude by drawing black qi and swallowing five times.

Practicing this Way for five years, the numinous officials of the Northern Peak and the Black Thearch descend in truth, sending five Supreme Mystery Jade Maidens to serve and command you, communicating your prayers and petitions, all of which are heard in the Nine Heavens. Parents of life and death, criminal names and penal records bound to the Northern Peak—all are absolved and released, enabling you to cross the Three Evil Paths and ascend to the Heavenly Hall. This wondrous and supreme method delivers boundless beings.

In practicing this Way, always maintain a calm mind and focused intention, making the numinous and true easily perceptible. Mastering its forms without deviation, year after year you will witness the spirits’ comings and goings, while heavenly officials welcome you, demonic spirits vanish and submit, daring not to approach. Your mind becomes keen and your thoughts wise, enabling you to discern good and ill fortune. The Five Peaks and Five Thearchs become your constant companions, spirits and deities communicate, and you swiftly attain immortality.

The *Yuánshǐ Língbǎo Wǔdì Jiàojì Zhāozhēn Yùjué* states: The Five Chapters of the Numinous Treasure’s Red Writings, each guarding a direction, are all spontaneous writings of the Yuánshǐ. The Five Elders attend the Five Thearchs in the five directions, with numinous officials overseeing the records, their prohibitions lifted once every three years for the assembly of immortals to celebrate the true. According to ancient statutes and former canons, the perfected of the Upper Palaces and the immortals of the Five Peaks, once every three years, offer to the numinous officials of the Five Thearchs of the Numinous Treasure: swans and egrets, fragrant wine, sweet fruits, and other offerings to the heavenly perfected, thereby sustaining the numinous qi.

chunks.original_text: 后学常能尔者，则灵宝五帝感乎精神，五方灵官当之喜欣。 凡礼无浓薄，意从中来，苟有至诚，人神感焉。 故书其品式，秘而修行。 旧典降致灵宝五帝灵官法，以春用甲寅、乙卯； 夏用丁巳、丙午； 四季用戊辰、戊戌、己未、己丑； 秋用庚申、辛酉； 冬用癸亥、壬子。 建王之日，於灵岳作高坛，四方简纂，东西南北王上，开五门，安五榜，榜言如左： 东方榜青书言。 九炁青天安宝华林青灵始老苍帝君、九炁天君、太上真王、青腰玉女、东乡诸灵官、青华元阳门。 安东面门。 南方榜赤书言。 三炁丹天梵宝昌阳丹灵真老赤帝君、朱丹三炁天君、元气丈人、朱宫太丹玉女、南乡诸灵官、洞阳太光门。 安南面门。 中央榜黄书言。 元洞太帝之山玉宝元灵元老黄帝君、太帝真人、子丹黄庭戊己天仓玉女、中黄太帝官君、元黄高晨门。 安王上门左。 西方榜白书言。 七炁之天七宝金门皓灵皇老白帝君、明石七炁大夫、太上白素玉女、西乡诸灵官、通阴金阙门。 安西面门。 北方榜黑书言。 五炁玄天洞阴朔单郁绝五灵玄老黑帝君、玄滋五炁天君、太上灵君、夜光玉女、北乡诸灵官、阴生广灵门。 安北面门。 众真榜紫书言。 九天众灵五岳灵山真人、江河四渎三官九府诸灵官地仙、玉女、五岳飞仙神仙诸仙官君、诣元黄高晨门右。 安王上门右。 右五门，法玄都上宫五气之门，上仙众真非正方之门出入，皆从中央黄帝门右也。 安五门毕，当四面安障，勿令当风，使火光气乱，每令火气密，勿广照，使灵气散也。 敷一五尺盛席，随节安之。 春则向东方也。 鸿鹭乌一头，令熟。 香酒五斗，每令清香。 果随丰珍之宜。 用盛杯十一枚，杓令新好。 拌三枚，皆令精。 其二拌各请五杯，其一拌请一杯，一杯拌令在五杯拌者下。 流五香火，相次於拌前。 果亦三拌，如之。 余酒肉别器，请着座前。 列南和丹缯五尺绛纹缯也於案上，请灵宝五篇真文及五符，割碧林之帛五尺，青纹缯也。 以覆真文符上，安着座后。 令符处丹青中，以为落发歃血之盟也。 青以代发，丹以代歃血之誓。 真人不伤神损德，故以代之。 香令五种，杂和之香。 炉每令新好，相连安之。 束带跪请。 每令余声下气，天真密感而降，当朱书白银木刺上，六枚，以请五帝众仙灵官，安五香火之下。 东方九炁青天安宝华林青灵始老青帝君、青牙九炁天君、太上真王、青腰玉女、东乡诸灵官、某帝真人某甲再拜五香，稽首奉请。 降青华元阳门。 南方三炁丹天梵宝昌阳丹灵真老赤帝君、朱丹三炁天君、元气丈人、朱宫太丹玉女、南乡诸灵官、某帝真人某甲再拜五香，稽首奉请。 降洞阳太光门。 中央元洞太帝之山玉宝元灵元老黄帝君、太帝真人、子丹黄庭戊己天仓玉女、中黄太帝官君、某帝真人某甲再拜五香，稽首奉请。 降元黄高晨门左。 西方七炁之天七宝金门皓灵皇老白帝君、明石七炁大夫、太上白素玉女、西乡诸灵官、某帝真人某甲再拜五香，稽首奉请。 降通阴金阙门。 北方五炁玄天洞阴朔单郁绝五灵玄老黑帝君、玄滋五炁天君、太上灵君、夜光玉女、北乡诸灵官、某帝真人某甲再拜五香，稽首奉请。 降阴生广灵门。 九天众灵五岳灵山真人、江河四渎三官九府诸灵官地仙玉女、五岳飞仙神仙诸仙官君、某帝真人某甲再拜五香，稽首奉请。
chunks.translated_text:
Those who consistently practice thus will move the spirits of the Five Thearchs of the Numinous Treasure, and the numinous officials of the five directions shall rejoice in response. In all rites, whether lavish or modest, what matters is the sincerity that arises from within—where there is utmost devotion, humans and spirits resonate. Thus, the forms and protocols are recorded here for secret cultivation.

According to the ancient statutes for summoning the numinous officials of the Five Thearchs of the Numinous Treasure:
- In spring, use the days of *jiǎyín* and *yǐmǎo*;
- In summer, use *dīngsì* and *bǐngwǔ*;
- During the four seasons’ transitions, use *wùchén*, *wùxū*, *jǐwèi*, and *jǐchǒu*;
- In autumn, use *gēngshēn* and *xīnyǒu*;
- In winter, use *guǐhài* and *rénzǐ*.

On the day of the *jiànwáng* ritual, construct a high altar upon a sacred peak, purifying the four directions. At the eastern, southern, western, and northern cardinal points, and at the central *wáng* position, open five gates and place five placards, each inscribed as follows:

**Eastern Placard** (written in blue):
*Nine Qi of the Azure Heavens, Peaceful Treasure Flourishing Grove, Azure Numinous Primordial Elder, Azure Thearch; Nine Qi Heavenly Lords; Supreme Perfected Kings; Azure-Waisted Jade Maidens; Eastern Precinct’s Numinous Officials; Azure Florescence Primordial Yang Gate.*
Install at the eastern-facing gate.

**Southern Placard** (written in red):
*Three Qi of the Cinnabar Heavens, Brahmā-Treasure Radiant Prosperity, Cinnabar Numinous Perfected Elder, Red Thearch; Vermilion Three Qi Heavenly Lords; Primordial Qi Venerable; Vermilion Palace Grand Cinnabar Jade Maidens; Southern Precinct’s Numinous Officials; Cavern Yang Supreme Radiance Gate.*
Install at the southern-facing gate.

**Central Placard** (written in yellow):
*Primordial Cavern Supreme Thearch’s Mountain, Jade Treasure Primordial Numinous Elder, Yellow Thearch; Supreme Thearch Perfected; Vermilion Elixir Yellow Court Wuji Heavenly Granary Jade Maidens; Central Yellow Supreme Thearch’s Officials; Primordial Yellow Lofty Dawn Gate.*
Install to the left of the central *wáng* gate.

**Western Placard** (written in white):
*Seven Qi of the Heavens, Seven Treasures Golden Gate, Luminous Numinous August Elder, White Thearch; Bright Stone Seven Qi Ministers; Supreme White Simplicity Jade Maidens; Western Precinct’s Numinous Officials; Penetrating Yin Golden Watchtower Gate.*
Install at the western-facing gate.

**Northern Placard** (written in black):
*Five Qi of the Mysterious Heavens, Cavern Yin Solitary Obscurity, Five Numinous Dark Elder, Black Thearch; Mysterious Nourishment Five Qi Heavenly Lords; Supreme Numinous Lords; Night-Shining Jade Maidens; Northern Precinct’s Numinous Officials; Yin Birth Vast Numinous Gate.*
Install at the northern-facing gate.

**Placard for the Host of Perfected** (written in purple):
*Nine Heavens’ Host of Numinous Ones, Perfected of the Five Peaks and Numinous Mountains; Three Offices and Nine Bureaus of the Rivers and Four Waterways; Numinous Officials, Earth Immortals, Jade Maidens; Flying Immortals of the Five Peaks, Divine Immortals, and all Perfected Officials; [Invited to] the Primordial Yellow Lofty Dawn Gate on the right.*
Install to the right of the central *wáng* gate.

These five gates correspond to the Five Qi Gates of the Mysterious Capital’s Upper Palace. The immortals and host of perfected, when not entering through their respective directional gates, all pass through the Yellow Thearch’s gate on the right.

Once the five gates are installed, erect screens on all four sides to block the wind, preventing the firelight and qi from scattering. Keep the flames contained, avoiding excessive brightness that would disperse the numinous qi. Spread a five-foot mat and arrange it according to the season—facing east in spring. Prepare one swan or egret, thoroughly cooked. Offer five *dǒu* of fragrant wine, kept pure and aromatic. Present fruits according to abundance and rarity. Use eleven fine, new cups and ladles, with three sets of vessels: two sets of five cups each, and one set of a single cup, placed beneath the five-cup sets. Arrange five incense fires in sequence before the vessels, and three sets of fruits likewise. Reserve additional wine and meat in separate containers, placed before the seats.

On the altar, lay out five *chǐ* of cinnabar-patterned crimson silk and the Five Chapters of the Numinous Treasure’s True Writings along with the five talismans. Cut five *chǐ* of azure-patterned silk from the Azure Grove to cover the true writings and talismans, placing them behind the seats. Position the talismans within the cinnabar and azure silk, symbolizing the covenant of hair-cutting and blood-oath. The azure silk substitutes for hair, and the cinnabar for the blood-oath—perfected beings avoid harming their spirit or diminishing their virtue, hence these substitutes.

chunks.original_text: 降元黄高晨门右。 右朱书五简，安五香火下。 读简毕，便请一帝，再拜，下简，以次如法。 后一简令在中央之右。 送天官都毕，埋山五方。 此玄都旧典，不得移式，则天真不降，误兆被殃也。 安简毕，调声自陈：某年某月某朔某日某子，某处某帝真人甲乙，年如干岁，以某年某月某日，从某岳真人甲乙奉受太上灵宝五老真文自然赤书五篇符命，谨依大道玄都旧典科法，清斋沐浴，香熏神室，奉请五帝君、五帝灵官真人、神仙玉女。 谨以鸿鹭之乌，香酒甘果，表於丹心，洁整身神，司迎上皇天尊。 请遣五体真官、三魂七魄、三宫真人，上到九天，奉迎九天之宫、三天之宫、五外之乡、青牙之天、朱丹之天、太帝之山、中黄之天、明石之天、玄滋之天、八方五帝真人之庭，通宣所启，执斋奉礼，虚心注仰，愿回灵驾，暂降某处，临映丹诚，降五符之真，歆享微礼薄馔。 毕，再拜，伏地良久，乃起长跪，取东方简读文毕，下简故处，重请上神。 奉降东方灵威．仰苍帝君、青牙九炁天君、太上真王、青腰玉女、东乡诸灵官。 次读南方简如上法。 奉降南方赤飘弩赤帝君、朱丹三炁天君、元炁丈人、朱宫太丹玉女、南乡诸灵官。 次读中央简如上法。 奉降中央含枢纽黄帝君、太帝真人、子丹黄庭戊己天仓玉女、中央太帝官君。 次读西方简如上法。 奉降西方曜魄宝白帝君、明石七炁大夫、太上白素玉女、西乡诸灵官。 次读北方简如上法。 奉降北方隐侯局黑帝君、玄滋五炁天君、太上灵君、夜光玉女、北乡诸灵官。 次读众灵简如上法。 奉降九天众灵、五岳灵．山真人、江河四渎三官九府诸灵官地仙玉女、五岳飞仙神仙诸仙官君。 右请五帝众真六位，位辄再拜，合十二拜，迎帝称降事。 毕，送帝，当称上劳某帝。 辄再拜，又合十一一拜。 醮礼之道，毕於此矣。 奉请天真毕，五过上酒燔香，而自陈启：某以有幸，宿世因缘，九天之劫，转及某身，遭遇明运，道法流行，得以秽身，参染灵文五篇赤书五符宝经。 自叨窃以来，尊仰上真，心希神仙，而精诚浅簿，未能感灵。 常恐罪身沉顿嚣秽，沦没九泉，天慈广大，展某效心，守诚信向，长斋思神，念善修生，志度无穷，而精诚浅狭，未能自宣。 灵文探奥，天尊遐邈，未敢自闻。 今上吉良日，整身清斋，告祭五灵五老五帝、诸君丈人，上劳神光，至真天尊，曲降卑贱，诚暂诚惧，不敢自宁，不胜天光，遐照无细，缘兹上陈。 某承先师旧典，以丹青告誓，闭口奉修，不敢泄漏，五八乃宣，以定仙契。 五帝关闻，乞真符经图，神灵侍卫，营护某身，登山涉岭，出入林涧，所求所向，皆得如心。 金石开通，神明交接，万愿咸从。 采芝采药，不得隐藏。 山精伏匿，万试不干。 虎狼毒螫，令不加身。 玉女神童，给使东西。 五帝灵炁，降入某形，安镇五府，内外聪明，心开意圣，逆知吉凶，三尸消灭，九蛊不生，身有奇毛，早得神仙。 惟蒙至尊大帝直垂慈恩，下流众庶，赐如所陈，不胜洪泽，辄身效勤。 臣诚惶诚恐，稽首再拜。 又三过上酒，伏地。 若私有所陈，自适意启乞。 启愿毕，上劳东方灵威仰青帝、青牙九炁天君、太上真王、青腰玉女、东乡诸灵官、各还神房，便散香再拜。

Descend through the Primordial Yellow High Morning Gate on the right. Place the five vermilion-written tablets beneath the five incense flames. After reading each tablet, invite one Thearch, bow twice, and deposit the tablet, proceeding in order according to the rite. The final tablet should be positioned to the right of the center. Once the Celestial Officials have all been sent off, bury the tablets in the five directions of the mountain. This is the ancient canon of the Mysterious Capital; the pattern must not be altered, lest the Heavenly Perfected fail to descend and misfortune befall the omen.

After arranging the tablets, modulate your voice and declare of your own accord:
*On the [day] of the [month] of the [year], [Your Name], Perfected of the Thearch of [Place], aged [number] years, having received on the [day] of the [month] of the [year] from [Name], Perfected of the [Peak] Peak, the Five Elder Perfected Writs of the Most High Numinous Treasure—Five Chapters of the Spontaneous Vermilion Script and Mandates—now, in reverent accordance with the ancient canon and ritual code of the Mysterious Capital, purify myself with fasting and ablutions, suffuse the divine chamber with incense, and humbly invite the Five Thearch Lords, the Five Thearch Numinous Officials, Perfected Ones, Divine Immortals, and Jade Maidens. With the solemnity of the wild goose and egret, I offer fragrant wine, sweet fruits, and pure sincerity, purifying body and spirit to receive the Most High August Heavenly Worthy. I beseech the dispatch of the Five Body Perfected Officials, the Three Hun and Seven Po, and the Three Palaces’ Perfected Ones to ascend to the Nine Heavens, to the palaces of the Nine Heavens, the Three Heavens, the Five Outer Regions, the Azure Tooth Heaven, the Vermilion Cinnabar Heaven, the Great Thearch’s Mountain, the Central Yellow Heaven, the Bright Stone Heaven, the Mysterious Nourishment Heaven, and the courts of the Five Thearch Perfected Ones of the Eight Directions. May they convey my entreaty, uphold the fast, and observe the rites with empty heart and reverent gaze, that the numinous chariot may turn and briefly descend to [Place], illuminating my sincere devotion. May the Perfected of the Five Talismans descend to partake of this humble offering.*

Conclude with two bows, prostrate for a long while, then rise to kneel. Take the Eastern tablet, read the text, and return it to its place. Again invite the supreme deities. Humbly welcome the descent of:
*The Eastern Numinous Might Azure Thearch Lord, Azure Tooth Nine Qi Heavenly Lord, Most High Perfected King, Azure Waist Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Eastern Precinct.*

Proceed to read the Southern tablet in the same manner. Humbly welcome the descent of:
*The Southern Blazing Might Vermilion Thearch Lord, Vermilion Cinnabar Three Qi Heavenly Lord, Primordial Qi Venerable, Vermilion Palace Great Cinnabar Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Southern Precinct.*

Proceed to read the Central tablet in the same manner. Humbly welcome the descent of:
*The Central Pivot-Embracing Yellow Thearch Lord, Great Thearch Perfected One, Vermilion Child Yellow Court Earth-Aether Granary Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Central Great Thearch’s Court.*

Proceed to read the Western tablet in the same manner. Humbly welcome the descent of:
*The Western Radiant Soul Treasure White Thearch Lord, Bright Stone Seven Qi Grand Master, Most High White Simplicity Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Western Precinct.*

Proceed to read the Northern tablet in the same manner. Humbly welcome the descent of:
*The Northern Concealed Might Black Thearch Lord, Mysterious Nourishment Five Qi Heavenly Lord, Most High Numinous Lord, Night-Shining Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Northern Precinct.*

Proceed to read the tablet for the Host of Numinous Ones in the same manner. Humbly welcome the descent of:
*The Host of Numinous Ones of the Nine Heavens, Perfected Ones of the Five Peaks and Numinous Mountains, Numinous Officials of the Three Offices and Nine Bureaus of the Rivers and Four Waterways, Earth Immortals, Jade Maidens, Flying Immortals of the Five Peaks, Divine Immortals, and all Perfected Officials.*

For each of the six positions of the Five Thearchs and Host of Perfected, bow twice, totaling twelve bows to welcome the Thearchs’ descent. Upon completion, send off the Thearchs, addressing them as *I humbly labor the [Title] Thearch*. Bow twice again, totaling eleven bows. The rite of libation concludes here.

After inviting the Heavenly Perfected, offer wine five times and burn incense, then declare of your own accord:
*I, [Your Name], by fortunate karmic affinity from past lives, have in this kalpa of the Nine Heavens been granted the grace to encounter this luminous era, wherein the Dao and its methods flourish. Thus, this unworthy self has been permitted to partake in the Five Chapters of the Vermilion Script, the Five Talismans, and the Treasure Scriptures. Since my presumptuous receipt of these, I have revered the Supreme Perfected, yearned for divine transcendence, yet my sincerity remains shallow and feeble, unable to move the numinous. I constantly fear my sinful self will sink into the clamor of defilement, drowning in the Nine Springs. Yet the Heavenly Compassion is vast; may it extend to my humble efforts, as I uphold faith and devotion, maintain perpetual fasting, contemplate the divine, cultivate goodness, and aspire to boundless deliverance. Yet my sincerity is narrow and weak, unable to manifest itself. The profound mysteries of the Numinous Writs and the distant majesty of the Heavenly Worthy deter me from presuming to approach. Today, on this auspicious day, I purify body and fast, offering sacrifice to the Five Numinous Ones, Five Elders, Five Thearchs, and all Lords and Venerables. I humbly labor the radiance of the divine, beseeching the Most True Heavenly Worthy to condescend to my lowly state with compassion and reverence. Overwhelmed by the Heavenly Light’s far-reaching gaze, which leaves nothing unseen, I now make this declaration. Following the ancient canon of my former masters, I have pledged in vermilion and ink, observing silence in my practice, daring not to divulge [the teachings]. Only after five times eight [days] may they be revealed, to secure the covenant of transcendence. May the Five Thearchs take heed: I seek the true talismans, scriptures, and charts, with divine attendants to guard and protect my person. Whether ascending mountains, traversing ridges, entering forests, or crossing ravines, may all my pursuits and aspirations be fulfilled. May metal and stone open, and divine spirits commune with me, granting all my wishes. In gathering herbs and fungi, may none remain hidden. May mountain spirits submit and conceal themselves, and all trials leave me unharmed. May tigers, wolves, and venomous stings not afflict me. May Jade Maidens and Divine Lads attend me in all directions. May the Five Thearchs’ numinous qi descend into my form, settling and stabilizing the Five Palaces, sharpening inner and outer senses, enlightening mind and intent, granting foresight of fortune and misfortune. May the Three Corpses vanish, the Nine Worms perish, and my body grow wondrous hairs, hastening my attainment of divine transcendence. I implore the Most August Great Thearch to bestow compassion upon this humble one among the masses, granting my entreaties. Overwhelmed by this vast grace, I dedicate myself to diligent service. With utmost reverence and awe, I prostrate and bow twice.*

Offer wine three more times and prostrate. If there are private matters to declare, present them as you see fit. After stating your wishes, humbly labor the Eastern Numinous Might Azure Thearch, Azure Tooth Nine Qi Heavenly Lord, Most High Perfected King, Azure Waist Jade Maiden, and all Numinous Officials of the Eastern Precinct to return to their divine chambers. Then scatter incense and bow twice.

*Ritual of the Five Chapters of the Numinous Treasure True Writs and Jade Instructions for Transmission from the Mysterious Capital*

The Perfected Master of the Numinous Treasure and Grotto-Mysterious [such-and-such] Marchmount, your humble servant [so-and-so], prostrates and bows twice, kowtows in fear of death, and respectfully addresses the Jade Augustness of the Most High, Utmost Perfected, and Greatly Sagely Venerable Lords, the Five Elders of Primordial Beginning:

Your humble servant, born in the lower world, has encountered karmic conditions in this life. Through the kalpas of the Nine Heavens, I have revolved without cessation. Yet by the accumulated blessings of former lives, my fortune has extended to the present body, allowing me to enter the Dharma-gate. My name is recorded in the imperial register of the Thearch, inscribed in the august scrolls, and my person bears the numinous tally. I have received the Golden Writs of the Three Caverns, the Purple Scripts and Vermilion Chapters of the Upper Clarity, and the Five Vermilion Writs of the Numinous Treasure and Grotto-Mysterious Five Chapters of True Writs.

My former master, the Perfected Master of [such-and-such] Marchmount, [so-and-so] Lord, transmitted these to me for wearing upon my person. They guard and protect the Perfected, command qi and dispatch spirits, and enact the Orthodox Dao. By this grace, disasters have vanished and misfortunes have receded. My family and state enjoy peace, and the efficacy of the Dao has become manifest—its luminous Way should be transmitted.

In the past, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month of the [such-and-such] year, I ascended [such-and-such] Marchmount to swear an oath before the Nine Heavens, vowing that within forty years, I would transmit these teachings to one whose bones and appearance accord with the charts and who meets the ritual requirements.

Since receiving the Dharma, the allotted years have been fulfilled. Now there is an advanced disciple, the Perfected of [such-and-such] Marchmount, [so-and-so], born in the [such-and-such] year of the [such-and-such] life, aged [such-and-such] years, born in the [such-and-such] month. His fate belongs to the Eastern Dipper, his name is recorded on Mount Tai, and his register is kept by the Azure Marchmount. His qi and bones harmonize with the Perfected. He has already received the Numinous Writs of the Nine Heavens and the Upper Dharma, yet his understanding remains shallow and narrow. He has not beheld the origin of the Dao, nor plumbed the roots of Heaven. The Five Thearchs do not oversee him, and the Nine Heavens have not yet heard of him. Yet he has faithfully and arduously sought the cinnabar elixir, accumulating years of supplication. He has laid bare his heart in oaths, moving both humans and spirits.

I now present twenty-four thousand coins of gold, corresponding to the twenty-four qi of life, along with nine taels of refined gold to swear an oath before the Nine Heavens. I offer forty feet of patterned silk for each of the Five Thearchs to entreat the Five Elders and Supreme Perfected.

These gold coins are not found in the Red Continent; I humbly request that various treasures be accepted as their equivalent to fulfill the required amount. I prostrate and make this entreaty, swearing a covenant for my seven ancestors, binding both life and death to this vow. Should I violate the mysteries of the Nine Heavens’ Upper Dharma, I accept death as punishment. In life and death, my parents and I will be consigned to the offices of ghostly officials, swallowing our voices and stifling our breath, daring not to speak.

Your humble servant [so-and-so], with a sincere heart and earnest devotion, has been blessed by accumulated fortune to partake of the Numinous Writs. Having perused their scrolls and beheld their contents, I am fit to attain the perfection of the Dao. I have fasted and purified myself, ascended the numinous mountain, and sworn an oath before Heaven to transmit the Writs. Following the clear statutes, I now confer them upon this disciple.

Daring not act presumptuously, I prostrate upon the altar of the Great Yang’s Numinous Platform and present a memorial on yellow silk with vermilion text to make this known. May the High Numinous Venerable Lords, the Chancellors of the Nine Heavens, deign to reflect upon my petition and take pity on my sincere heart.

Should the August Ones above deign to proclaim this, may the Heavenly Perfected of the Five Thearchs and Five Marchmounts, the Numinous Treasure and Primordial Beginning Great Spirits, deliver my nine generations of ancestors to ascend into the Southern Palace. May their withered bones be crowned and girdled, their decayed frames restored to bloom, and their exhausted souls, revolving in suffering, be transformed to enter the gates of immortality. May the spirits already ascended advance in rank within the immortal palaces, their names inscribed in jade, recorded in the golden registers and treasure repositories of the Nine Heavens’ immortal records.

I entreat the Azure Tooth Azure Thearch of the Nine Qi Azure Heaven, the Azure Waist Jade Maiden, and the Numinous Officials of the Eastern Precinct, along with the Azure Dragon troops and generals of the Jia-Yi offices, numbering nine hundred million each, to descend as one into the disciple’s body and guard the Palace of the Liver.

I entreat the Vermilion Tooth Three Qi Heavenly Lord, the Primordial Qi Elder, the Vermilion Palace Great Cinnabar Jade Maiden, and the Numinous Officials of the Southern Precinct, along with the Vermilion Dragon troops and generals of the Bing-Ding offices, numbering three hundred million each, to descend as one into the disciple’s body and guard the Crimson Palace of the Heart.

I entreat the Yellow Thearch of the Primordial Grotto’s Supreme Thearch Mountain, the Supreme Thearch Perfected, the Vermilion Child Yellow Court Earth Granary Jade Maiden, the Central Yellow Supreme Thearch Officials, and the Numinous Officials, along with the Yellow Dragon troops and generals of the Wu-Ji offices, numbering twelve hundred million each, to descend as one into the disciple’s body and guard the Palace of the Spleen.

I entreat the White Thearch of the Seven Qi Heaven, the Bright Stone Seven Qi Grand Master, the Supreme White Simplicity Jade Maiden, and the Numinous Officials of the Western Precinct, along with the White Dragon troops and generals of the Geng-Xin offices, numbering seven hundred million each, to descend as one into the disciple’s body and guard the Palace of the Lungs.

I entreat the Black Thearch of the Five Qi Mysterious Heaven, the Mysterious Nourishment Five Qi Heavenly Lord, the Supreme Numinous Lord, the Night Radiance Jade Maiden, and the Numinous Officials of the Northern Precinct, along with the Black Dragon troops and generals of the Ren-Gui offices, numbering five hundred million each, to descend as one into the disciple’s body and guard the Palace of the Kidneys.
