chunks.original_text: 请下五岳真人兵马、四渎真人兵马、九宫真人兵马、神仙飞仙乘骑各九亿万人，一合下入甲身中，分布官府，安镇身形五藏六府、九宫三元之内，随逐营卫，和魂检魄，保神养精，摄炁炼仙，骨髓凝化，血脉成真。 朝服元华五牙芝英，漱漏玉池，津液自生，内充外溢，光景彻明，项有圆像，照朗十方，游行天下，三界司迎，五岳四渎天官地神，稽首侍送，万灵卫真，兴云降雨，八威召龙，千变万化，立应自然。 大劫交周，洪灾四冲，身得飞行，过度天灾，八难之中，千凶万毒，莫不消亡，灭魔攘试，杀鬼斩奸，洞睹幽明，逆察吉凶，役使天官，坐召十方神仙自至，化景炼形，坐在立亡，飞升上清，与九祖父母同登九天。 甲受真之后，闭口奉修，密期天真，父不告子，惟在一身。 七年已上，四十年中，有遇仙之人，当告九天听传，四司五帝三官，考召甲九祖父母，对监盟言，检行慎法，不违天灵，生死同仙。 亏违天科，中泄真文，生死父母，及得甲身，谢罪四明，风刀万劫，三涂五苦，不敢蒙原。 甲未备参大法之前，千愆万罪，并乞原除，以今维新愿所奏，上合表御太上洞玄灵宝元始玉皇五老帝前，特垂照省，普关万灵，咸愿甲名长为真人，三光照曜，与五炁长存，恩惟九天至真太上大道无极尊神，分别哀怜，伏须告报。 臣某诚惶诚恐，稽首死罪，顿首再拜奏闻。 臣姓属某郡县 无上元始太上大道洞玄灵宝五老玉帝大圣　玉陛下。 太岁某月日，於某郡县某山峰金龙驿呈。 玄都旧科授上真之法，朱书黄缯上。 於灵岳传度经法，皆三日三夕露文，不风不飘，乃令至真。 遇风皆不合授。 三过被风，经表飞翔，此人皆不合，勿传。 此天科法峻，师与弟子宜共详慎，必合天灵。 太上洞玄灵宝赤书玉诀妙经卷下竟
chunks.translated_text:
I entreat the Perfected Ones of the Five Marchmounts with their troops and cavalry, the Perfected Ones of the Four Waterways with their troops and cavalry, the Perfected Ones of the Nine Palaces with their troops and cavalry, and the divine immortals and flying immortals with their mounts, numbering nine hundred million each, to descend as one into the disciple’s body, dispersing through the offices and palaces to securely guard the physical form within the Five Viscera and Six Palaces, the Nine Palaces and Three Primes, following the protective and defensive qi, harmonizing the hun and restraining the po, preserving the spirit and nurturing the essence, gathering qi and refining the immortal, coagulating the marrow and transforming the bones, and refining the blood vessels into perfection.

At dawn, they ingest the primordial efflorescence and the five-toothed mushroom blossoms, rinse the Jade Pool, and let the fluids generate spontaneously, filling the interior and overflowing externally, their radiance and luminosity penetratingly bright. A circular image appears upon the neck, illuminating the ten directions. They roam the world, greeted by the officials of the Three Realms, the celestial and terrestrial deities of the Five Marchmounts and Four Waterways, who bow in attendance and escort them. The myriad spirits guard the Perfected, summoning clouds and descending rain, commanding the Eight Might to summon dragons, performing a thousand transformations and ten thousand changes, instantly responding to the natural order.

When the great kalpas cycle and vast calamities surge from the four directions, the body attains flight and traverses heavenly disasters. Amid the Eight Difficulties and a thousand perils with ten thousand poisons, all are dissolved and extinguished. Demons are vanquished and trials repelled, malevolent spirits slain and treachery severed. They perceive the hidden and the manifest, discern fortune and misfortune in reverse, and command the celestial officials. Sitting, they summon the divine immortals of the ten directions to arrive spontaneously, transforming their radiance and refining their form, sitting or standing at will, vanishing or appearing. They ascend to the Upper Clarity, accompanying their nine generations of ancestors to ascend the Nine Heavens together.

After the disciple receives the Perfection, they close their mouth and cultivate in secrecy, awaiting the celestial Perfected. Fathers do not instruct sons; it resides solely within the self. After seven years and within forty years, if one encounters a person of immortal attainment, they shall report to the Nine Heavens for transmission, where the Four Controllers, Five Thearchs, and Three Officials will summon and examine the disciple’s nine generations of ancestors, overseeing the covenant and scrutinizing their conduct and adherence to the precepts, ensuring no violation of the celestial numina. In life and death, they shall attain immortality together.

Should they transgress the celestial statutes, divulging the Perfected Texts midway, the living and deceased parents, along with the disciple’s own body, shall confess their sins before the Four Luminaries, enduring the Wind Blade for ten thousand kalpas and the Three Paths and Five Sufferings, never daring to seek pardon. Before the disciple fully participates in the Great Rites, their thousand transgressions and ten thousand sins are beseeched for absolution. From this day forth, they renew their vows and present their petition, which ascends to be memorialized before the Supreme, the Cavernous Mystery, the Numinous Treasure, the Primordial Jade August, and the Five Elder Thearchs.

May they deign to bestow their luminous regard and universally inform the myriad spirits, all wishing the disciple’s name to endure as a Perfected One, illumined by the Three Luminaries and eternally abiding with the Five Qi. We implore the August and Venerable Supreme Dao of the Utmost Perfection of the Nine Heavens, the Celestial Perfected, to discern and compassionately attend to this plea.

Your servant, with utmost reverence and trepidation, prostrates in submission, kowtowing repeatedly to memorialize this entreaty. Your servant, of the surname [X] from the prefecture and county of [Y],

To the Supreme, Primordial, August, and Venerable Supreme Dao; the Cavernous Mystery and Numinous Treasure; the Five Elder Jade August Thearchs; and the Great Sage, Jade August Sovereign.

In the year [Z], the month [A], and the day [B], presented at the Golden Dragon Post of [C] Mountain Peak in the prefecture and county of [D].

The ancient statutes of the Mysterious Capital confer the rites of the Upper Perfected, inscribed in vermilion upon yellow silk. When transmitting the scriptures and rites upon the numinous marchmounts, the texts are exposed for three days and three nights, undisturbed by wind or drifting, thereby deemed suitable for the Perfected. If encountered by wind, transmission is withheld. Should the texts be exposed to wind thrice, causing the memorial to flutter, such a person is deemed unsuitable, and transmission must not proceed. These celestial statutes are severe; master and disciple must together deliberate and exercise utmost caution, ensuring alignment with the celestial numina.

Here ends the Lower Scroll of the *Wondrous Scripture of the Vermilion Writ and Jade Instructions of the Cavernous Mystery and Numinous Treasure of the Supreme*.
